Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey amwdy tawr par do dayta frymwn ko hum aahangh karnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframesdf1 = pd.dataframe ({'A': [1 ، 2 ، 3] ، 'B': [4 ، 5 ، 6]}) df2 = pd.dataframe ({'a': [7 ، 8 ، 9] ، 'by': [10 ، 11 ، 12]})# dayta fymwn ko amwdy tawr par dayf_kwnkatynytda = py day daat kwkyt ([day ayf 1 ، day ayf 2]) prnt kryn(df_concatenated) is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk hi kalm kay nam 'A' aur 'B' kay sath do dayta fyms DF1 aur DF2 hayn۔amwdy tawr par un ko jwranay kay l we ، hum PD.CONCAT () fnkshn ka astamal karty hain aur dayta frymwn ko btawr fharst pas karty hayn۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، pd.concat () ayk karkrdghy ka mzaaharha krta hay

Question: strngh kalm ki lmbaiy ki bnyad par dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey strngh kalm ki lmbaiy par mbny dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay liye ayk msaal ka kwda yahan haay: PD# msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'mtn': ['haylw' ، 'wrlda' ، 'awpnaiy'،' azaghr ']})#' tykst 'kalm fltrda_ day ayf = day ayf [day ayf [day ayf [' tykst '] ki lmbaiy par mbny fltr ktaaryn۔ str.len ()> 5] prnt (fltrda_ day ayf) is msaal kay tawr par ، hamary pas ayk dayta frym hay js kay sath hamary pas ayk dayta frym haay۔'mtn' namy ayk kalm js main dawr shaml hayn۔ham hr tar ki lmbaiy ka hasab lghanay kay liye 'tykst' kalm kay .str.len () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔as kay bad ، hum ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay liye ayk shrta lghatay hain jahan 'tykst' kalm ki lmbaiy 5 sy zayada hawty haay۔ aaؤt pt ho gha: mark daawn kapy kwda tykst 2 awpn aaihayr ، dayta frym ki ktaaryn fltr ki jati hain js ki lmbaiy ki lmbaiy ki bnyad par ''۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm ki mjmway zayada sy zayada ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: kesi dayta frym main kalm ki zayada sy zayada ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap pandawn main .kwmyks () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'akdar': [10 ، 5 ، 5 ، 8 ، 12 ، 6]})# 'akdar' kalm day ayf ['cumulative_max'] kay mjmway zayada sy zayada ka hasab lghaiyn۔= df ['values']. cummax () prnt (DF) is msaal main ، hamary pas 'akdar' kay nam sy kalm wala dayta frym haay۔ham hr saf main mjmway tawr par zayada sy zayada ka hasab lghanay kay liye 'akdar' kalm par .kwmyks () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔ aaؤt pt ho gha: ryazuy ka kwda wylywza mjmway_myks

Question: dayta frym ko ayksl fail main tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: dayta frym ko ayksl fail main tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap pandawn main TO_EXCEL () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35]})# dayta frym ko ayksl faildaf daat ty aw aykssl ('aaؤt pt. ayks ayl ays ayks' ، andayks = ghlta) prnt ("dayta frym ayksl fail main mhafwza kya gaya haay۔") main tbdyl karain ، is msaal main ، hamary pas day ayf namy dayta frym haay۔ham dayta frym par TO_EXCEL () ka tarykha astamal karty hain takha isy ayksl fail kay tawr par mhafwza kya jaskay۔TO_EXCEL () ki pehli dlyl fail ka rastha aur nam hay jahan aap ayksl fail ko mhafwza karna chahti hayn۔as maamlay main ، hum isy "aaؤt pt. ayks ayl ays ayks" kay tawr par mhafwza karty hayn۔andayks = jhwtay pyramytr ka astamal andayks kalm ko ayksl fail main mhafwza hony sy kharj karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: sy ays ays kwpy kwdayta aay ayf aar aay aym ayksl fail ko mhafwza kya jata haay۔ kwda ko chlanay kay bad ، "aaؤt pt. ayks ayl ays ayks" kay nam sy ayk fail tshkyl di jaye ghy۔mwjwdha daairktry ، js main dayta frym dayta par mushtamil hay

Question: kesi haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym sy ktaarwn ko chhwranay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: kesi haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym sy ktaaryn chhwranay kay l you ، aap pandawn main bwlyn andayksngh astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35]})# kndayshn day ayf = day ayf [day ayf ['amr']> 25] prnt (day ayf) par mbny ktaaryn darap (day ayf) prnt (day ayf) ، hamary pas day ayf namy dayta frym haay۔ham kesi haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym sy ktaaryn chhwranay kay liye bwlyn andayksngh ka astamal karty hayn۔haalt DF ['Age']> 25 ktaaryn mntkhb krty hay jahan 'amr' kalm 25 sy zayada haay۔ aaؤt pt hawgha: mark daawn kapy kwda nam AGE1 bab 302 charly 35 haair ، aysy ktaaryn jo haalt ko pora nahin krty hain (DF ['amr' ']> 25) dayta frym sy kharj krdyiay gaye hain ، aur is kay ntyjay main dayta frym ko day ayf main waps krdya gaya haay۔ bwlyn andayksngh ka astamal karty hoey ، aap mkhtlf mayarat ki bnyad par ktaarwn ko chhwranay kay liye mkhtlf shraita ka atalak krsktay hayn۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm sy anwkhy akdar nkalnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: dayta frym main kalm sy anwkhy akdar nkalnay kay l you ، aap pandawn main anwkha () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ، 'bab' ، 'dayw']# anwkhy akdaras msaal main 'nam' kalm ywnyk_walywza = day ayf ['nam'] sy mnfrd () prnt (mnfrd_awlyws) sy ، hamary pas 'nam' kay nam sy ayk kalm kay sath day ayf namy dayta frym haay۔ham mnfrd akdar ko nkalnay kay liye 'nam' kalm par anwkha () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔ aaؤt pt hawgha: rwst kwpy kwda ['ayls' 'bab' 'charly

Question: mtadd kalmwn sy akdar ko ykja krkay dayta frym main nya kalm bnanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: ayk sy zayada kalmwn sy akdar ko ykja krkay dayta frym main ayk nya kalm bnanay kay l you ، aap strngh knkytyshn ya kesi aur mtalwbha tbdyly ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'phala nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly'] ، 'aakhry nam': ['smth' ، 'jansn'،' braؤn ']})#' pehla nam 'awr' aakhry nam 'day ayf [' mkml nam '] = DF [' pehla nam '] +' ' + DF [' aakhry nam '] kay amtzaaj krkay ayk nya kalm bnaiyn۔as msaal main prnt (day ayf) ، hamary pas kalmwn kay 'phala nam' aur 'aakhry nam' kay sath DF namy dayta frym haay۔ham 'phala nam' aur 'aakhry nam' kalmwn sy '+' aaprytr aur is kay darmiyan jghha ka astamal karty hoey akdar ko hum aahangh krkay 'mkml nam' kay nam sy ayk nya kalm bnatay hayn۔ aaؤt pt hawgha: ryazuy ka kwda pehla nam aakhry nam mkml nam 0 aylsasmth ayls asmth 1 bab jansn bab jansn 2 charly braؤn charly braؤnyhayr ، nya kalm 'mkml nam' ki akdar ko ykja krkay tkhlyk kya gaya hay '

Question: dayta frym main do dayt taim kalmwn kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: dayta frym main do dayt taim kalmwn kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap ayk kalm ko dusray sy ghhta saktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe (start 'astart taim': ['2022-01-01 10:00:00' ، '2022-01-01 12:30:00'] ، 'akhttamy wkt': ['2022-01-01 11:30:00' ، '2022-01-01 14:15:00']})# kalmwn ko dayt tymdaf main tbdyl karain ['astart taim'] = PD۔to_datetime (df ['start wkt']) df ['end wkt'] = pd.to_datetime

Question: kam myks askylngh ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main addy kalm ko mamwl par lanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: kam sy kam myks askylngh ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main addy kalm ko mamwl par lanay kay l you ، aap asklrn.prwsysngh madaywl sy mn myks askylr klas astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kwda haay: paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PDFROM SKLEREN.Preprocessing draamd Minmaxscaler# msaal Dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'akdar': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50]})# MinMaxScaler aabjyktsklr = MinMaxcaler = MinMaxscaler aabjyktsklr = MinMaxsscaler bnaiynkm sy kam myks askylngh day ayf ['aam akdar'] = askylr.ft_transfarm (day ayf [['akdar']]) prnt (day ayf) ka astamal karty hoey 'akdar' kalm ko aam karain (day ayf) prnt (day ayf) is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk dayta frym hay js ka nam day ayf hay js ka nam ayk addy kalm hay 'akdar '۔ham ayk mn myks askylr aabjykt tyar karty hain aur phir isy kam sy kam myks askylngh ka atalak krkay 'akdar' kalm ko mamwl par lanay kay liye astamal karty hayn۔ askylr ka FIT_TRANSFORM () tarykha astamal kya jata hay takha 'akdar' kalm ki kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada akdar ki ghnty ki jaskay aur akdar ki pymaish ki jaskay۔had tak [0 ، 1]۔aam akdar ko dayta frym main 'aam akdar' kay nam sy ayk niay kalm main tfwyzu kya jata haay۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm ki kfayt shaary awsta awsta ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm sy aaly trien akdar kay sath upar ki ktaaryn nkalnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandaas ayk mshhawr awpn swrs azaghr laibryry hay jo dayta main hayra phyry aur tjzayha kay liye astamal hawty haay۔yha sakhty aadad wa shmar ، jesay tyblr dayta ، taim syryza ، aur bohat kuch kay sath mwsar andaza main kam karnay kay liye dayta dahanchay aur afaal fraham krta haay۔pandaas nmy kay sab sy upar tamyr kya gaya hay ، jo addy kmpywtngh kay liye ayk aur taaktwr azaghr laibryry haay۔ yahan pandawn ki kuch aham khsawsayat hayn: dayta dahanchay: pandaas syryza aur dayta frym namy do bnyady dayta dahanchay mtaarf krata haay۔ayk slslha ayk jhaty lybl laga hoa srny hay jo kesi bhi dayta ki ksm ko thamnay kay kabl hay ، aur dayta frym do jhaty lybl laga hoa dayta dahanchha hay js main mmknha tawr par mkhtlf aksam kay kalm hayn۔yha dahanchay aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay ، jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay main aasan bnatay hayn۔ dayta hayra phyry: pandaas dayta ko jwra twra karnay kay liye wsya pymanay par afaal aur tarykwn ko fraham krta haay۔aap un afaal ka astamal karty hoey apnay dayta par mkhtlf aapryshnza ko fltr ، trtyb ، mjmway ، niy shkl dy saktay hain aur anjam dy saktay hayn۔yha ayk sy zayada dayta frymwn par zum ، shaml hony ، aur mhawr sazay ki bhi ajazat dyta haay۔ dayta ki safaiy: pandaas ghmshdha dayta ko snbhalnay aur dayta ki safaiy kay kamwn ko anjam denay kay l tools twlza pysh krta haay۔aap ghmshdha akdar ka ptha lghasktay hain aur un ko door krsktay hain ، un ko mnasb akdar sy tbdyl krsktay hain ، ya mkhtlf tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey ghmshdha dayta ko antrpwlyt krsktay hayn۔ dayta un pt/aaؤt pt: pandaas mkhtlf fail farmyts ، jesay sy ays wy ، ayksl ، ays kyw ayl dayta bys ، aur sy dayta prahnay aur lkhnay ki hamayt krta haay۔mzayd.yha mkhtlf zaraia sy dayta draamd karnay ، is par karrwaiy karnay aur ntaij braamd karnay kay afaal mhaya krta haay۔ taim syryza ka tjzayha: pandawn main taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar kay sath kam karnay ki wsya salahaytyn hayn۔yha tarykh/wkt ki asharyha sazay ، dwbarha trtyb denay ، tadd tbadlwn ، wkt ki tbdyly aur bohat kuch kay liye faalyt fraham krta haay۔yha khsawsayat khasa tawr par wkt par mnhasar aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha karnay main mfyd hayn۔ dyghr laibryrywn kay sath anzumam: pandaas dyghr mshhawr azaghr laibryrywn ، jesay nwmy ، mytplwtlyb aur ays sy aai py aai kay sath achhy tarah sy mrbwta hawta haay۔yha baghair kesi rkawt kay anzumam aur bahamy taawn ki ajazat dyta hay ، js sy aap ko apnay dayta tjzayha main mkhtlf laibryrywn ki taakt ka faidha athanay kay kabl bnata haay۔yha dayta hayra phyry aur tjzayha kay liye ayk taaktwr aur mwsar frym wrk mhaya krta hay ، js sy yeh bohat sy dayta pyshha wr afrad aur mhakkyn kay liye antkhab ka antkhab hawta haay۔

Question: dayta frym main ayk sy zayada bainry kalmwn main zamrha dar akdar kay kalm ko tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandaas ayk taaktwr awpn swrs azaghr laibryry hay jo dayta tjzayha aur hayra phyry main braay pymanay par astamal hawty haay۔yha astamal main aasany sy dayta dahanchay aur dayta tjzayha kay twlza mhaya krta hay ، js sy yeh sakhtha aadad wa shmar kay sath kam karnay kay liye ayk mkbwl antkhab hawta haay۔ yahan kuch wjwhaat hain keh pandawn ko dayta tjzayha main wsya pymanay par astamal kya jata haay: dayta dahanchay: pandaas do aham dayta dahanchay ، syryza aur mtaarf kratay hayn۔dayta frym۔ayk slslha ayk jhaty lybl laga hoa saf hay jo kesi bhi dayta ki ksm ka anakad krskta hay ، jabky dayta frym do jhaty lybl laga hoa dayta dahanchha hay js main mmknha tawr par mkhtlf aksam kay kalm hayn۔yha dahanchay dayta ko zakhyrha karnay ، jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha mhaya karty hayn۔ dayta hayra phyry: pandaas dayta hayra phyry kay liye wsya pymanay par afaal aur tarykwn ki pysh ksh krta haay۔aap sadha aur bdyhay nhaw ka astamal karty hoey fltr ، trtyb ، ghrwp ، mjmway ، mhawr ، aur aadad wa shmar ko tbdyl krsktay hayn۔yha karwaiyan aap ko tjzayha kay l data dayta saaf karnay ، tbdyl karnay aur tyar karnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔ dayta hayndalngh ko yad karty hawiay: hakyky dnya kay aadad wa shmar main aksar ghmshdha akdar shaml hawty hayn۔pandaas ghmshdha dayta ko snbhalnay kay l tools twlza mhaya krta hay ، js sy aap mkhtlf hakmt amlywn ki bnyad par ghmshdha akdar ka ptha lghanay ، hatanay ya bhrnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔as lchk sy yeh ykyny bnanay main mdd mlty hay keh ghmshdha dayta tjzayha kay aml main mdakhlt nahin krta haay۔ dayta anzumam: pandaas baghair kesi rkawt kay baghair azadwajy tawr par dyghr laibryrywn kay sath mrbwta hawta hay ، jesay azaghr dayta mahawlyaty nzaam ، jesay nmy ، mytplwtlyb aur askypy۔yha anzumam aap ko mtadd laibryrywn ki taakt ko ykja karnay ki ajazat dyta hay takha aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha kay pychydha kamwn ko mwsar andaza main anjam diya jaskay۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap aasany sy nmy ka astamal karty hoey ryazuy ki karrwaiywn ka atalak krsktay hain ، mytplwtlyb ka astamal karty hoey dayta ko tsawr krsktay hain ، aur pandawn kay sath sath ays sy aai py waiy ka astamal karty hoey aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha krsktay hayn۔ taim syryza tjzayha: pandaas ko taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay kay liye wsya pymanay par mdd haasal haay۔yha wkt par mnhasar aadad wa shmar ko snbhalnay kay liye khsawsay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay aur afaal mhaya krta hay ، js main tarykh/wkt ki asharyha sazay ، dwbarha trtyb denay ، wkt ki shftngh ، aur tadd ki tbdyly shaml haay۔yha khsawsayat dnyawy ajzaaa kay sath aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha karnay kay liye khasa tawr par kabl kdr hayn۔ dayta I/O: pandaas mkhtlf fail farmyts say/prahnay aur lkhnay ki shawlt fraham krta hay ، bshmwl CSV ، ayksl ، ays kyw ayl dayta bys ، aur bohat kchh۔yha mkhtlf zaraia sy dayta draamd karnay ، is par karrwaiy karnay aur ntaij braamd karnay kay liye aasan afaal fraham krta haay۔as lchk sy mkhtlf fail farmyts kay aadad wa shmar kay sath kam karna aasan hawjata hay aur byrwny aadad wa shmar kay zaraia kay sath mrbwta hawta haay۔ awwr ، pandaas mwsar aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ، taaktwr hayra phyry ki salahaytwn ، aur dyghr laibryrywn kay sath hamwar anzumam ki frahamy kay zaryaha dayta tjzayha kay wrk flw ko aasan aur tyza krta haay۔as kay saarf dwst antrfys aur wsya faalyt nay isy azaghr main dayta tjzayha kay kamwn kay liye janay wali laibryry bna diya haay۔

Question: dayta frym ko farwrda bhr kar ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main pandaas laibryry draamd karnay kay l you ، aap draamd ki mtalwbha alfaza ko astamal krsktay hain js kay bad laibryry ka nam "pandaas" haay۔yha nhaw haay: paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaashwwr ، yeh ayk aam rwaj hay keh pandawn ko arf kay sath draamd kya jaye takha aap kay kwda main laibryry ka hawalha dena aasan hawjaiay۔pandawn kay liye astamal hony wala sab sy aam arf "PD" haay۔yhaan aap arf kay sath pandawn ko draamd krsktay hayn: paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas is draamdy byan kay sath ، aap "PD" arf ka astamal karty hoey pandaas afaal aur klaswn tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، dayta frym bnanay kay l you ، aap PD.Dataframe () astamal krsktay hain ، aur CSV fail ko prahnay kay l you ، aap PD.read_csv () astamal krsktay hayn۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh aap ko aap kay samnay aap kay azaghr mahawl main pandaas anstal karnay ki zurwrt haay۔asay draamd krskta haay۔aap apnay trmynl ya kmanda prampt main mndrjha zayl kmanda chla kar PIP pykyj mynyjr ka astamal karty hoey pandawn ko anstal krsktay hayn: kapy kwdapp anstal pandaas pandaa anstal hay ، aap isy apnay azaghr askrpt ya antrayktw syshn main draamd krsktay hain aur dayta tjzayha kay kamwn kay liye is ki faalyt ko astamal karna shrwa krsktay hayn۔

Question: ryjyks mych kay ntyjay par mbny dayta frym main nya kalm bnanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main ، aap pd.dataframe () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey lght sy dayta frym tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔lght ki chabyan kalm kay namwn kay tawr par astamal hon gi ، aur akdar ko mtalkha kalmwn kay aadad wa shmar kay tawr par astamal kya jaye gha۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dakshnry dayta bnaiyn = {'nam': ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan' ، 'lndaa'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42 ، 50].kwda ka nam amr sty 0 jan 28 nyw yark 1 aymly 35 shkaghw 2 ryan 42 las aynjls 3 lndaa 50 san fransskwin is msaal kay tawr par ، lght kay aadad wa shmar main tyn chabyan ('nam' ، 'amr' ، 'shhar') aur un ki mtalkha akdar shaml hayn۔as kay bad pd.dataframe () fnkshn ko lght sy dayta frym DF bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ dakshnry main ayk klyd dayta frym main ayk kalm bn jati hay ، aur is sy wabstha akdar un kalmwn main dayta bn jati hayn۔dayta frym main kalmwn ka aardar lght main chabyan kay trtyb sy mmasal hawgha۔har kalm ki akdar ko un ki asharyha pwzayshn ki bnyad par mnslk kya jaye gha۔ aap apnay dayta par dayta tjzayha kay kamwn ko anjam denay kay liye mkhtlf pandaas afaal aur tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hain aur un main hayra phyry krsktay hayn۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm main kesi kdr kay wakaat ki mjmway ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym ki shkl ki janch pratal kay l you ، aap shkl wsaf ko astamal krsktay hayn۔shkl wsaf ayk tpl lwtata hay jo dayta frym kay tawl wa arzu ki nmaindghy krta haay۔tpl ka pehla ansar ktaarwn ki tadad ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur dusra ansar kalmwn ki tadad ki nmaindghy krta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan' ، 'lndaa'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42 ، 50].(4 ، 3) is msaal main ، shkl wsaf ko dayta frym day ayf par kaha jata haay۔aaؤt pt (4 ، 3) is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh dayta frym main 4 ktaaryn aur 3 kalm hayn۔ dayta frym ki shkl ki janch pratal kay zaryaha ، aap jldy sy is kay saiza aur tawl wa arzu ka tayn krsktay hain ، jo aap kay dayta ki sakht aur dairha kar ko smjhnay kay liye mfyd haay۔

Question: dawr kay kalm ko dayta frym main ayk wazuha dayta ki ksm main tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym ki pehli N ktaarwn tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay l you ، aap hayda () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔hayda () ka tarykha ayk nya dayta frym waps krta hay js main asal dayta frym kay aaghaza sy ktaarwn ki mkhsawsa tadad par mushtamil haay۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، agar koi pyramytr fraham nahin kya jata hay tou yeh pehli 5 ktaaryn lwtata haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY CODEMPORT pandaas PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan' ، 'lndaa' ، 'daywda'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ،42 ، 50 ، 45] ، 'shhar': ['nywyark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls' ، 'san fransskw' ، 'syitl' ، 'syitl']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# pehlay 3 Rowsfirst_three_rows tak rsaiy haasal kryn= df.head (3)# rzalt prnt (First_there_rows) aaؤt pt dasplay kryn: SQLCOPY kwda nam ki amr sty 0 jan 28 nyw yark 1 aymly 35 shkaghw 2 ryan 42 las aynjnsn is msaal kay tawr par ، hayda (3) ka tarykha dayta frym day ayf par blaya gaya hay takha isy bazayaft kya jaskay۔phaly 3 ktaaryn۔ntyjha frst_thry_rwza dayta frym main mhafwza haay۔frst_thry_rw prntngh mtalwbha aaؤt pt ko dkhata haay۔ aap kesi bhi msabt add ayn ki wzuahat krsktay hain takha dayta frym ki pehli ayn ktaarwn tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay liye sr () kay tarykha kar ki dlyl kay tawr pr۔as sy aap ko aadad wa shmar kay sbsyt ko jldy sy janchnay aur is ki sakht aur akdar ka ahasas haasal karnay ki shawlt mlty haay۔

Question: dayta frym main do kalmwn kay mabyn kwsain mmasalt ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym sy mkhsawsa kalmwn ko mntkhb karnay kay l you ، aap kalm kay namwn ya LOC ya ILOC rsar kay sath andayksngh astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch nktaha nzar hayn: kalm kay namwn kay sath asharyha sazay: aap mrba brykt [] astamal krsktay hain aur andayks kay tawr par kalm kay namwn ki fharst fraham krsktay hayn۔yha sirf mntkhb kalmwn kay sath ayk nya dayta frym waps kray gha۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'shhar': [[[shhar ': [[28 ، 35 ، 42]'nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# mkhsawsa kalm slyktda_kwlmza = day ayf [['nam' ، 'shhar']]# ko mntkhb karain (mntkhb_kwlmza) aaؤt pt dasplay kryn: SQLCOPY: SQLCOPYkwda ka nam sty 0 jan nyw yark 1 aymly shkaghw 2 ryan las aynjlysysngh ayl aw sy ayksysr: lwk ayksysr lybl par mbny andayksngh ki ajazat dyta hay ، jahan aap dono ktaar aur kalm lybl ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔mkhsawsa kalmwn ko mntkhb karnay kay l you ، aap bray aant kay sath LOC astamal krsktay hayn: tamam ktaaryn mntkhb karnay aur kalm kay namwn ko btawr fharst byan karnay kay liay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'shhar': [[[shhar ': [[28 ، 35 ، 42]'nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# locedected_colums = df.loc [: ، ['nam' ، 'shhar'] ka astamal karty hoey mkhsawsa kalm mntkhb kryn۔.mkhsawsa kalmwn ko mntkhb karnay kay l you ، aap ILOC ko ayk bray aant kay sath astamal krsktay hayn: tamam ktaaryn mntkhb karnay aur kalm pwzayshnwn ko add ki fharst kay tawr par byan karnay kay liay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'shhar': [[[shhar ': [[28 ، 35 ، 42]'nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ilocselectect_colums = df.iloc ka astamal karty hoey mkhsawsa kalm mntkhb karain [: ، [0 ، 2]]# ntaij prnt (mntkhb_kalm) aaؤt pt dasplay kryn: SQLCOPY kwda ka nam sty 0 jan nyw yark 1 aymly shkaghw 2 ryan las aynjlysn tynwn nktaha nzar ، aap dayta frym sy mkhsawsa kalmwn ko mntkhb karnay kay liye kalm namwn ya kalm pwzayshnwn ki fharst fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: dayta frym main psmandha akdar ko hayndal karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ki haalt par mbny dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay l you ، aap bwlyn andayksngh ka astamal krsktay hayn۔bwlyn andayksngh aap ko bwlyn mask bnanay ki ajazat dyty hay jo ayk mkhsawsa haalt ki bnyad par ktaaryn mntkhb krty haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan' ، 'lndaa'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42 ، 50].> 30]# fltrda dayta fym prnt (fltrda_ day ayf) aaؤt pt dasplay kryn: kapy kwda nam ki amr sty 1 aymly 35 shkaghw 2 ryan 42 las aynjls 3 lndaa 50 san fransskwin is msaal kay tawr par ، haalt day ayf ['amr']> 30 ayk bwlyn mask bnata hay jo schaiy ka andazaha krta haay۔ktaarwn kay liye jahan 'amr' kalm ki kymt 30 sy zayada hay aur dusri sawrt main ghalat haay۔mrba brykt kay andr is bwlyn mask ka astamal karty hoey [] dayta frym ko fltr krta hay ، sirf woh ktaaryn waps karty hain jo haalt ko pora krty hayn۔ aap mkhtlf mayarwn ki bnyad par ktaar ko fltr karnay kay liye haalt ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bna saktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap dayta frym main dusray kalmwn ki bnyad par mtadd shraita ya fltr ktaar ko ykja karnay kay liye mntaky aaprytrza (awr kay liye aur ، |shraita ، aap ko aasany sy pychydha dayta fltrngh kay kam anjam denay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔

Question: kesi dusray kalm kay ahaday par mbny dayta frym main nya kalm bnanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym main kalmwn ka nam tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap nam () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔nam tbdyl karnay ka tarykha aap ko ayk lght fraham karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jahan klydyn mwjwdha kalm kay nam hain aur akdar niay kalm kay nam hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'shhar': [[[shhar ': [[28 ، 35 ، 42]'nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# nam kalmzanyw_kwlwm_nymza = {'nam': 'mkml nam' ، 'amr': 'amr' ، 'shhar': 'mkam '} df = df.rename (kalm = new_column_names)# namzad kalm prnt (day ayf) aaؤt pt kay sath dayta frym dasplay kryn: SQLCOPY kwda mkml nam amr ki amr 0kalm pyramytr kay sath niay_ kalm_ namwn ki lght kay sath dayta frym day ayf par blaya jata haay۔lght mwjwdha kalm kay namwn ki mypngh ko mtalwbha niay kalm kay namwn ki wzuahat krty haay۔ nam () kay tarykha kar ka ntyjha dayta frym (DF = df.rename (kalm = new_column_names)) par tfwyzu karty hoey ، asal dayta frym kay sath trmym ki hogi haay۔niay kalm kay nam۔ aap apnay mtalwbha kalm nam ki tbdylywn sy mlnay kay liye niay_ kalm_ nam ki lght main trmym krsktay hayn۔nwt karain keh aap ko sirf un kalmwn ko shaml karnay ki zurwrt hay jn ka nam aap lght main namzad karna chahti hain ، kesi bhi kalmwn ko chhwra kar jsay aap tbdyl karna chahti hayn۔ nam tbdyl karnay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ، aap kalmwn ko aasany sy kesi dayta frym main nam tbdyl krsktay hain takha un ko mazeed wzuahaty ya sydh main laiyn۔apnay tjzayha ki zurwryat kay sath۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm ki mjmway fysad ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym sy kalm chhwranay kay l you ، aap darap () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔darap () ka tarykha aap ko un kay namwn ya pwzayshnwn ki wzuahat krkay ayk ya zayada kalmwn ko hatanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yhaan kuch nktaha nzar hayn: nam kay lhaaza sy kalm darap kryn: aap mtalkha kalmwn ko hatanay kay liye darap () kay tarykha kar main ayk hi kalm ka nam ya kalm kay namwn ki fharst fraham krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'shhar': [[[shhar ': [[28 ، 35 ، 42]'nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ayk hi kalm day ayf = df.drop ('amr' ، mhawr = 1)# darap ayk sy zayada kalm ays day ayf = df.drop (darap karain (۔kalm kay nam 'amr' ، 'nam' ، aur 'sty' kay sath dayta frym day ayf pr۔mhawr = 1 pyramytr yeh wazuha krta hay keh kalm ghraiay jaiyn۔ntyjay main dayta frym main koi kalm nahin hawta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'shhar': [[[shhar ': [[28 ، 35 ، 42]'nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# kalm bazaria pwzayshn day ayf = df.drop (df.columons [[1 ، 2]] ، mhawr = 1)# dasplayntyjay main dayta frym prnt (day ayf) aaؤt pt: kapy kwda ka nam 0 jan 1 aymly 2 ryanyn is msaal kay tawr par ، darap () ka tarykha dayta frym day ayf par kal kalm pyramytr kay sath kya jata hay js main DF.COLLUMS [[1 ، 2]] par syt kya jata haay۔yha kalm 1 aur 2 (kalm 'amr' aur 'shhar') par kalmwn ko ghrata haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym sirf 'nam' kalm brkrar rkhta haay۔ mnasb pyramytrza kay sath darap () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ، aap kalmwn ko dayta frym sy hata saktay hain aur un kalmwn kay baghair ayk nya dayta frym haasal krsktay hayn۔yad rakhien keh ntyjha ko dayta frym ya kesi niay mtghyr ko trmym shuda dayta frym par kbzuha karnay kay liye waps tfwyzu kryn۔

Question: dayta frym main do kalmwn kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn aur ntyjha ki bnyad par ayk nya kalm bnaiyn۔
Answer: dayta frym main ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalna dayta tjzayha aur pry prwsysngh ka ayk aham kdm haay۔pandaas ghmshdha akdar ko mؤsar tarykay sy snbhalnay kay liye mtadd tarykay mhaya krta haay۔yhaan kuch aam tknykyn hayn: ghmshdha akdar ki janch pratal: aap dayta frym main ghmshdha akdar ki nshandhay karnay kay liye isnull () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yha asal ki tarah ayk hi shkl ka dayta frym lwtata hay ، jahan hr kdr drst hay agar asal dayta frym main mtalkha kymt ghaib hay ، aur dusri sawrt main ghalat haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# ghmshdha kdrwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn = {'nam': ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، koi bhi nahin ، 'lndaa'] ، 'amr': [28 ، koi nahin ، 42 ، 50] ، 'sty': ['nywyark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls' ، koi bhi nhayn]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ghmshdha valuessissing_values = df.isnull ()# ghmshdha wylyw prnt kay sath dayta frym dasplay kryn.ntyjay main dayta frym ، laptha_walyws ، hr syl main ghmshdha akdar (sch) ya nan msngh akdar (ghlta) ki mwjwdghy ki nshandhay krta haay۔ ghmshdha akdar ko ghhwmna: aap ktaarwn ya kalmwn ko hatanay kay liye darapna () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hain js main ghmshdha akdar hayn۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، darapna () kam aza kam ayk ghmshdha kymt par mushtamil kesi bhi ktaar ko ghrata haay۔as kay bjaiay kalm chhwranay kay liye aap mhawr pyramytr ki bhi wzuahat krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# ghmshdha kdrwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn = {'nam': ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، koi bhi nahin ، 'lndaa'] ، 'amr': [28 ، koi nahin ، 42 ، 50] ، 'sty': ['nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls' ، koi bhi nhayn]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ghmshdha kdrwn kay sath ktarha ktarha= df.dropna (mhawr = 1)# ntyjay main dayta fyms prnt (df_dropped_rows) prnt (df_dropped_colums) aaؤt pt ko dasplay kryn: SQLCOPY kwda ka nam amr sty 0 jan 28.0 nyw yarklys kwpy kwdaptaiy dayta fymkwlwmza: [0 ، 1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 3 ، 3 ، 1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 3msaal kay tawr par ، darapna () do bar astamal kya jata haay: ayk bar mhawr pyramytr (phalay sy taay shuda slwk ktaarwn main kami krta haay) ki wzuahat kyay baghair ، aur ayk bar kalmwn ko chhwranay kay liye mhawr = 1 kay sath۔ntyjay main dayta fymza ، DF_DROPPED_ROWS aur DF_DROPPED_COLUMNS ، koi ghmshdha akdar par mushtamil nahin hayn۔ ghmshdha akdar ko pora krna: aap ghmshdha akdar ko mkhsawsa akdar kay sath tbdyl karnay kay liye flna () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap ghmshdha akdar ko mstkl kymt ، kalm kay wsta ya wsta ، ya aaghay/psmandha bhrnay sy bhr saktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# ghmshdha kdrwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn = {'nam': ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، koi bhi nahin ، 'lndaa'] ، 'amr': [28 ، koi nahin ، 42 ، 50] ، 'shhar': ['nywyark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls

Question: kalm main ghmshdha akdar ki tadad ki bnyad par dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym main addy kalmwn kay liye wzuahaty aadadwshmar ki ghnty karnay kay l you ، aap byan () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔byan () tarykha hr addy kalm kay liye mkhtlf smry aadadwshmar tyar krta hay ، js main ghnty ، mtalb ، mayary anharaf ، kam sy kam ، kwartail aur zayada sy zayada shaml hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: py day kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# addy kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn = {'nam': ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'tnkhwaha': [50000 ، 70000 ، 60000]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# kmpywt wzuahaty aadadwshmar kay aadadwshmar = df.describe ()# wzuahaty aadadwshmar prnt (aadadwshmar) aaؤt pt: shyl kapy kwda amr sylary akaؤnt 3.000000MEAN 35.0000MEAN 35.0000MEAN 35.0000MEAN 35.0000MEAN 35.0000MEAN 35.0000MEAN 35.0000MEAN 35.0000MEAN 35.0000MEAN 35.0000MEAN 35.0000MEAN 35.0000meankm sy kam 28.000000 50000.00000025 ٪ 31.500000 55000.00000050 ٪ 35.000000 60000.00000075 ٪ 38.500000 65000.000000max 42.000000000000000000 is msaal kay tawr par ، byan () ka tarykha dayta frym day ayf par blaya gaya haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym ، aadad wa shmar ، hr addy kalm kay liye wzuahaty aadadwshmar par mushtamil hayn۔aadadwshmar main ghnty (ghyr msngh akdar ki tadad) ، mtalb ، mayary anharaf ، kam sy kam kymt ، kwartail (25 wain ، 50 wain ، aur 75 wain fysad) ، aur zayada sy zayada kymt shaml hayn۔ byan () tarykha ka astamal karty hoey ، aap jldy sy ayk jaizaha haasal krsktay hayn۔aap kay dayta frym main addy kalmwn ki mrkzay rjhaan ، bazay aur tksym ka۔

Question: dayta frym main dayt taim akdar kay kalm ko haftay kay dn main tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main ، ghrwp baiy () fnkshn dayta frym par ghrwp bndy ki karrwaiywn ko anjam denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ghrwp baiy () fnkshn aap ko ayk ya zayada kalmwn ki bnyad par ghrwpwn main dayta frym tksym karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، aur phir hr ghrwp main mjmway ya tbdyly kay afaal ka atalak krta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan' ، 'aymly' ، 'jan'] ، 'shhar': ['nyw yark'.awr kmpywt ka mtalb tnkhwaha ghrwp = df.groupby ('name')۔ mtalb ()# ghrwpda dayta frym prnt (ghrwpda) aaؤt pt ko dasplay kryn: mark daawn kapy kwda sylry nam aymly 65000 jan 57500ryan 55000in is msaal kay tawr par ، ghrwp baiy () fnkshn ko dayta fym day ayf par blaya gaya haay۔kalm ka nam 'nam'۔yha 'nam' kalm main anwkhy akdar kay zaryaha dayta frym ko ghrwp krta haay۔as kay ntyjay main shay ، ghrwpda ، ayk nya dayta frym hay jahan ktaar ko alag alag namwn kay zaryaha ghrwp kya jata hay ، aur hr ghrwp ki awsta tnkhwaha ki ghnty ki jati haay۔ aap ghrwp baiy () fnkshn main kalm kay namwn ki fharst fraham krkay mtadd kalmwn kay zaryaha bhi ghrwp krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: paiythwn kwpy kwdaghrwpda = df.groupby (['nam' ، 'shhar'])nam aur shhar۔ ayk bar aap nay dayta frym ko ghrwp kya hay ، aap ghrwpwn par mkhtlf ajtmaay afaal ka atalak krsktay hain ، jesay mtalb () ، rkm () ، ghnty () ، mnt () ، zayada sy zayada () ، wghyrha۔ya hr ghrwp par dusray hasabat anjam dyn۔ ghrwpngh pandawn main ayk taaktwr aapryshn hay jo aap ko mkhtlf zamrwn ya kalmwn kay amtzaaj par mbny dayta ka tjzayha aur khlasaha karnay ki shawlt dyta haay۔

Question: kesi dusray kalm main wzan kay btawr dayta frym main mtadd kalmwn main akdar kay wzan waly rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym kay hr ansar par kesi fnkshn ko laghw karnay kay l you ، aap atalak () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔atalak () tarykha aap ko kesi dayta frym ki ktaar ya kalmwn kay sath kesi fnkshn ka atalak karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، ya yahan tak keh hr frd ansar par bhy۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'tnkhwaha': [[[28 ، 35 ، 42]50000 ، 60000 ، 55000]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# dayf dabl_ wylyw (x) ko laghw karnay kay liye kesi fnkshn ki wzuahat kryn: 2 * x waps lwtaiyn۔.phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، drkhwast dyn () hr kalm par fnkshn ka atalak karty hain ، hr kalm ko syryza kay tawr par alaj karty hayn۔fnkshn dabl_wylyw hr ansar ki kdr ko dwghna karnay kay liye byan kya gaya haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym ، DF_APPLIED ، main asal dayta frym kay anasar par mushtamil hawta hay js ka atalak hawta haay۔ agar aap ktaarwn kay sath kesi fnkshn ka atalak karna chahti hain tou ، aap mhawr = 1 ko laghw () tarykha main trtyb dy saktay hain ().kha aap jo fnkshn lghatay hain woh ayk blt un fnkshn ، lymbdaa fnkshn ، ya saarf ki wzuahat shuda fnkshn hawskta haay۔atalak () tarykha dayta frym anasar par afaal ko laghw karnay main lchk fraham krta hay ، js sy aap apnay dayta par apni mrzuy kay mtaabk aapryshn aur tbdylywn ko anjam denay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔

Question: kesi haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym kay kalm main akdar ko tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main ayk ya zayada kalmwn kay zaryaha dayta frym ko trtyb denay kay l you ، aap trtyb_awlywza () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔trtyb_awlywza () ka tarykha aap ko ayk ya zayada kalmwn ko trtyb denay aur trtyb denay kay aardar (chrahnay ya atrnay) ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan' ، 'lndaa'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42 ، 50]..phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، trtyb_walywza () mkhsawsa kalm ki bnyad par chrahaiy kay aardar main dayta frym ko trtyb dyta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym ، chhantya_dayf ، 'tnkhwaha' kalm kay zaryaha chrahaiy trtyb main trtyb diya gaya haay۔ dayta frym ko nzawly trtyb main trtyb denay kay l you ، aap chrahtay hoey = ghalat ko trtyb_awlywza () kay tarykha kar main mntkl krsktay hayn: paiytwn kwpy kwdaswrtda_dayf = day ayf.swrt_walys ('tnkhwaha' ، 'tnkhwaha'chrahaiy = ghlta) aap trtyb_ wylywza () kay tarykha kar ko kalm kay namwn ki fharst fraham krkay mtadd kalmwn kay zaryaha bhi trtyb dy saktay hayn: paiythwn kwpy kwdaswrtda_dayf = day ayf.swrt_walywza (['nam' ، 'amr']) is sy pehlay dayta frym ko trtyb dyta hay '۔nam 'kalm aur phr' amr 'kalm kay zaryaha ، dono chrahaiy kay hakm myn۔ trtyb_awlywza () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ، aap ayk ya zayada kalmwn ki bnyad par kesi mkhsawsa trtyb main kesi dayta frym ki ktaar ka bndwbst krsktay hayn۔trtyb shuda dayta frym ko kesi niay mtghyr main mhafwza kya jaskta hay ya asal dayta frym ko waps tfwyzu kya jaskta haay۔

Question: ayk dayta frym main mtadd kalmwn kay zaryaha ghrwp krdha kalm main akdar ki rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main ، aap anzumam () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey do dayta frymwn ko zum ya shaml krsktay hayn۔anzumam () fnkshn ayk aam kalm ya andayks ki bnyad par do ya zayada dayta frymwn sy ktaarwn ko jwrata haay۔yha kiy ksm kay shaml hony ki frahamy krta hay ، jesay andrwny shmwlyt ، baien shmwlyt ، dien shmwlyt ، aur byrwny shmwlyt۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY CODEMPORT pandaas PD# pehlay dayta frymyta 1 = {'ID' bnaiyn: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4] ، 'nam': ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan' ، 'lndaa'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42 ، 50]} df1 = pd.dataframe (dayta 1)# dusra dayta frymyta 2 = {'id' bnaiyn: [2 ، 3 ، 5] ، 'tnkhwaha': [60000 ،55000 ، 65000] ، 'shhar': ['shkaghw' ، 'nyw yark' ، 'las aynjls']} DF2 = pd.dataframe (dayta 2)# 'ID' kalm myjrda_dayf = PD.Merge (DF1 par mbny dayta fymza ko zum kryn.fnkshn ko dayta frymza DF1 aur DF2 par blaya jata hay ، js main 'ID' kalm ko zum karnay kay liye aam kalm kay tawr par byan kya jata haay۔ks tarah = 'andrwny' pyramytr ayk andrwny shmwlyt ki wzuahat krta hay ، js kay ntyjay main sirf aam ktaaryn mrbwta dayta frym main shaml hawty hayn۔ntyjay main dayta frym ، zum shdha_day ayf ، 'ID' kalm par mbny dono dayta frymwn kay zum shuda dayta par mushtamil haay۔ aap pyramytr ko tbdyl krkay dusri ksm kay shaml bhi krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، kis tarah = 'baiyn' baien bazaw ko anjam dyta hay ، kis tarah = 'daiyn' dien shmwlyt ko anjam dyta hay ، aur kis tarah = 'byrwny' byrwny shmwlyt ko anjam dyta haay۔pyramytr prmsaal kay tawr pr: paiythwn kwpy kwdaymrjda_ day ayf = py day.mryj (day ayf 1 ، day ayf 2 ، aan = ['aaiy day' ، 'sty'] ، kesay = 'andrwny') yeh 'ID' aur 'sty' kalm dono par andrwny shmwlyt ka mzaaharha krta haay۔/dayta frymwn main shaml hona aap ko mshtrkha akdar ki bnyad par mkhtlf zaraia sy dayta aktha karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، js sy aap ko mazeed tjzayha ya prwsysngh kay liye ayk msthakm daytasyt bnanay kay kabl bnata haay۔

Question: dayta frym ko ays kyw aylait dayta bys tybl main tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main ، aap mhawr () ya pywt_tybl () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym ko mhawr krsktay hayn۔jb aap kesi ayk kalm main akdar ki bnyad par dayta frym ko niy shkl dena chahti hain tou mhawr () fnkshn ka astamal kya jata hay ، jabky jab aap mhawr kay doran aadad wa shmar ko jma karna chahti hain tou pywt_tybl () fnkshn astamal kya jata haay۔yhaan mhawr () kay astamal ki ayk msaal haay: PD## kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas ayk dayta frymyta = {'tarykh' bnaiyn: ['2021-01-01' ، '2021-01-02' ، '2021-01' ، '2021-01' ، '2021-01-02 '] ،' shhar ': [' nywyark '،' nyw yark '،' las aynjls '،' las aynjls '] ،' drjha harart ': [32 ، 30 ، 75 ، 77] ،' nmy': [80 ، 85 ، 45 ، 50]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)#' sty 'kalm pyywwtda_dayf = df.pivot (andayks =' tarykh '، kalm =' shhar '، akdar = par mbny dayta frym par mhawr'drjha harart')# dasplay dasplayda dayta fym prnt (Pivoted_DF) aaؤt pt: SQLCOPY Codecity las aynjls nyw yark dayt 2021-01-01 75 322021-01-02 77 30in is msaal kay tawr par ، Pivot () fnkshn ko dayta fym DF par blaya jata hay 'kay sath' 'tarykh 'kalm andayks kay tawr par mkhsawsa ،' sty 'kalm kalm kay tawr par mkhsawsa kya gaya hay ، awr' drjha harart 'kalm akdar kay tawr par mkhsawsa haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym ، Pivoted_DF ، ko 'sty' kalm main mnfrd akdar ki bnyad par tbdyl kya jata hay ، js main 'tarykh' kalm kay sath andayks aur mhawr akdar isi drjha harart ki haysayt rkhtay hayn۔ agar aap ayk sy zayada kalmwn ki bnyad par mhawr karna chahti hain ya jma karna chahti hain ya jma karna chahti hayn۔mhawr kay doran ، aap Pivot_table () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal haay: paiytwn kwpy kwdapywwt_tybl = df.pivot_table (andayks = 'tarykh' ، kalm = 'shhar' ، akdar = 'drjha harart' ، Aggfunc = 'mtalb') yeh msaal hr shhar aur tarykh kay amtzaaj kay awsta drjha harart ka hasab lghaty haay۔dayta frym aap ko aadad wa shmar ki sakht ko tbdyl karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، js sy tjzayha karna ya mkhtlf shkl main pysh karna aasan hawjata haay۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm kay mjmway lagh rytrn ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main ، aap astyk () aur ghair astyk () tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main kalmwn ko astyk ya astyk krsktay hayn۔an tarykwn ka astamal aadad wa shmar ko niy shkl denay kay liye kya jata hay ، wsya shkl (ayk sy zayada kalmwn kay sath) aur lmby shkl (ayk hi kalm kay sath) kay darmiyan tbdyl hawta haay۔astyk () aur astyk () kay astamal ki ayk msaal yeh haay: PD## kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam': ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'ryazuy': [90 ، 85، 92] ، 'sains': [88 ، 93 ، 91] ، 'anghryzay': [86 ، 89 ، 90]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# kalmwn ko ayk ksayr staha kay andayks astykda_dayf = day ayf bnanay kay liye kalmwn ko astyk kryn۔Set_index ('nam')۔ astyk ()# astykda dayta fym prnt (astykda_ day ayf) aaؤt pt ko dasplay kryn: ghwkwpy kwda nam jan ryazuy 90 sains 88 anghryzay 88 anghryzay 85 sains 85 sains 93 anghryzay 89ryan ryazuy 92 sains 91 anghryzay 91 anghryzay 90dtype: INT64IN is msaal ، astyk () astyk ()'nam' kalm ko andayks kay tawr par trtyb denay kay bad dayta frym DF par tarykha kar talb kya jata haay۔yha baky kalmwn ko amwdy tawr par dahyr krta hay ، aur dusray drjay kay tawr par asal kalm namwn kay sath mlty lywl andayks tyar krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym ، astykda_ day ayf main ، astykda wylywza kay sath ayk hi kalm haay۔ dayta ko ghair astyk karnay aur isy asal shkl main dwbarha tshkyl denay kay l you ، aap astyk () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn: paiytwn kwpy kwdan astykda_dayf = astykda_dayf.an astyk ()# ghair astyk dayta fym prnt dasplay kryn.as sy aadad wa shmar ko ghair astyk krta hay ، aur isy ayk sy zayada kalmwn kay sath asal wsya farmyt main tbdyl krta haay۔ astyk () aur astyk () ka astamal karty hoey ، aap wsya aur lmby shklwn kay mabyn dayta frym ko niy shkl dy saktay hain ، jo tjzayha ya aadad wa shmar ki kuch aksam kay liye karaamd saabt hawskta haay۔tbdylyan

Question: dayta frym main bahamy mdakhlt krkay ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: dayta frym ko ayk nmy srny main tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap dayta frym ki akdar ki wsaf ko astamal krsktay hayn۔akdar ki wsaf dayta frym kay dayta ki ayk nmy srny nmaindghy lwtata haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'tnkhwaha': [[[28 ، 35 ، 42]50000 ، 60000 ، 55000]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# dayta frym ko ayk numpy arrayarray = df.values main tbdyl karain numpy arrayprint (srny) aaؤt pt ko dasplay kryn: csscopy kwda [['jan' 28 50000] ['ayml''35 60000] [' ryan '42 55000]] is msaal main ، akdar ki wsaf ko dayta frym day ayf ko ayk npy srny main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ntyjay main srny mtghyr main dayta frym kay aadad wa shmar ko do jhaty nypy srny farmyt main shaml kya gaya haay۔ nwt karain keh nmy srny main ayk dayta ki ksm hogi jo dayta frym main tamam mkhtlf ksm ki akdar ko aydajst krty haay۔as maamlay main ، nmy srny main dayta ki ksm ki chyza hawty hay kywnkha is main tar aur addy akdar ka mrkb hawta haay۔aghr dayta frym main mwjwd tamam kalmwn main ayk hi dayta ki ksm hawty hay tou ، ntyjay main nypy srny main is dayta ki ksm hawghy۔ dayta frym ko npy srny main tbdyl karna mfyd saabt hawskta hay agar aap ko addy ghnty anjam denay ki zurwrt ho ya dayta par numpy- mkhsawsa afaal astamal karnay ki zurwrt haw۔

Question: do dayta taim kalmwn kay mabyn frk ki bnyad par dayta frym main nya kalm bnanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main ، aap ryazuy aaprytrza jesay +، -، *، /، aur ٪ ka astamal krkay kalmwn kay mabyn ryazuy ki karrwaiywn ko anjam dy saktay hayn۔yha aaprytrza dayta frym kay kalmwn par ansar kay lhaaza sy kam karty hain ، kalmwn kay mtalkha anasar kay mabyn aapryshn anjam dytay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PD## AS PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'A': [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4] ، 'B': [5 ، 6 ، 7 ، 8] ، 'C': [9 ، [9 ، bnaiyn10 ، 11 ، 12]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta) # kalm ays day ayf ['Sum'] = df ['a'] + df ['b'] # azuafy day ayf ['frk'] = df [kay darmiyan ryazuy ki karrwaiywn ko anjam dyn۔'c'] - df ['a'] # ghhtaؤ ondf ['product'] = df ['b'] * df ['c'] # zurb ['dawyzen'] = df ['c'] / df ['B '] # dawyzen day ayf [' madaywls '] = DF [' C '] ٪ DF [' B '] # madaywls # kmpywtda kalm prnt (DF) aaؤt pt kay sath dayta frym dasplay kryn: ryazuy ka kwda A B C SUM frk prwdakt dawyzen Modulus0 1 5 96 8 45 1.8 41 2 6 10 8 8 60 1.6666667 42 3 7 11 10 8 77 1.571429 43 4 8 12 12 8 96 1.5 4in is msaal kay tawr par ، dayta frym day ayf kay kalmwn kay mabyn ryazuy ki karrwaiy ki jati haay۔as kay ntyjay main akdar dayta frym main niay kalmwn ko tfwyzu ki hogi hayn: 'rkm' ، 'frk' ، 'prwdakt' ، 'dawyzen' ، aur 'madaywls'۔ryazuy kay aaprytrza +، -، *، /، aur ٪ ko baltrtyb azuafay ، ghhtaؤ ، zurb ، tksym ، aur madaywls aapryshnza kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔) ، NP.EXP () ، ya NP.SQRT ()۔ryazuy kay kamwn ko nmy afaal kay sath jwra kar ، aap dayta frym kalmwn par wsya pymanay par hasab ktab anjam dy saktay hayn۔ dayta frym main kalmwn kay mabyn ryazuy ki karrwaiywn ko bhatr bnata hay tou aap mwjwdha aadad wa shmar ki bnyad par niy bsayrt aur kmpywt sy haasal krdha mkdar ko haasal karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm main mnfrd akdar ki frykwiynsy ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: mwjwdha kalmwn par mbny dayta frym main nya kalm bnanay kay l you ، aap kesi kdr ko tfwyzu krsktay hain ya dayta frym kay kalm par kesi fnkshn ka atalak krsktay hayn۔as ko pora karnay kay liye kuch tarykay yeh hayn: braha rast ayk kdr tfwyzu kryn: paiythwn kwpy kwdadaf ['nyw kalm'] = mwjwdha kalmwn kay mabyn wylyw prfarm ryazuy ki karrwaiywn: paiythwn kwpy kwdadaf ['nyw klwn'] = day ayf ['kalm 1'] + day ayf ['kalm 2']mwjwdha kalmwn par ayk fnkshn ka atalak kryn: paiytwn kwpy kwdaydaf My_function (ktaar): # mwjwdha kalmwn par mbny niy kdr ki ghnty karnay kay liye mntak rzalt day ayf ['nyw klwn "] = df.apply (my_function ، mhawr = 1) yahan ayk msaal hay jo un nktaha nzar ko zaahar krty haay۔py day kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'tnkhwaha': [50000 ، 60000 ،55000]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ayk nya kalm day ayf bnanay kay liye braha rast ayk kymt tfwyzu karain ['bwns'] = 1000# kalmwn kay mabyn ryazuy ka aapryshn anjam dyn ayk nya kalm day ayf bnanay kay liye ['mkml tawr pr'] = DF ['tnkhwaha'] + day ayf ['bwns']# mwjwdha kalm ays day ay ayf tyks_amaؤnt (ktaar) par mbny ayk nya kalm bnanay kay liye ayk fnkshn ka atalak kryn: agar ktaar ['tnkhwaha']> 50000: wapsy ktaar ['tnkhwaha'] * 0.2 dyghr: wapsy ki ktaar ['tnkhwaha'] * 0.1df ['tyks'] = df.apply (tyks_amaؤnt ، mhawr = 1)# niay kalm prnt (day ayf) aaؤt pt kay sath dayta frym dasplay kryn: yaml kwpy kwda ka nam amr ki tnkhwaha bwns mkml tawr par tyks 0 jan 28 50000 1000 5000.01aymly 35 60000 1000 61000 12000.02 ryan 42 55000 1000 56000 11000.0.0 is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk nya kalm 'bwns' 1000 ki mstkl kymt tfwyzu krkay tyar kya gaya haay۔ 'tnkhwaha' kay mabyn ryazuy kay aml ko anjam dy kar ayk aur nya kalm 'mkml kala' tkhlyk kya gaya haay۔kalm aur 'bwns' kalm۔aakhr main ، mhawr = 1 kay sath laghw () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym ki hr saf main tyks_awmaؤnt () fnkshn ka atalak krkay ayk nya kalm 'tyks' tshkyl diya jata haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym day ayf main niay bnaiay gaye kalmwn kay sath asal kalm shaml hayn۔ mwjwdha kalmwn par mbny niay kalm bnana ، aap apnay dayta frym main mwjwd dayta sy azuafy bsayrt ya kmpywt haasal krdha mkdar haasal krsktay hayn۔

Question: "mkhtlf tarykh ki shklwn ko snbhaltay hoey ، dayta frym main daayt taim aabjykt main tar kay kalm ko tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔"

Question: kesi dusray kalm ko wzan kay btawr astamal karty hoey kesi dayta frym main kalm kay wzan waly wsta ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandaas dayta taim dayta ko mwsar andaza main snbhalnay kay liye mkhtlf fnkshnlyan mhaya krta haay۔pandawn main dayt taim dayta kay sath kam karnay kay liye kuch aam karwaiyan aur tknyk yeh hayn: dawr ko dayt taim main tbdyl krna: agar aap ka dayt taim dayta astrngh farmyt main hay tou ، aap isy dayt taim farmyt main tbdyl karnay kay liye tw_dayt taim () fnkshn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔farmyt pyramytr ki wzuahat krkay ، aap un pt strngh ki shkl ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ajzaaa: aap dayt taim kalm kay mkhtlf ajzaaa nkal saktay hain ، jesay sal ، mhaynha ، dn ، ghhntha ، mnt ، aur dusra ، day ty ayksysr daat pythwn kwpy kwdadaf ['sal'] = day ayf ['tarykh']۔ dt.yeardf['mhaynha'] = df ['tarykh']ayk mkhsawsa tadd par mbny mjmway ya daawn sympl dayta ، jesay ghhntha ، rwzaanha ، mahaanha ، wghyrha۔ pythwn kwpy kwdadaf_rysmplda = df.resample ('d')۔ rkm () # rwzaanha tadd aur rkm ki kymtwn main dwbarha nmwnha: aap tarykhwn ko mntkl krsktay hayn۔shft () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk dayt taim kalm ko aaghay ya pychhay ki tarf۔yha wkt kay akhtlafat ka hasab lghanay ya pychhay reh janay waly mtghyrat bnanay kay l useful mfyd saabt hawskta haay۔tarykh ki hadwd ، aap mwazanha aaprytrza kay sath bwlyn andayksngh ka astamal krsktay hayn۔aaprytr ka astamal karty hawiay۔ntyjha ayk taim daylta aabjykt hay ، jo do tarykhwn ya awkat kay darmiyan frk ki nmaindghy krta haay۔taim zawn sy wakf dayt taim kalmwn ko tbdyl karnay aur taim zawn kay tbadlwn ko anjam denay kay tawr pr۔ pythwn kwpy kwdadaf ['dayt taim'] = day ayf ['dayt taim']['dayt taim']laibryry dayt taim dayta ko jwra twra ، tjzayha karnay aur dykhnay kay liye wsya salahaytwn ko fraham krty hay ، js sy aap ko nfys karwaiyan anjam denay aur wkt par mbny daytasyts sy kymty bsayrt haasal karnay kay kabl bnata haay۔

Question: thakykaty aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha (ay day aay) kya hay aur dayta tjzayha main yeh kyon aham haay؟
Answer: pandawn main ، aap mtadd tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey dwtwk mtghyr ko addy akdar main tbdyl krsktay hayn۔yhaan tyn aam tarykay hayn: lybl ankwdangh: lybl ankwdangh ayk mtghyr mtghyr main hr anwkhay zamray ko ayk anwkha addy lybl tfwyzu krta haay۔asklrn ki lyblynkwdar klas۔ pryprwsysngh madaywl ko lybl ankwdangh kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ayk ghrm ankwdangh ayk mtghyr mtghyr main hr anwkhay zamray kay liye bainry kalm bnata haay۔pandaas ayk ghrm ankwdangh ko anjam denay kay liye get_dummies () fnkshn mhaya krta haay۔yha nkshha () fnkshn.pythwn kwpy kwda mypngh = {'zamrha 1': 0 ، 'zamrha 2': 1 ، 'zamrha 3': 2} day ayf ['ankwdada kalm'] = day ayf ['zamrha dar kalm'] ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔ nkshha (mypngh (mypngh (mypngh (mypngh) hr tarykha kay apnay fwaid aur thafzaat hayn۔lybl ankwdangh zamray kay mabyn aam talkat ko mhafwza rkhty hay lekin ghair aalanyha aardaynty ko mtaarf kar sakti haay۔ayk ghrm ankwdangh aardaynty kay msail sy ghryza krty hay lekin kalmwn ki ayk bray tadad ka baasa bn sakti haay۔kstm mypngh aap ko mypngh ko wazuha tawr par byan karnay ki ajazat dyty hay lekin dsty tfsaylat ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ yeh zurwry hay keh aap kay zamrha jat ki nwayt aur aap kay tjzayay ki zurwryat ki bnyad par mnasb tarykha ka antkhab kryn۔an awaml par ghwr karain jesay mnfrd zamrwn ki tadad ، aardaynty ki mwjwdghy ، aur is kay bad kay tjzayha ya mshyn lrnngh madal par asarat۔

Question: aap azaghr main ay day aay kay liye zurwry laibryrywn ko kesay draamd karty hayn؟
Answer: pandawn main CSV fail main dayta frym ko bchanay kay l you ، aap TO_CSV () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'tnkhwaha': [[[28 ، 35 ، 42]50000 ، 60000 ، 55000]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# dayta frym ko CSV fiderf.to_csv ('aaؤt pt sy ays wy' ، andayks = ghlta) main mhafwza karain ، is msaal main ، TO_CSV () kay tarykha kar ko dayta frym par blaya gaya haay۔day ayf۔phala pyramytr fail ka rastha ya fail ka nam hay jahan aap CSV fail ko mhafwza karna chahti hayn۔as maamlay main ، hum isy 'aaؤt pt sy ays wy' kay tawr par mhafwza karty hayn۔andayks pyramytr ko CSV fail sy andayks kalm ko kharj karnay kay liye ghalat par syt kya gaya haay۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، kalm kay nam CSV fail main pehli saf kay tawr par shaml kyay jien ghay۔ is kwda ko chlanay kay bad ، mwjwdha wrkngh daairktry main 'aaؤt pt sy ays wy' namy ayk fail bnaiy jaye gi ، js main CSV farmyt main dayta frym kay dayta par mushtamil haay۔aap apni zurwryat ki bnyad par azuafy pyramytrza ، jesay daylymytr ، haydar ، ankwdangh ، aur dyghr ki wzuahat krkay TO_CSV () kay tarykha kar ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bna saktay hayn۔ksy dayta frym ko kesi CSV fail main mhafwza karnay kay liye dstyab akhtyarat kay baray main mazeed malwmat kay liye pandaas dstawyzaat ka hawalha dyn۔

Question: ay day aay kay liye aap daytasyt ko pandaas dayta frym main kesay lwda karty hayn؟
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym main sy ays wy fail sy dayta prahnay kay l you ، aap ryda_ sy ays wy () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY CODEMPORT Pandas jesay PD# CSV fail sy dayta ko DATAFRAMEDF = PD.READ_CSV ('data.csv') main prahyn is msaal main ، READ_CSV () fnkshn kaha jata hay ، aur pehla pyramytr fail ka rastha haay۔ya CSV fail ka fail nam jo aap prahna chahti hayn۔as maamlay main ، hum frzu karty hain keh fail ka nam 'data.csv'.ped dayfalt kay zaryaha rakha gaya hay ، Read_csv () frzu krta hay keh CSV fail main kalm kay namwn kay sath haydar ktaar hay ، aur is main akdar ko alag karnay kay liye kwma (،) ko daymymytr kay tawr par astamal kya jata haay۔har saf mynaghr aap ki CSV fail main ayk mkhtlf daymymytr hay tou ، aap isy daymymytr ya ays ay py pyramytr ka astamal karty hoey ، jesay pd.read_csv ('data.csv' ، daylymytr = '؛') astamal krkay is ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ksy mtghyr ko tfwyzu karain ، is maamlay main ، day ayf۔as kay bad aap pandaas ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym par mkhtlf aapryshnza aur tjzayay anjam dy saktay hayn۔ agar sy ays wy fail main koi haydar ktaar nahin hay tou ، aap haydar pyramytr ko kesi ko bhi syt nahin krsktay hain aur bad main kalm kay namwn ko dsty tawr par tfwyzu krsktay hain ، ya aap nam pyramytr ka astamal karty hoey kalm kay namwn ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، jysaypd.read_csv ('data.csv' ، haydar = koi nahin ، nam = ['Col1' ، 'Col2' ، 'Col3'])۔ azuafy tawr par ، pandaas mkhtlf CSV fail farmyts ko snbhalnay kay liye bohat sy dusray akhtyarat fraham krta hay ، jesay ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalna۔، kalmwn kay liye dayta ki aksam ki wzuahat karna ، aur bohat kchh۔sy ays wy failwn ko dayta frym main prahnay kay liye dstyab akhtyarat kay baray main mazeed malwmat kay l You aap pandaas dstawyzaat ka hawalha dy saktay hayn۔

Question: aap dayta frym kay tawl wa arzu (ktaar aur kalm) ko kis tarah chyk karty hayn؟
Answer: dayta frym main aaؤt lyirza ko snbhalna mkhtlf tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔yhaan kuch aam nktaha nzar hayn: aaؤt lyirza ki nshandhay krna: pehlay ، apnay dayta frym main aaؤt lyirza ki shnakht karna zurwry haay۔aaؤt lyirza ka ptha lghanay kay l You aap aadad wa shmar kay tarykwn ، tsawr ، ya dawmyn kay alm ka astamal krsktay hayn۔kchh aam tarykwn main shaml hayn: baks plat: baks platwn ka astamal karty hoey hr addy kalm ki tksym ka tsawr karain aur wswswn sy bahar kesi bhi nkat ko mmknha aaؤt lyirza kay tawr par shnakht kryn۔ayk zayda skwr kesi khasa dhalyza (jysay ، 3) kay tawr par aaؤt lyirza daat aai kyw aar (antrkwrtail rynj) kay awpr: hr addy kalm kay liye aai kyw aar ka hasab lghaiyn aur kesi khasa had sy bahar pwaints par ghwr karain (jysay IQR 1.5 ghna)aaؤt lyirza: ayk bar jab aaؤt lyirza ki nshandhay hawjaty hay tou ، aap un ko hatanay ya apnay dayta frym sy fltr karnay ka antkhab krsktay hayn۔taham ، yeh zurwry hay keh aap apnay dayta aur tjzayha par aaؤt lyirza ko hatanay kay asarat par ghwr sy ghwr kryn۔aaؤt lyirza ko hatana kymty malwmat kay zuaia hony ya aap kay tjzayay ko tasab ka baasa bn sakta haay۔aghr aap aaؤt lyirza ko hatanay ka fysalha karty hain tou ، aap aaؤt lyirza par mushtamil ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay liye darap () tarykha ya bwlyn andayksngh ka astamal krsktay hayn۔۔as sy mjmway tksym ko mhafwza rkhtay hoey bahar janay walon kay asar wa rswkh ko kam karnay main mdd mlty haay۔aap addy kalm main aaؤt lyirza ko jytnay kay liye scipy.stats.mstats.winsore () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔day ayf ['wnswraizada kalm'] = wnswraizada_ wylyw astraansfarmyshn: kuch maamlat main ، aap kay dayta main ryazuy ki tbdylywn ka atalak karnay sy bahar janay walon kay asarat ko kam karnay main mdd mil sakti haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap anthaaiy akdar kay asar wa rswkh ko kam karnay kay liye kalm kay lwghrthm ya mrba rwt la saktay hayn۔aap mzubwta aadadwshmar kay tarykwn ka astamal krsktay hain jo bahar janay walon kay liye kam hasas hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap wsta ko mrkzay rjhaan ki pymaish kay tawr par astamal krsktay hayn۔dayta ، aap kay tjzayay ka syak wa sbak ، aur aap kay mnsawbay kay ahadaf۔ahatyata ka astamal karna zurwry hay aur aap kay dayta aur is kay bad kay tjzaywn par aaؤt lyir hayndalngh tknyk kay asarat ka bghwr jaizaha lena zurwry haay۔

Question: dayta ka jaizaha lenay kay liye aap dayta frym ki pehli chnd ktaaryn kesay zaahar karty hayn؟
Answer: pandawn main ، aap Pivot_table () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ayk paiywt tybl tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔ayk mhawr tybl aap ko ayk ya zayada kalmwn ki bnyad par aadad wa shmar ka khlasaha aur mjmway dayta ki ajazat dyta hay ، js sy aadad wa shmar ki kras tyblwlyshn mil jati haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD## ayk dayta frymyta = {'zamrha' bnaiyn: ['a' ، 'b' ، 'a' ، 'b' ، 'a' ، 'b'] ، 'aaitm': [[['x' ، 'x' ، 'y' ، 'Y' ، 'z' ، 'z'] ، 'kdr': [10 ، 15 ، 20 ، 25 ، 30 ، 35]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ayk Pivot tablepivot_table = df.pivot_table (index = 'zamrha' ، kalm = 'aaitm' ، akdar = 'wylyw' ، Aggfunc = 'rkm') bnaiyn ، is msaal main ، Pivot_table () fnkshn dayta frym DF par blaya gaya haay۔andayks pyramytr kalm (zabanyn) ki wzuahat krta hay js kay ntyjay main pywt tybl kay asharyha kay tawr par astamal kya jaye ، kalm pyramytr kalm (zabanyn) ki wzuahat krta hay jo mhawr ki jdwl kay kalmwn kay tawr par astamal hawta hay ، aur akdar pyramytr kalm ki wzuahat krta haay۔mjmway aur khlasaha۔ mzakwrha kwda main ، hum 'zamrha' kay sath andayks kay sath ayk mhawr tybl tyar karty hain ، kalm kay tawr par 'aaitm' ، aur akdar kay tawr par 'kdr' karty hayn۔Aggfunc pyramytr 'rkm' par syt kya gaya hay ، is bat ka asharha hay keh mhawr tybl main akdar 'wylyw' kalm main mtalkha akdar ka mjmwaha honi chahaiay۔ ntyjay main mhawr tybl main 'zamrha' andayks ، 'aaitm' kay tawr par hawgha۔kalm ، aur mjmway akdar ko tybl ki kdr kay tawr pr۔ksy bhi ghmshdha akdar ko pehlay sy taay shuda tawr par nan sy bhr diya jaye gha۔ aap azuafy pyramytrza ki wzuahat krkay Pivot_table () fnkshn ko mazeed apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnasktay hain ، jesay ayk mkhsawsa kdr kay sath ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karnay kay liye Fil_value ، sbtwtl aur ghrynda kal ktaarwn/kalmwn ko shaml karnay kay liye marjn ، aur dyghr shaml hayn۔، aap ki zurwryat ki bnyad pr۔mhawr ki myzayn bnanay kay liye dstyab akhtyarat kay baray main mazeed malwmat kay liye pandaas dstawyzaat ka hawalha dyn۔

Question: aap dayta frym main hr kalm kay dayta ki aksam ko kis tarah chyk karty hayn؟
Answer: dayta frym main kalmwn kay mabyn artbata ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap pandawn main kwr () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PD## AS PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'kalm 1': [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] ، 'kalm 2': [2 ، 4 ، 6 ، 8 ، 10] ، 'kalm 3' bnaiyn۔: [3 ، 6 ، 9 ، 12 ، 15]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# artbata mytrkskwrylyshn_mytrks = df.corr () ka hasab lghaiyn is msaal main ، kwr () tarykha ko dayta frym day ayf par kaha jata haay۔kwr () ka tarykha dayta frym kay kalmwn kay mabyn jwraay kay artbata ka hasab lghata haay۔ is kay ntyjay main artbata mytrks ayk dayta frym hay jahan hr syl do kalmwn kay mabyn artbata kay ghtank ki nmaindghy krta haay۔artbata kay ghtank ki had -1 sy 1 tak hawty hay ، jahan -1 ayk kaml mnfy artbata ki nshandhay krta hay ، 1 ayk kaml msabt artbata ki nshandhay krta hay ، aur 0 kesi bhi artbata ki nshandhay nahin krta haay۔ pehlay sy taay shuda ، kwr () tarykha kar pyirsn artbata kay ghtank ka astamal krta hay ، jo lkyry pymaish krta haay۔mtghyr kay mabyn talkat۔aap kwr () tarykha kar kay tarykha kar pyramytr ka astamal krkay mkhtlf artbata kay tarykwn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap aspyir myn kay rynk kay artbata kay ghtank ya 'kyndal' kay liye 'aspyir myn' astamal krsktay hayn۔kalmwn kay hr jwraay kay liye artbata ki akdar۔ aap 'kalm 1' aur 'kalm 2' kay mabyn artbata haasal karnay kay liye artbata mytrks ، jesay artbatay mytrks ، jesay artbata_mytrks ['kalm 1'] ['kalm 2'] ki nshandhay krkay anfrady artbata ki akdar tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔CORR () tarykha dayfalt kay zaryaha addy kalmwn kay liye jwraay kay artbata ka hasab lghata haay۔aghr aap kay dayta frym main ghair addy kalm hain tou ، aap ko artbata ka hasab lghanay sy pehlay un ko pryprwsys ya ankwda karnay ki zurwrt praskty haay۔

Question: ay day aay kay doran aap dayta frym main ghmshdha akdar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟
Answer: kesi dayta frym main kalm kay mjmway mjmwaha ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap pandawn main kmm () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY CODEMPORT pandaas PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'kalm 1' bnaiyn: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5]} df = pd.dataframe (aadad wa shmar)# kalm day ayf kay jma shuda rkm ka hasab lghaiyn ['cumulativesum'] = df [' kalm 1 ']. cumsum () is msaal main ، cumsum () kay tarykha kar ko dayta frym DF kay' kalm 1 'kalm par kaha jata haay۔cumsum () ka tarykha mkhsawsa kalm main akdar ki mjmway rkm ka hasab lghata haay۔ is kay ntyjay main mjmway rkm dayta frym DF main 'cumulativesum' namy ayk niay kalm ko tfwyzu ki hogi haay۔'cumulativesum' kalm main hr kdr 'kalm 1' kalm main mwjwdha kdr smyt tamam sabkha akdar kay mjmwaha ki nmaindghy krty haay۔mzayd braan ، pandaas dyghr mjmway karrwaiywn ka hasab lghanay kay liye isi tarah kay tarykay mhaya karty hain ، jesay kmwlytw prwdakt kay liye kmprda () ، kam sy zayada kay liye kmaks () ، aur kam sy kam kay liye kmyn ()۔dayta frym kay andayks ka۔aghr aap ayk mkhtlf trtyb main mjmway rkm ka hasab lghana chahti hain tou ، aap cumsum () tarykha kar ko laghw karnay sy pehlay trtyb_ wylywza () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym ko trtyb dy saktay hayn۔df_sorted ['kalm 1']۔ cumsum () is sy yeh ykyny bnaiay ga keh kalm main akdar kay mtalwbha trtyb ki bnyad par mjmway rkm ka hasab lghaya jaiay۔

Question: "aap dayta frym main addy kalmwn kay khlasaha aadadwshmar (mtalb ، mydayn ، mayary anharaf ، wghyrha) ka hasab kesay lghatay hayn؟"
Answer: dayta frym main kalm main rwlngh wndaw fnkshn lghanay kay l you ، aap pandawn main rwlngh () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔rwlngh () ka tarykha ayk mkhsawsa saiza ki rwlngh wndaw tshkyl dyta hay aur aap ko wndaw par mkhtlf afaal lghanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY CODEMPORT pandaas PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'kalm 1' bnaiyn: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5]} DF = PD.Dataframe (dayta)# rwlngh wndaw fnkshn wndaw_saiza = 3DF ['rwlngh myn'] = DF [' kalm 1 ']۔ rwlngh (wndaw = wndaw_saiza). myn () is msaal main ، rwlngh () kay tarykha kar ko dayta frym day ayf kay' kalm 1 'kalm par kaha jata haay۔rwlngh () ka tarykha ayk mkhsawsa saiza ki rwlngh wndaw bnata hay ، js ki wzuahat wndaw pyramytr kay zaryaha ki jati haay۔as maamlay main ، hum wndaw_ saiza 3 par syt karty hain ، lhazaa rwlngh wndaw main mwjwdha kymt aur do sabkha akdar shaml hon ghy۔ rwlngh wndaw bnanay kay bad ، hum wndaw par ayk fnkshn ka atalak krsktay hain ، jesay is msaal main () fnkshn۔wsta () fnkshn rwlngh wndaw main akdar ki awsta kdr ka hasab lghata haay۔ rwlngh wndaw fnkshn sy ntyjay main hony wali akdar ko dayta frym day ayf main 'rwlngh myn' kay nam sy ayk niay kalm main tfwyzu kya jata haay۔'rwlngh myn' kalm main hr kdr 'kalm 1' kalm main mtalkha wndaw ki awsta kdr ki nmaindghy krty haay۔، rwlngh wndaw kay liye mtalwbha hasab ktab par mnhasar haay۔mzayd braan ، aap wndaw kay saiza ko aydajst krsktay hain aur apni zurwryat ki bnyad par mkhtlf afaal ka antkhab krsktay hayn۔ nwt karain keh pehli chnd ktaarwn kay liye jahan mkml wndaw bnanay kay l enough kafy sabkha akdar mwjwd nahin hain ، pandaas rwlngh wndaw kay ntaij ko nan ki akdar tfwyzu karain ghay۔aap rwlngh () kay tarykha kar main MIN_PERIODS pyramytr ka astamal krsktay hain takha ntaij ka hasab lghanay kay liye drkar ghair nwl akdar ki kam sy kam tadad ki wzuahat ki jaskay۔= 1) .myn () is bat ko ykyny bnaiay ga keh rwlngh wndaw fnkshn ka hasab ktab bhi kam sy kam akdar wali ktaarwn kay liye kya jata haay۔

Question: aap ayk wazuha kalm main anwkhy akdar aur un ki tadd ko kis tarah dryaft karty hayn؟
Answer: dayta frym main addy kalmwn ko mamwl par lanay ya mayary bnanay kay l you ، aap asklrn.prwsysngh madaywl main pry prwsysngh afaal astamal krsktay hayn۔khasa tawr par ، aap aam hony kay liye mn myks askylr ya mayary kary kay liye astyndardas askylr ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk dayta frym main addy kalmwn par mamwl kay mtaabk aur mayary kary karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PDFROM SKLEREN.Preprocessing draamd MINMAXCALER ، astyndardas askylr# ayk dayta frymyta = {'kalm 1' bnaiyn: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5].DF.COLLUMS)# addy kalm askylr = astyndardas askylr () df_standardized = pd.dataframe (Scaler.fit_transfor (DF) ، kalm = df.colums) ko mayary bnaiyn ، is msaal kay tawr par ، mnyks askylr ko aam karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur astyndardasklr astamal kya jata hay ، aur astyndardasklr astamal kya jata hay ، aur astyndardasklr astamal kya jata hay ، aur astyndardasklr astamal kya jata haay۔dwnwn askylrza ko shrwa kya jata hay ، aur phir askylngh aapryshn ko anjam denay kay liye Dataframe DF par Fit_transform () kay tarykha kar ko talb kya jata haay۔ is kay ntyjay main mamwl kay mtaabk dayta frym (DF_Normalized) aur mayary dayta frym (DF_standardized) asal dayta frym (DF) ki tarah kalm hawta hay ، js main ، kay sath ، asal dayta frym (DF) kay sath ayk jesay kalm hawtay hayn۔askylngh kay tarykha kar kay mtaabk tbdyl ki janay wali addy akdar۔ narmlaizayshn hr kalm main akdar ko ayk mkhsawsa rynj main trazaw krty hay ، aam tawr par 0 aur 1 kay drmyan۔ yeh akdar kay mabyn rshtha dar talkat ko mhafwza rkhta haay۔as msaal kay tawr par mnymaks askylr farmwla (x - mnt) / (zayadha sy zayada - mnt) ka astamal karty hoey akdar ko trazaw krta haay۔ dusri taraf ، mayary kary ، hr kalm main akdar ko 0 aur mayary anharaf 1 main tbdyl krty haay۔wsta kay aas pas kay aadad wa shmar ko snbhalta hay aur akdar kay phylaؤ ko aydajst krta haay۔as msaal main astyndardars askylr farmwla (x - mtalb) / std ka astamal karty hoey akdar ko mayary bnata haay۔

Question: hastghram ka astamal karty hoey aap addy mtghyr ki tksym ko kis tarah tsawr karty hayn؟
Answer: pandawn main ، aap mlty lywl andayksngh ko snbhal saktay hain ، jsay mlty andayks klas ka astamal karty hoey ، haaiyrarkykl andayksngh bhi kaha jata haay۔mlty lywl andayksngh aap ko ktaar aur kalm lybl ki ayk sy zayada stahawn ki ajazat dyta hay ، jo mtadd jhatwn kay sath dayta ko mnzam aur rsaiy ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔mlty lywl andayksngh kay sath dayta frym kay sath tkhlyk aur kam karnay ki ayk msaal yeh haay: py day kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# mlty lywl andayksngh dayta = {'lywl 1' kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: ['A' ، 'A' ، 'B'، 'by' ، 'sy' ، 'sy'] ، 'lywl 2': [1 ، 2 ، 1 ، 2 ، 1 ، 1 ، 2] ، 'kdr': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50 ، 50 ، 60]}df = pd.dataframe (dayta) df.set_index (['lywl 1' ، 'lywl 2'] ، un plys = sch) # mlty lywl andayksngh prnt (df.loc ['a']) kay sath dayta tak rsaiy # lywl 1 lybl kay sath ktaaryn'a'print (df.loc [' a '، 1]) # lywl 1 lybl' A 'awr lywl 2 lybl 1 prnt (df.loc [' a ':' b ']) kay sath ayk mkhsawsa ktaar tak rsaiy haasal kryn) # staha 1 kay sath ktaarynlyblza 'A' sy 'B'Print (df.loc [(' a '، 1) ،' wylyw ']) # lywl 1 lybl' A 'awr lywl 2 lybl 1 # ry syt karain mlty lywl andayksngh day ayf۔ ry syt_ andayks kay sath ayk mkhsawsa syl tak rsaiy haasal kryn۔ham 'lywl 1' aur 'lywl 2' kalmwn ki bnyad par mlty lywl andayks ko syt karnay kay liye syt_ andayks () ka tarykha astamal karty hayn۔ mlty lywl andayksngh kay sath dayta tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay l you ، aap ayl aw sy andayksr astamal krsktay hayn۔mlty lywl andayks lyblwn ki bnyad par ktaarwn ya khlywn ko mntkhb karnay kay l You aap ayk hi lybl ya lyblwn ka ayk lybl lybl ko mntkl krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، df.loc ['a'] 'lywl 1' lybl 'aay' ، aur df.loc ['A' ، 1] kay sath tamam ktaaryn bazayaft krta haay۔'lywl 2' lybl 1. aap mlty lywl andayks lyblwn par mbny ktaarwn ki ayk rynj ko mntkhb karnay kay liye slaisngh ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay DF.LOC ['A': 'B'] 'lywl 1' lybl 'kay sath ktaaryn bazayaft karnay kay liay' A ':' B ']A 'to' B'. ksayr staha ki asharyha sazay kay sath kesi mkhsawsa syl tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay l you ، aap ktaar aur kalm andayksngh dono kay l lab lyblwn ka ayk tywpl pas krsktay hain ، jesay DF.LOC [('a' ، 1) ، 'kdr']۔aghr aap mlty lywl andayksngh ko dwbarha trtyb dena chahti hain aur staha ko bakaadha kalmwn main tbdyl karna chahti hain tou ، aap RESET_INDEX () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔ mlty lywl andayksngh mtadd jhatwn kay sath dayta ko mnzam aur tjzayha karnay ka ayk taaktwr tarykha fraham krta hay ، js sy aap aapryshn anjam dy saktay hayn۔awr andayks main mkhsawsa stahawn ya staha kay amtzaaj par mbny antkhab۔

Question: aap addy mtghyr ki tksym ko dykhnay kay liye ayk baks plat kesay bnatay hayn؟
Answer: pandawn main daayt taim aabjykt main dawr kay kalm ko tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap tw_dayt taim () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yha fnkshn kesi tarykh ya wkt ki strngh nmaindghy ko tjzayha krta hay aur isy dayt taim aabjykt main tbdyl krta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY CODEMPORT pandaas PD# STRINGSDATA = {'tarykh' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: ['2021-01-01' ، '2021-02-01' ، '2021-01']}df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'tarykh' kalm ko dayt taim aabjykt day ayf main tbdyl karain ['tarykh'] = pd.to_datetime (df ['tarykh']) is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym DF hay 'tarykh''tarykhwn ki nmaindghy karnay waly tar par mushtamil haay۔as kalm ko dayt taim aabjykt main tbdyl karnay kay l we ، hum tw_dayt taim () fnkshn astamal karty hain aur kalm ko 'tarykh' ko btawr dlyl pas karty hayn۔tw_dayt taim () fnkshn dayt taim aabjykt ki ayk syryza lwtata hay ، jsay hum dayta frym kay 'tarykh' kalm ko waps tfwyzu karty hayn۔ is tbdyly kay bad ، 'tarykh' kalm main mwjwd akdar ko dayt taim aabjykt kay tawr par mhafwza kya jata hay ، jo aasan hayra phyry ki ajazat dyta hay awrtarykhwn ka tjzayha۔aap dayt taim aabjykt par mkhtlf karwaiyan anjam dy saktay hain ، jesay dn ، mhaynha ، ya sal nkalna ، wkt kay akhtlafat ka hasab lghana ، aur bohat kchh۔ agar kalm main dawrwn main mayary ISO 8601 farmyt ('yyyy-mm) sy mkhtlf tarykh ki shkl haay۔-DD ') ، aap tw_dayt taim () fnkshn kay farmyt pyramytr ka astamal karty hoey mnasb shkl fraham krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، agar dawr 'DD-mm-yyyy' farmyt main hain tou ، aap is tarah ki shkl byan krsktay hayn: paiytwn kwpy kwdadaf ['tarykh'] = pd.to_datetime (df ['tarykh'] ، farmyt = '٪ d-٪ m- ٪ y ') apnay kalm main dawr ki shkl sy mlnay kay liye sahayha farmyt strngh ki wzuahat karna ykyny bnaiyn۔ pehlay sy taay shuda ، to_datetime () fnkshn yeh frzu krta hay keh dawr tarykhwn ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔aghr aap kay kalm main wkt ya dayta taim ki akdar ki nmaindghy karnay waly tar shaml hain tou ، aap pandawn ko khud bkhwd dayt taim farmyt.pythwn kwpy kwdadaf ['wkt'] = pd.to_datetime (df ['wkt'] ، infer_datetime_format = true) ، infer_datetime_format = true) ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye anfr_dayt taim_fwrmyt pyramytr ka astamal krsktay hayn۔kalm daat kam main fraham krdha dawrwn ki bnyad par dayt taim farmyt ka andazaha lghanay ki kwshsh karain ghay۔aap kay dayta main

Question: aap baks platwn ya dusray tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey addy kalm main aaؤt lyirza ki janch kesay karty hayn؟
Answer: pandaas strngh hayra phyry kay mtadd tarykay mhaya krta hay jo tar par mushtamil kalmwn par strngh aapryshn ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔yha tarykay .str lwazamat kay zaryaay dstyab hain ، jo aap ko mkhtlf tar kay kam anjam denay kay l string strngh tarykwn kay swt tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki shawlt dyta haay۔pandawn main strngh hayra phyry ko kis tarah snbhalnay ki ayk msaal yeh haay: PD# kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas astrnghs dayta = {'strngh' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: ['haylw ، wrlda!' ، 'azaghr bohat achha haay' ، 'pandaas bohat achha haay'']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# kalm day ayf [' sbstrngh '] = df [' string ']. str.extract (' (\ w+) ') df [' placease '] = df [')'strngh'].str.contains ('azaym')# kalm day ayf main ayk astrngh ko tbdyl karain ['tbdyl'] = df ['string']. str.replace ('hayrt anghyza' ، 'hayrt anghyza')# ayk kalm ko mtadd kalm ays day ayf main tksym karain [[[['frst wrda' ، 'syknda wrda']] = df ['strngh']۔ str.split ('،' ، '، twsya = sch) is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk dayta frym DF hay js myn' astrngh 'pr mushtamil kalm hay js main dawr shaml hayn۔ham is kalm main strngh hayra phyry kay mkhtlf tarykwn ko laghw karnay kay liye .str lwazamat ka astamal krsktay hayn: dawrwn sy ayk strngh nkalnay kay l we ، hum .str.extract () tarykha astamal karty hain aur ayk bakaadha azahaar ka nmwnha ((\ w+)) nkalnay kay liye fraham karty hayn۔har tar ka pehla lfza۔ntyjha 'astrngh' kalm main mhafwza haay۔ tarwn ko braay main tbdyl karnay kay liye ، hum .str.upper () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔ntyjha 'apr kys' kalm main mhafwza haay۔ hr tar ki lmbaiy haasal karnay kay l we ، hum .str.len () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔ntyjha 'lmbaiy' kay kalm main mhafwza haay۔ chyk karnay kay liye keh aya hr tar main koi mkhsawsa astrngh mwjwd hay ، hum .str.contains () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔ntyjha 'pr mshtml' kalm main mhafwza kya jata haay۔ hr tar main ayk strngh ko tbdyl karnay kay l we ، hum .str.replace () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔ham lfza 'hayrt anghyza' ko 'hayrt anghyza' kay sath tbdyl karty hayn۔ntyjha 'tbdyl' kalm main mhafwza kya jata haay۔ tarwn ko mtadd kalmwn main tksym karnay kay liye ، ayk had bndy ki bnyad par ، hum .str.split () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔ham kwma ('،') main tarwn ko tksym karty hain aur is kay ntyjay ko alyhadha kalmwn ko 'frst wrda' aur 'syknda wrda' main braha dytay hayn۔ yeh strngh hayra phyry ki karrwaiywn ki sirf chnd msaalyn hain jo aap pandawn main anjam dy saktay hayn۔.straps () ، Startswith () ، endswith () ، aur bohat kuch kay zaryaay aur bhi bohat sary strngh tarykay dstyab hayn۔aap dstyab strngh tarykwn ki jama fharst kay liye strngh hayndalngh par pandaas dstawyzaat ka hawalha dy saktay hayn۔

Question: aap artbata mytrks ya bkhrnay waly platwn ka astamal karty hoey addy mtghyr kay mabyn artbata ko kis tarah dryaft karty hayn؟
Answer: pandawn main tykst srch aur mmasalt anjam denay kay l you ، aap .str lwazamat kay zaryaha fraham krdha mkhtlf tar kay tarykwn aur bakaadha tasarat astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tknykyn hayn: ayn mtaabk mmasalt: aap == aaprytr ya .eq () tarykha ka astamal karty hoey ayn mtaabk mychwn ki janch krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# astrnghs dayta = {'mtn' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: ['haylw ، wrlda!' ، 'azaghr bohat achha haay' ، 'pandaas bohat achha haay']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ayn mtaabk mychngh day ayf_sykt_mch = day ayf [day ayf ['mtn'] == 'azaghr bohat achha haay'] jzawy mlap: mtn kay andr sbstrnghza ki tlash kay l you ، aap .str.contains () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yha bwlyn mask lwtata hay js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh aya hr ansar main pytrn paya jata haay۔msaal kay tawr pr: paiytwn kwpy kwda# jzawy mychngh day ayf_partyl_mch = day ayf [day ayf ['tykst']۔ str.contains ('IS')] kys ghair hasas mmasalt: kys ghair hasas mmasalt anjam denay kay l you ، aap kys = jhwtay pyramytr ko astamal krsktay hayn۔.str.contains () tarykha۔msaal kay tawr pr: paiytwn kwpy kwda# anjam dyn kys ghair hasas mmasal mychngh day ayf_ kys_ysnsytyw_mcht = day ayf [day ayf ['mtn'].str.contains () tarykha۔bakaadghy sy azahaar mtn kay nmwnay kay mlap kay l powerful taaktwr salahaytwn ko fraham krta haay۔msaal kay tawr pr: paiythwn kwpy kwda# bakaadghy sy azahaar karain mmasal dayf_ryjyks_mch = day ayf [day ayf ['tykst']۔.isin () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey akdar ki fharst kay khlaf ayn mtaabk strngh mychwn ki janch kryn۔msaal kay tawr pr: paiytwn kwpy kwda# akdar ki fharst kay sath ayn mtaabk mmasalt = ['haylw ، wrlda!' ، 'pandaas bohat achha haay'] df_exact_match_list = df [df ['text']۔ isin (values)] yeh sirf kuch haynpandawn main mtn ki tlash aur mmasal tknyk ki msaalyn۔apny mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay ، aap un tarykwn ko mntaky aaprytrza (jysay ، aur kay liye aur ، kay liay) kay sath jwra saktay hain takha mtn ki mazeed pychydha kam anjam dyn۔mzayd braan ، aap apnay mtn kay mlap kay kamwn ko mazeed bhatr bnanay kay liye astart wyth () ، ayndasyth () ، mych () ، aur faindaal () jesay dusray strngh tarykwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: ay day aay kay doran aap dayta frym main ghmshdha akdar ko kis tarah snbhaltay aur tsawr karty hayn؟
Answer: pandawn main aaly kardanlty kay sath zamrha dar dayta ko snbhalna mshkl hawskta hay kywnkha is sy mymwry ki na ahaly aur sst karkrdghy ka baasa bn sakta haay۔aaly kardanlty sy mrad ayk bray tadad main mnfrd ksmwn ya ayk mtghyr mtghyr main staha haay۔pandawn main aaly kardanlty kay sath zamrha dar aadad wa shmar ko snbhalnay kay liye kuch tknyk yeh hayn: zamray ki tadad ko kam kryn: agar aaly kardanlty bray tadad main nayab ya kabhi kbhar zamray ki wjha sy hay tou ، aap inhain ayk alyhadha zamray main ghrwp karnay ya isi tarah kay sath jwranay par ghwr krsktay hayn۔aksam.as sy aham malwmat ko haasal karty hoey kardanlty ko kam karnay main mdd mil sakti haay۔aap wylyw_kwnt () jesay tarykwn ka astamal krsktay hain aur ghair mamwly zamray ki nshandhay karnay aur ghrwp karnay kay liye ayk had ka atalak krsktay hayn۔pandaas mkhtlf ankwdangh tknyk mhaya krta hay ، jesay lybl ankwdangh aur ayk ghrm ankwdangh ، jo mtghyr mtghyrat ko addy nmaindghy main tbdyl krskta haay۔lybl
