Answer: bakaadha azahaar (REGEX) mych kay ntyjay par mbny dayta frym main ayk nya kalm bnanay kay l you ، aap pandawn main str.extract () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yha tarykha astrngh kalm main ryjyks pytrn ka pehla mych nkalta hay aur nkala hoa akdar kay sath ayk nya kalm bnata haay۔yhaan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD# msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe (text 'mtn': ['aypl ayk phl haay' ، 'kyla ayk phl haay' ، 'sntry nahin haay']})# aykstryktryjyks ka astamal karty hoey phlwn kay nam aur ayk nya kalm day ayf bnaiyn ['phl'] = day ayf ['mtn']as msaal kay tawr par ، hamary pas day ayf namy ayk dayta frym hay js main 'tykst' namy kalm hay js main tykst dawr shaml hayn۔ham 'tykst' kalm par str.extract () ka tarykha astamal karty hain aur ryjyks pytrn r '(\ b [a-z-z]+\ b) fraham karty hayn' kwsyn kay andr۔ ryjyks pytrn (\ b [a-za-z]+\ b) ayk ya zayada harfy harfwn ko apni ghrft main la raha hay js kay charwn taraf lfza ki hadwd (\ B) sy ghhra hoa hay ، is kay bad lfza "IS" haay۔kwsyn nmwnha kay hasaay ko nkalnay kay liye asharha karty hayn۔aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: vbnetcopy kwda tykst frwt aypl ayk phl hay aypl 1 kylay ayk phl kylay hay 2 sntry nanyhayr nahin hay ، 'phl' kalm ryjyks mych kay ntyjay par mbny bnaya gaya haay۔phlwn kay nam 'aypl' aur 'kylay' ko 'mtn' kalm main isi tarah kay tar sy nkala jata haay۔tysry ktaar pytrn sy mmasal nahin hay ، lhazaa is ki 'phl' kalm main nan ki kymt haay۔ nwt karain keh str.extract () tarykha sirf pehla mych waps krta haay۔aghr aap kay mtadd mych hain aur un sab ko alag alag kalmwn main nkalna chahti hain tou ، aap is kay bjaiay str.extractall () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main IOT aalat sy synsr dayta hawta haay۔aap mmknha khraby ya aaؤt lyirza ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar main adm tzuadat ka tjzayha aur un ka ptha kesay lghaiyn ghay؟
Answer: kesi dayta frym main kalm main kesi kdr kay wakaat ki mjmway ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap mshrwta byan kay sath sath pandawn main kmm () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'zamrha': ['A' ، 'A' ، 'B' ، 'A' ، 'C' ، 'B']})# 'A' main 'A' zamrha 'kalm day ayf [' mjmway ghnty '] = (DF [' zamrha '] ==' A ') kay wakaat ki mjmway ghnty ka hasab lghaiyn۔ is msaal main ، hamary pas prnt () prnt (DF)۔dayta frym nay day ayf ka nam ayk kalm kay sath rakha hay js ka nam 'zamrha' hay js main zamrha dar akdar hayn۔ham 'zamrha' kalm main 'A' ki kymt 'A' kay wakaat ki mjmway ghnty ka hasab lghana chahti hayn۔ azahaar (DF ['zamrha'] == 'A') ayk bwlyn mask bnata hay jo ktaarwn kay liye sch hay jahan kdr main haay'zamrha' kalm 'A' aur ghalat haay۔as sy mask main hakyky akdar ki mjmway rkm ka hasab ktab hawta hay ، js sy hamain 'zamrha' kalm main 'A' kay wakaat ki mjmway ghnty ko mؤsar tarykay sy shmar kya jata haay۔ hum 'mjmway ghnty' kay nam sy ayk niay kalm ko ntyjha tfwyzu karty hayn۔: CSSCOPY kwda zamrha mjmway COUNT0 A 11 A 22 B 23 A 34 C 35 B 3 ، 'mjmway ghnty' kalm tyar kya gaya hay ، js main 'zamrha' kalm main 'A' ki wkwa pzayr ghnty ko zaahar kya gaya haay۔'A' kay sath hr ktaar main ghnty main azuafha hawta haay۔ nwt karain keh cumsum () tarykha 1 aur ghalat kay tawr par drst slwk krta hay ، js sy hamain mjmway rkm la kar hony waly wakaat ko mؤsar tarykay sy ghnnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya gaya hay js main wyb klk astrym dayta haay۔sb sy mshhawr wyb safhaat aur saarf nywyghyshn pytrn ki shnakht kay l you aap saarf kay tarza aml ka tjzayha kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dawr kay kalm ko dayta frym main ayk wazuha dayta ki ksm main tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap pandawn main aystaip () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hain aur dayta ki ksm ko 'zamrha' kay btawr byan krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par dayta frymdaf = pd.dataframe ({'zamrha': ['A' ، 'B' ، 'A' ، 'C' ، 'B']})# knwrt 'zamrha'kalm tw blydawrytk dayta taipdaf [' zamrha '] = day ayf [' zamrha ']۔ aystaip (' zamrha ') prnt (day ayf [' zamrha ']'zamrha' js main dawr shaml hayn۔ham 'zamrha' kalm ko ayk wazuha aadad wa shmar ki ksm main tbdyl karna chahti hayn۔ hum 'zamrha' kalm par ASTYPE () tarykha astamal karain aur dayta ki ksm 'zamrha' ko dlyl kay tawr par fraham kryn۔yha kalm ko ayk wazuha aadad wa shmar ki ksm main tbdyl krta haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: kapy kwda kytyghry hayr ، 'zamrha' kalm ko ayk wazuha aadad wa shmar ki ksm main tbdyl kya jata hay ، aur day ayf ['zamrha']۔ day taip rytrns 'zamrha' is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh kalm ka hay keh kalm haaywazuha aadad wa shmar ki ksm۔ pandaas main zamrha dar dayta ki ksm mymwry aur karkrdghy kay fwaid fraham krty hay ، khasa tawr par jab kalm main mhadwd tadad main anwkhy akdar hawty hain aur woh bar bar hawta haay۔yha kuch aapryshnza main mwsar astwryj aur tyza tr kmpywtyshn ki bhi ajazat dyta haay۔ nwt karain keh kalm ko dayta ki ksm main tbdyl karna mfyd hay jab kalm alag alag akdar kay ayk mhadwd syt ki nmaindghy krta haay۔aghr kalm main bray tadad main anwkhy akdar mwjwd hain ya agar akdar main aaly kardanlty hay tou ، isy zamrha dar dayta ki ksm main tbdyl karnay kay liye mwzawn nahin hawgha۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main mwsm ka dayta hawta haay۔mwsmy rjhaanat aur bay zuabtaghywn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aap mwsm kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur tsawr kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main do kalmwn kay mabyn kwsain mmasalt ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap askaiyln daat mytrks.pyir wyza madaywl sy askaiykyt lrn main kwsain_smyryty fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr Pdfrom asklyirn۔ mytrks۔، 8]})# 'kalm 1' aur 'kalm 2' asymylyty = cosine_simarity (df ['kalm 1'] kay darmiyan kwsain mmasalt ka hasab lghaiyn۔ wylywza۔ ryshp (1 ، -1) ، day ayf ['kalm 2']۔ wylywza۔ ryshp (1، -1)) [0] [0] prnt (mmasalt) is msaal main ، hamary pas day ayf namy dayta frym hay js main do kalm ، 'kalm 1' aur 'kalm 2' hay ، js main addy akdar hayn۔ham un do kalmwn kay mabyn kwsain mmasalt ka hasab lghana chahti hayn۔ kwsain_symylyty fnkshn un pt kay tawr par do safwn ko lyta hay aur un kay mabyn kwsain mmasalt ko lwtata haay۔ham 'kalm 1' aur 'kalm 2' ki akdar ko fnkshn main alag alag safwn kay tawr par mntkl karty hayn۔ nwt karain keh un pt safwn ko ayk hi shkl ki zurwrt hay ، lhazaa hum safwn ko shkl main tbdyl karnay kay liye dwbarha shkl () ka tarykha astamal karty hain (1 ، - -1) ، jo kalmwn ki mthark tadad kay sath ayk hi saf ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: kapy kwda 0.9999999999999999999998 hr wkt ، 'kalm 1' aur 'kalm 2' kay mabyn mmasalt ka astamal kwsain mmasalt ka astamal karty hoey kya jata haay۔as ka ntyjha -1 aur 1 kay darmiyan ayk kdr hay ، jahan 1 kaml mmasalt ki nshandhay krta haay۔ is bat ka ykyn karain keh Cosine_simarity fnkshn ko astamal karnay kay liye askykyt lrn anstal (PIP anstal askykyt lrn) haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr mnwr dayta hawta haay۔aap mshyn lrnngh ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey kstmr kay mntr ka tjzayha aur pysh ghwiy karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main psmandha flngh (ya byk flngh) kay zaryaha ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalnay kay l you ، aap 'BFILL' par syt tarykha pyramytr kay sath flna () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par dayta frymdaf = PD.Dataframe ({'A': [1 ، 2 ، NP.NAN ، 4 ، NP.NAN ، 6]})# byk fl ghmsht wylyw day ayf_ flna۔dayta frym aur tarykha kar pyramytr ko 'byfl' par syt karain ، js sy psmandha bhrnay ki nshandhay hawty haay۔yha tarykha kalm main aghly dstyab kymt kay sath ghmshdha akdar ki jghha la lyta haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: CSSCOPY kwda A0 1.01 2.02 4.03 4.04 6.05 6.0 6.0 6.0 6.0 6.0 kalm 'A' main ghmshdha akdar aghly dstyab kymt kay sath byk fl hayn۔ktaarwn 2 aur 4 main NP.NAN akdar ko baltrtyb 4.0 aur 6.0 ki akdar kay sath tbdyl kya gaya haay۔ nwt karain keh psmandha bhrnay ka tarykha ('BFILL') bad ki ktaar sy aghly dstyab kymt kay sath ghmshdha akdar ko bhrta haay۔aghr ghmshdha kymt kesi kalm ki aakhry ktaar main hay tou ، yeh NP.nan ki haysayt sy baky hay kywnkha is sy bhrnay kay liye koi ktaar mwjwd nahin haay۔ is bat ki ykyn dhaany kraiy hogi hay keh aap ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye NP.NAN astamal karnay kay liye NP.NAN astamal karnay kay liye NAPY laibryry draamd (NP kay tawr par NP) haay۔ghmshdha akdar۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main swshl nyt wrk ka dayta hawta haay۔aap nyt wrk kay dahanchay ka tjzayha kesay karain ga aur baasar nwdas ya bradrywn ki shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: kesi dusray kalm kay ahaday par mbny dayta frym main ayk nya kalm bnanay kay l you ، aap pandawn main rynk () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'akdar': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50]})# 'akdar' kalm day ayf ki drjha bndy par mbny ayk nya kalm bnaiyn۔['rynk'] = DF ['akdar']۔ rynk () prnt (DF) is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk dayta frym hay js ka nam DF hay js main ayk kalm 'akdar' hay js main addy akdar hayn۔ham 'akdar' kalm main akdar kay ahaday par mbny 'rynk' kay nam sy ayk nya kalm bnana chahti hayn۔ hum 'akdar' kalm par rynk () fnkshn ka astamal karty hain ، jo chrahtay hoey trtyb main hr kdr ko safwn ko tfwyzu krta haay۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، rynk () fnkshn awsta drjha ko bndhay hoey akdar kay liye tfwyzu krkay talkat ko snbhalta haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: ryazuy ka kwda kwda wylywza rynk 0 1.01 20 2.02 30 3.03 4.0 4.04 50 5.0 haair ، 'rynk' kalm par mbny bnaya gaya haay۔'akdar' kalm main akdar ka drjha۔drjha 1 sy sab sy chhwty kymt kay liye shrwa hawta hay aur is kay bad ki hr kymt kay liye 1 sy azuafha hawta haay۔ nwt karain keh rynk () fnkshn talkat ko snbhalnay kay l different mkhtlf drjha bndy kay tarykay aur akhtyarat mhaya krta hay ، aap mazeed malwmat kay liye pandaas dstawyzaat ka hawalha dy saktay hain (pandaas.daytafrym۔rynk) .aysw ، agar aap nzawly trtyb main drjha ka hasab lghana chahti hain tou ، aap chrahtay hoey = ghalat ko drjha () fnkshn main mntkl krsktay hain ، jesay is tarha: day ayf ['rynk'] = day ayf ['akdar']۔ rynk (chrahnay =jhwta)۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main mlazamyn ka dayta hawta haay۔mlazamyn kay karwbar main shrakt karnay waly awaml ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aap mlazamyn ki adm asthakam ka tjzayha kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: kesi dayta frym main kalm ki mjmway fysad ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap pandawn main kmm () aur rkm () afaal astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'akdar': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50]})# mjmway fysad ['mjmway fysad'] = DF ['mjmway fysad'] ka hasab lghaiyn۔'akdar']. cumsum () / df ['values']. SUM () * 100 prnt (DF) is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk kalm 'akdar' kay sath DF namy dayta frym hay js main addy akdar hayn۔ham 'akdar' kalm main akdar ki mjmway fysad ka hasab lghana chahti hayn۔ hum 'akdar' kalm kay mjmway rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye kmm () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔as kay bad ، hum mjmway fysad haasal karnay kay liye 'akdar' kalm ki kal rkm kay zaryaha mjmway rkm ko tksym karty hayn۔'mjmway fysad' kalm tkhlyk kya gaya hay aur is main 'akdar' kalm main akdar ki mjmway fysad par mushtamil haay۔mjmway fysad pehli kymt kay liye 10.0 ٪ sy shrwa hawta hay aur is kay bad ki hr kymt kay liye mtalkha fysad sy brahta haay۔ nwt karain keh agar mjmway fysad abtdaiy rkm sy zayada hay tou mjmway fysad 100 ٪ sy tjawza krskta haay۔aghr aap mjmway fysad ko zayada sy zayada 100 ٪ tak mhadwd rkhna chahti hain tou ، aap day ayf ['mjmway fysad'] = DF ['akdar'] astamal krsktay hayn۔ cumsum (). klp (awpry = 100) / df ['akdar'].sum () * 100 isy mhadwd karnay kay liay.

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr spwrt dayta hawta haay۔aam msail ki nshandhay krkay aur rdaml kay awkat ko bhatr bnanay kay zaryaha aap kstmr spwrt aapryshnwn ka tjzayha aur un ko kis tarah bhatr bnaiyn ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main do kalmwn kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay aur ntyjha ki bnyad par ayk nya kalm bnanay kay l you ، aap pandawn main ryazuy kay ghhtaؤ kay aml ko astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'kalm 1': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50] ، 'kalm 2': [5 ، 8 ، 15 ، 25 ، 30]})# 'kalm 1' aur 'kalm 2' day ayf ['frk'] = day ayf ['kalm 1'] - day ayf ['kalm 2'] prnt (day ayf) kay darmiyan frk ka hasab lghaiyn is msaal main ، hamary pas do kay sath day ayf namy dayta frym haay۔kalm 'kalm 1' aur 'kalm 2' js main addy akdar hayn۔ham 'kalm 1' aur 'kalm 2' main akdar kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghana chahti hain aur ntyjha par mbny 'frk' kay nam sy ayk nya kalm bnana chahti hayn۔ hum hasab ktab karnay kay liye ryazuy kay ghhtaؤ aapryshn (-) ka astamal karty hoey 'kalm 1' sy 'kalm 2' ko ghhtaiyn۔frk.ntyjay main akdar ko 'frk' kalm par tfwyzu kya gaya haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: kapy kwda kalm 1 kalm 2 frk 0 5 5 51 20 8 122 30 15 153 40 25 154 50 30 20 20 hr ، frk kay darmiyan frk ki bnyad par 'frk' kalm tkhlyk kya gaya haay۔'kalm 1' aur 'kalm 2' main akdar ko nwt karain keh kalmwn ko ghhtaiay janay waly kalmwn ki ayk hi lmbaiy honi chahaiay ، aur ghmshdha akdar (NAN) ntyjha main phyl jien gi agar is sy mtalkha akdar main sy koi bhi kesi bhi kalm main ghaib haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main maly lyn dyn hawta haay۔aap bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay waly alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey jaly lyn dyn ka tjzayha aur un ka ptha kesay lghaiyn ghay؟
Answer: kesi kalm main ghmshdha akdar ki tadad ki bnyad par dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay l you ، aap pandawn main isnull () aur SUM () afaal astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'kalm 1': [10 ، 20 ، koi bhi nahin ، 40 ، koi nhayn] ، 'kalm 2': [5 ، koi bhi nahin ، 15 ، koi bhi nahin ، 30]}) # kalm 1'n_missing_values = 1 main ghmshdha akdar ki tadad par mbny fltr ktaaryn # ghmshdha akdar ki mtalwbha tadad ki wzuahat kryn۔fltrda_ day ayf) is msaal main ، hamary pas day ayf namy dayta frym hay js main do kalm 'kalm 1' aur 'kalm 2' haay۔ham 'kalm 1' main ghmshdha akdar ki tadad ki bnyad par ktaarwn ko fltr karna chahti hain ، hum yeh chyk karnay kay liye isnull () fnkshn ka astamal karty hain keh 'kalm 1' main kon sy kdryn ghaib hain (NAN)۔yha bwlyn mask lwtata hay jahan hakyky ghmshdha akdar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as kay bad ، hum 'kalm 1'. nykst main ghmshdha akdar ki tadad ko ghnnay kay liye bwlyn mask par rkm () fnkshn ka astamal karty hain ، hum mtghyr N_Missing_values ka astamal karty hoey ghmshdha akdar ki mtalwbha tadad ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as maamlay main ، hum isy 1. fainl tawr par mrtb karty hain ، hum DF ['kalm 1'] ki haalt ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym DF ko fltr karty hayn۔ isnull (). rkm () == n_misseing_values۔yha haalt chyk krty hay keh aya 'kalm 1' main ghmshdha akdar ki tadad N_Missing_values main mkhsawsa mtalwbha nmbr sy mmasal haay۔as haalt ko mtamin karnay wali ktaarwn ko sirf fltr_daf main mntkhb aur zakhyrha kya gaya haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: RCOPY kwda kalm 1 kalm 1 kalm 21 20.0 NAN 30.0 HERE ، 'kalm 1' main ghmshdha akdar ki mtalwbha tadad wali ktaaryn fltr aur fltrda_ day ayf main zaahar hawty hayn۔aap kalm main ghmshdha akdar ki mkhtlf tadad ki bnyad par ktaar ko fltr karnay kay liye N_Missing_values ki kdr ko aydajst krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main ayp kay astamal ka dayta hawta haay۔ayp ki kamyaby main maawn awaml ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aap saarf ki msarwfyt aur brkrar rkhnay ka tjzayha kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayt taim akdar kay kalm ko haftay kay dn main dayta frym main tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap daay_ nam () fnkshn kay sath sath pandawn main day ty ayksysr ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'tarykh': ['2023-07-01' ، '2023-07-02' ، '2023-07-03' ، '2023'-07-04 '] ،' wylyw ': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40]})#' tarykh 'kalm ko daytymydaf main tbdyl karain [' tarykh '] = pd.to_datetime (df [' tarykh '])# aykstrykt daay'tarykh' kalm day ayf ['daay aw ayf wyk'] = day ayf ['tarykh'] sy haftha ky۔ dt.day_name () prnt (DF) is msaal main ، hamary pas DF namy ayk dayta frym hay js main do kalm 'tarykh' aur 'kdr' hayn۔'tarykh' kalm main tarykh ki akdar 'YYYY-MM-DD' ki shkl main dawr kay tawr par hawty hayn۔ham 'tarykh' kalm ko dayt taim farmyt main tbdyl karna chahti hain aur haftay kay dn ko nkalna chahti hayn۔ is sy pehlay ، hum 'tarykh' kalm ko dayt taim farmyt main tbdyl karnay kay liye PD.TO_DATIME () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔ phir hum 'tarykh' tak rsaiy haasal karty hayn۔day ayf ['tarykh'] ka astamal karty hoey kalm aur dayt taim praprtyza tak rsaiy kay l d day ty ayksysr ka atalak kryn۔ham haftha kay dn ko strngh kay tawr par nkalnay kay liye daay_ nam () fnkshn ka astamal karty hain ، hum haftha kay akdar ko ayk niay kalm 'daay aaf wyk' ko day ayf ['daay awf wyk'] = .... aaؤt pt ka astamal karty hoey tfwyzu karty hayn۔yha hawgha: ryazuy ka kwda ki tarykh ki kymt daay aaf wyk 0 2023-07-01 10 haftha 1 2023-07-02 20 atwar 2 2023-07-03 30 swmwar 323-07-04 40 mnghl hayir ، 'tarykh' kalm tarykh kay wkt ki shkl main tbdyl kya gaya hay aur ''۔daay aaf wyk 'kalm hr tarykh kay mtaabk haftay kay dn par mushtamil haay۔ nwt: daay_ nam () fnkshn is dn ka pora nam waps krta hay (jysay ،' pyr '،' mnghl ')۔aghr aap mkhtsa nam (jysay ، 'pyr' ، 'mnghl') chahti hain tou ، aap daay_ nam () fnkshn ko is tarah astamal krsktay hain ، jesay is ki tarha: df ['dayofweek'] = df ['tarykh']۔dt.strfume ('٪ a')۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main msanwaat ki frwkht ka dayta hawta haay۔taim syryza tjzayha ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey aap mstkbl ki frwkht ka tjzayha aur pysh ghwiy kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: wzan kay tawr par kesi dusray kalm ka astamal karty hoey ayk dayta frym main mtadd kalmwn main akdar kay wzan waly rkm ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap pandawn main zurb () aur rkm () afaal astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par dayta frymdaf = PD.Dataframe ({'A': [10 ، 20 ، 30] ، 'B': [5 ، 6 ، 7] ، 'C': [0.1 ،0.2 ، 0.3] ، 'wzan': [0.3 ، 0.5 ، 0.2]})# kalmwn main 'A' ، 'B' ، aur 'C' main 'wzan' kalm wyt_sm = (DF [['a ka astamal karty hoey akdar kay wzan ka hasab lghaiyn۔'،' B '،' C ']].، 'by' ، 'sy' ، aur 'wzan'۔kalm 'A' ، 'B' ، aur 'C' main akdar par mushtamil hay ، aur 'wzan' kalm main hr kdr sy wabstha wzan shaml hawta haay۔ wzan waly rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye ، hum pehlay kalmwn ko 'A' ، 'B' mntkhb karty hain ،awr 'C' DF ka astamal karty hoey [['a' ، 'B' ، 'C']]۔as kay bad ، hum 'wzan' kay kalm kay sath mlty plaiy () fnkshn ko ansar kay mtaabk hr kymt ko is kay isi wzan sy zurb dytay hayn۔mhawr = 0 pyramytr yeh wazuha krta hay keh zurb ktaar kay lhaaza sy ki jany chahaiay۔ Next ، hum wzan waly akdar kay mjmwaha ka hasab lghanay kay liye rkm () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، sm () kalm war rkm anjam dyta hay ، lhazaa yeh hr kalm kay liye akdar ka hasab dyta haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: CSSCOPY CODEA 19.0B 8.9C 0.22dType: flwt 64 haair ، kalm 'A' main akdar ka wzan wala mjmwaha 'A' ، 'by '، awr' sy 'ka hasab' wzan 'kalm sy wzan ka astamal karty hoey kya jata haay۔ntyjha pandaas syryza aabjykt kay tawr par zaahar hawta hay ، jahan andayks kalm kay namwn ki nmaindghy krta hay aur akdar wzan waly rkm ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔ aap kalm kay namwn ko aydajst krsktay hain ya dayta frym main kalmwn kay mkhtlf sytwn kay liye wzan waly rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye mazeed kalm shaml krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main swshl mydaya par asar andaza hawta haay۔aap un ki rsai aur mshghwlyt ki pymaish ki bnyad par asar andaza karnay walon ka tjzayha aur drjha bndy kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: kesi haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym kay kalm main akdar ko tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap pandawn main ayl aw sy ayksysr ko ktaarwn kay sab syt ko mntkhb karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo haalt ko pora karty hain aur phir mtalwbha kalm ko niy akdar tfwyzu krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'A': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50]})# kalm main akdar ko tbdyl karain 'A' par mbny kndayshn day ayf۔ ayl aw sy۔DF ['a']> 30 ، 'a'] = 0 prnt (DF) is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk dayta frym hay js ka nam DF hay js main kalm 'A' hay js main addy akdar hayn۔ham 'A' kalm main akdar ko tbdyl karna chahti hain jo 30 sy zayada ayk niy kymt kay sath hain ، is maamlay main ، 0. yeh karain ، hum lwk rsas ko ktaar kay sab syt ko mntkhb karnay kay liye astamal karty hain jo DF ki haalt ko pora karty hain ['a']> 30. LOC ki pehli dlyl ktaar kay antkhab ki haalt ki wzuahat krty hay ، aur dusri dlyl kalm (zabanyn) ko ap dayt karnay ki wzuahat krty haay۔as maamlay main ، hum ktaaryn mntkhb kar rahay hain jahan 'A' 30 sy zayada hay ، aur khud 'A' kalm ko ap dayt kar rahay hayn۔ hum phir mntkhb krdha ktaar ko 0 ko DF.LOC [DF ['A' par tfwyzu krkay mntkhb kryn۔]> 30 ، 'a']۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: CSSCOPY kwda A0 101 202 303 04 0 jab ، 'A' kalm main jo akdar 30 sy zayada hain un ki jghha 0. 0. kay sath tbdyl krdy hogi haay۔aap ki mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk kdr kryn۔

Question: aap ko wyb sait tryfk dayta par mushtamil daytasyt diya jata haay۔rkawtwn aur saarf kay tjrbay kay msail ki nshandhay krkay aap wyb sait ki karkrdghy ka tjzayha aur un ko kis tarah bhatr bnaiyn ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main mtadd kalmwn kay zaryaha ghrwp krdha kalm main akdar kay jwraay ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap pandawn main ghrwp baiy () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par dayta frymdaf = pd.dataframe ({'A': ['x' ، 'x' ، 'Y' ، 'z'] ، 'B': [['A' ، 'B' ، 'A' ، 'B' ، 'A'] ، 'C': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50]})# kalm 'C' main akdar ki rkm ka hasab ktab kryn۔kalm 'a' aur 'b'sum_by_groups = df.groupby ([' a '،' b ']) [' c ']'A' ، 'B' ، aur 'C'۔ham kalm 'sy' main akdar kay jwraay ka hasab ktab kalm 'aay' aur 'by' kay zaryaha karna chahti hayn۔ aysa karnay kay l we ، hum ghrwp baiy () fnkshn astamal karty hain aur kalmwn ko 'A' aur 'B' ko ghrwp bndy ki chabyan kay tawr par fraham karty hayn۔ayk fharst main ['a' ، 'B']۔as kay bad kalm 'C' ka antkhab mrba brykt ['C'] ka astamal karty hoey kya jata hay is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye keh hum hr ghrwp kay liye kalm 'C' main akdar kay jwraay ka hasab lghana chahti hayn۔har ghrwp kay liye kalm 'sy' main akdar۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: CSSCOPY CODEA BX A 10 B 20Y A 30 B 40Z A 50Name: C ، DTYPE: INT64HERE ، kalm 'C' main akdar ka mjmwaha hr anwkhay amtzaaj kay liye hasab kya jata haaykalm 'A' aur 'B' main akdar ky۔as ka ntyjha pandaas syryza aabjykt kay tawr par zaahar hawta hay ، jahan andayks kalm 'A' aur 'B' main akdar kay anwkhay amtzaaj ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur akdar hr ghrwp kay liye kalm 'C' main akdar ki rkm ki nmaindghy krty hayn۔kalm kay nam ya dayta frym main kalmwn kay mkhtlf amtzaaj kay zaryaha ghrwp main mazeed kalm shaml kryn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr srway kay rdaml hawtay hayn۔bhatry kay liye alakwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aap kstmr aaraa ka tjzayha aur khlasaha kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym ko ays kyw aylait dayta bys tybl main tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap pandawn kay zaryaha fraham krdha tw_ ays kyw ayl () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr Pdimport sqlite3# msaal dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'nam': ['jan' ، 'ayls' ، 'bab'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35] ،'sty': ['nyw yark' ، 'lndn' ، 'pyrs']})# ayk SQLITE dayta bys knkshn knkwn = sqlite3.connect ('myDatabase.db' ')# dayta frym ko ayk SQLite table.to_sql (' myTable 'myn tbdyl kryn۔.ham is dayta frym ko SQLITE dayta bys tybl main tbdyl karna chahti hayn۔ aysa karnay kay l we ، hum sab sy pehlay SQLite3.connect () ka astamal karty hoey SQLITE dayta bys sy rabtaha kaim karty hain aur dayta bys fail kay rastay ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as msaal main ، hum fail ka nam 'myDatabase.db'.next astamal kar rahay hain ، hum dayta frym ko SQLite tybl main tbdyl karnay kay liye TO_SQL () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔TO_SQL () ki pehli dlyl is tybl ka nam hay jsay hum bnana chahti hain (as msaal main 'maiy tybl')۔dwsry dlyl SQLITE dayta bys knkshn hay (as maamlay main kwn)۔IF_EXISTS pyramytr ko 'tbdyl' karnay kay liye syt kya gaya hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh agar tybl pehlay sy mwjwd hay tou ، isy dayta frym ki bnyad par niy tybl kay sath tbdyl kya jaye gha۔andayks pyramytr dayta frym andayks ko dayta bys tybl main ayk alyhadha kalm kay tawr par mhafwza karnay sy kharj karnay kay liye ghalat par syt kya gaya haay۔.db 'tkhlyk kya jaye ga ، aur dayta frym day ayf ko is dayta bys kay andr' maiy tybl 'namy tybl main tbdyl kya jaye gha۔ aap apni zurwryat kay mtaabk dayta bys fail ka nam ، tybl nam aur dyghr pyramytrza ko aydajst krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr daymwghrafk dayta hawta haay۔aap mkhsawsa saarfyn kay tabkat ko nshanha bnanay kay liye aabadyaty rjhaanat ka tjzayha aur tsawr kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main kalm kay mjmway lagh rytrn ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap nmy aur pandaas laibryrywn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: Pythoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr Pdimport numpy btawr NP# msaal kay tawr par dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'tarykh': ['2021-01-01' ، '2021-01-02' ، '2021-01-03'.'kymt']. shft (1))# mjmway lagh-rytwrn day ayf ['cumulative_log_return'] = df ['log_return']. cumsum () prnt (df) ka hasab lghaiyn ، is msaal main ، hamary pas do kalmwn kay sath ayk dayta frym haay۔، 'tarykh' aur 'kymt'۔ham 'prais' kalm kay mjmway lagh rytrn ka hasab lghana chahti hayn۔ lagh rytrn ka hasab lghanay kay liye ، hum 'kymt' kalm aur is ki pchhly kymt kay mabyn tnasb kay kdrty lwghrthm ko lenay kay liye NP.log () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔day ayf ['kymt'] kay zaryaha haasal kya ghya۔ shft (1)۔shft (1) fnkshn mwjwdha kymt kay sath mwjwdha kymt ko sydh main karnay kay liye 'kymt' kalm ko ayk saf main bdl dyta haay۔ Next ، hum Cumsum () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey mjmway lagh rytrn ka hasab lghatay hain ، jo lagh ki mjmway rkm ka hasab lghata haay۔akdar ki wapsy۔Log_return cumulative_log_return0 2021-01-01 100 nan nan 1 2021-01-02 110 0.095310 0.0953102 2021-01-03 105 -0.0473 0.0477383 2021-04 120 0.135 hr ayk kay liye lagh un rytrn akdardn ، aur 'cumulative_log_return' kalm main hr dn tak laght ki wapsy ki akdar ka mjmway mjmwaha hawta haay۔ aap apni mkhsawsa zurwryat ko pora karnay kay liye kalm kay namwn ya hasab ktab ki mntak ko aydajst krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main aan lain ashthaar mham ka dayta hawta haay۔mwsar hadf sazay ki hakmt amlywn ki nshandhay krkay aap AD ki karkrdghy ka tjzayha aur un ko kis tarah bhatr bnaiyn ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main antrpwlyt krkay ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalnay kay l you ، aap pandawn kay zaryaha fraham krdha antrpwlyt () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PDTHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par dayta frym kay sath ghmshdha akdar kay sath = pd.dataframe ({'A': [1 ، 2 ، np.nan ، 4 ، 5] ، 'B': [10 ، NP.nan، NP.Nan ، 40 ، 50]})# antrpwlyt ghmshdha kdrwn ko day ayf_trpwlytda = day ayf۔ antrpwlyt () prnt (day ayf_trnpwlytda) is msaal main ، hamary pas do kalmwn kay sath day ayf namy ayk dayta frym hay ، js main kuch laptha hay ، js main kuch laptha haay۔NP.NAN kay zaryaha nmaindghy ki hogi akdar۔ ghmshdha akdar ko antrpwlyt karnay kay l we ، hum antrpwlyt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hain ، jo aas pas kay dayta pwaints ki bnyad par antrpwlytda akdar kay sath ghmshdha akdar ko bhrta haay۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، yeh lkyry antrpwlyshn anjam dyta haay۔ ntyjay main dayta frym ، DF_INTERPolated ، antrpwlytda akdar ki jghha lenay wali ghmshdha akdar par mushtamil hawgha: CSSCOPY kwda A B0 1.0 10.01 2.0 20.02 3.0 30.03 4.0 40.04 5.0 50.0AS ، aap kalmwn main ghmshdha kdryn dykh saktay hayn۔'awr' B 'ky jghha dstyab dayta pwaints ki bnyad par antrpwlytda akdar ki jghha li jati haay۔ aap antrpwlyt () fnkshn ko azuafy dlail fraham krkay antrpwlyshn kay tarykha kar ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bna saktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap mkhtlf rkawt kay tarykwn jesay 'lkyry' ، 'kryb tryn' ، 'slainr' ، 'chwkwr' ، wghyrha jesay tarykha kar pyramytr ki wzuahat krkay astamal krsktay hayn۔mzayd braan ، aap apnay mkhsawsa dayta frym aur antrpwlyshn ki zurwryat kay mtaabk kwda ko aydajst karnay kay liye had_ daairykshn aur had_yryha pyramytrza ka astamal karty hoey antrpwlyshn ki smt ko kntrwl krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main prwdakt rywyw dayta hawta haay۔mmknha msanwaat ki taaktwn aur kmzawrywn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aap jzabat ki tksym ka tjzayha aur tsawr kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main ayk nya kalm bnanay kay l two ، do dayt taim kalmwn kay mabyn frk ki bnyad par ، aap do kalmwn kay darmiyan - ghhtaؤ aaprytr astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kwda haay: PDTHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par dayta taim kalm ays day ayf = pd.dataframe ({'astart_dayt': ['2022-01-01' ، '2022-02-01' ، '2022-03-01' '] ، 'end_date': ['2022-01-15' ، '2022-02-20' ، '2022-03-10']})# kalmwn ko dayt taim taipdaf main tbdyl karain ['astart_dayt'] = pd.to_datetime (df۔'] prnt (day ayf) is msaal main ، hamary pas day ayf namy ayk dayta frym hay js main do dayt taim kalm hayn:' astart_dayt 'awr' aynda_dayt'.fyrst ، hum kalmwn ko PD.TO_DATETIME () fnkshn. nykst ka astamal karty hoey dayt taim taip main tbdyl karty hayn۔'end_date' aur 'start_date' kalmwn kay mabyn frk ko ghhta kar un kay frk ka hasab lghaiyn ، aur ntyjha ko ayk niay kalm 'date_differences' par tfwyzu kryn۔ ntyjay main dayta frym ، day ayf ، asal kalmwn kay sath sath niay 'dayt_ daydayfyns' kalm par mushtamil hawgha:Yamlcopy kwda start_date end_diference0 2022-01-01 2022-01-15 14 dn 1 2022-02-01 2022-02-20 19 dn 2022-03-01 2022-03-10 9 dn aap dykh saktay hain ، 'tarykh_dayfyns' kalmmtalkha 'end_date' aur 'start_date' akdar kay darmiyan frk zaahar krta hay ، js ki nmaindghy taim daylta aabjykt kay tawr par ki jati haay۔ aap zurwrt pranay par 'tarykh_dayfyns' kalm ko mazeed jwra twra krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap dt.days wsaf ka astamal karty hoey dn ki tadad nkal saktay hain ya taim daylta akdar ko wkt kay ayk mkhsawsa ywnt main tbdyl krsktay hayn۔ kwda ko apnay mkhsawsa dayta frym aur kalm namwn kay mtaabk dahalnay kay liye mft۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main sahat ki dykh bhal kay daway ka dayta hawta haay۔aap dayta mainngh ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey jaly dawؤn kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym kay kalm main mnfrd akdar ki frykwiynsy ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap pandawn kay zaryaha fraham krdha wylyw_kwnt () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par dayta frymdaf = pd.dataframe ({'zamrha': ['a' ، 'b' ، 'A' ، 'C' ، 'B' ، 'A']})# 'zamrha' kalm frykwynsy_kaؤnt = day ayf ['zamrha'] main mnfrd akdar ki frykwiynsy ghnty ka hasab lghaiyn۔ wylyw_kaؤnts () prnt (frykwynsy_kaؤnt) is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk dayta frym hay js ka nam day ayf hay js main 'zamrha' par mushtamil hay js main 'zamrha' haay۔'zamrha' kalm main mnfrd akdar ki frykwiynsy ghnty ka hasab lghaiyn ، hum kalm par wylyw_kwnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔ntyjha mtghyr frykwynsy_kaؤnt ko tfwyzu kya gaya haay۔ aaؤt pt un kay mtalkha shmar kay sath 'zamrha' kalm main anwkhy akdar ko zaahar kray gha: CSSCOPY CODEA 3B 2C 1Name: zamrha ، DTYPE: INT64AS aap dykh saktay hain ، aaؤt pt anwkhy akdar ko zaahar krta hay '۔'،' by '، awr' sy '' zamrha 'kalm aur un sy mtalkha tadd myn۔msaal kay tawr par ، frykwynsy_kaؤnt ['A'] aap ko apnay mkhsawsa dayta frym aur kalm nam kay mtaabk kwda main trmym karnay kay liye 'A'.feel ki kymt kay liye ghnty fraham kray gha۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main swshl mydaya par asar andaza hawta haay۔aap un kay mwad kay zamray aur samayn kay aadadwshmar ki bnyad par asar wa rswkh ka tjzayha aur drjha bndy kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta taim aabjykt main dawr kay kalm ko dayta frym main tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap PD.TO_DATETIME () fnkshn ko pandawn kay zaryaha fraham krdha fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yha fnkshn farmyt pyramytr ki wzuahat krkay mkhtlf tarykh kay farmyts ko snbhal sakta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par tarykh kalm day ayf = pd.dataframe ({'tarykh': ['2022-01-01' ، '02/01/2022 '،' 2022-03-15 '.، ghltayan = 'prwsrs') prnt (day ayf) is msaal main ، hamary pas day ayf namy ayk dayta frym hay js main 'tarykh' namy kalm hay js main mkhtlf shklwn main tarykh ki kdr hawty haay۔ 'tarykh' kalm ko dayt taim aabjykt main tbdyl karnay kay liye ، hum PD astamal karty hayn۔kalm par .to_datetime () fnkshn۔ham 'Yyyy-mm-DD' kay mtwka farmyt ki nshandhay karnay kay liye '٪ y- ٪ m- ٪ d' kay tawr par farmyt pyramytr ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ghltayan = 'prwrs' pyramytr ko kesi bhi akdar ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jsay tbdyl nahin kya jaskta hay aur inhain NAT (ayk wkt nhayn) kdr kay tawr par syt kya jaskta haay۔ ntyjay main dayta frym ، day ayf ، 'tarykh' kalm main tbdyl shuda dayt taim aabjykt par mushtamil hawgha: yaml kwpy kwdaDATE0 2022-01-011 2022-02-012 2022-03-153 2022-04-15AS aap dykh saktay hain ، 'tarykh' kalm mkhtlf tarykh ki shklwn sy ktaa nzar ، 'tarykh' kalm ko dayt taim aabjykt main tbdyl krdya jata haay۔ agar 'tarykh main koi kymt haay۔'kalm ko mkhsawsa shkl ki bnyad par dayt taim aabjykt main tbdyl nahin kya jaskta ، isy NAT kay sath tbdyl kya jaye gha۔ aap apni tarykhwn kay mkhsawsa farmyt sy mlnay kay liye farmyt pyramytr ko aydajst krsktay hayn۔dstyab farmyt kwdaza kay liye Strftime hadayt namha (https://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#strfume-and-strptime-format-codes) par azaghr dstawyzaat ka hawalha dyn۔apnay dayta frym aur kalm ka nam ft kryn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr braؤzangh ka dayta hawta haay۔aap saarf ki trjyhaat aur tarza aml ki bnyad par wyb sait kay mwad ka tjzayha aur zaaty nwayt ka tjzayha karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym kay kalm main lghatar ktaarwn kay mabyn fysad ki tbdyly ka hasab lghanay kay liye ، aap pandawn kay zaryaha fraham krdha PCT_CHANGE () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par PD# frym kalm day ayf = PD.Dataframe ({'akdar': [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 30]})# main mslsl ktaar kay darmiyan fysad ki tbdyly ka hasab lghaiyn '۔akdar 'kalm day ayf [' fysad tbdyly ']] = day ayf [' akdar ']'akdar' kalm main lghatar ktaarwn kay mabyn tbdyl karain ، hum kalm par PCT_CHANGE () fnkshn astamal karty hayn۔fysad ki tbdyly ko haasal karnay kay liye ntyjha 100 sy zurb haay۔ham dayta frym main 'fysad ki tbdyly' kay nam sy ayk niay kalm main hasab ktab ki fysad ki tbdyly ko tfwyzu karty hayn۔ ntyjay main dayta frym ، day ayf ، asal 'akdar' kalm kay sath sath hasab ktab main bhi hawgha: ryazuy ka kwda wylywza fysad fysad tbdyly 0 NAN1 20 100.000000215 -25.0000003 25 66.6666674 30 20.00000000 aap dykh saktay hain ، 'fysad tbdyly' kalm 'akdar' kalm main lghatar ktaarwn kay mabyn fysad ki tbdyly ki nmaindghy krta haay۔phaly saf ki nan ki kymt hay kywnkha fysad ki tbdyly ka hasab lghanay kay liye pchhly ktaar nahin haay۔ aap apnay mkhsawsa dayta frym aur kalm nam kay mtaabk kwda main trmym krsktay hayn۔ nwt: py sy ty_chynj () fnkshn mwjwdha ktaar ki bnyad par fysad ki tbdyly ka hasab lghata haay۔kdr aur pchhly saf ki kymt۔aghr aap mkhtlf kalm ya mkhsawsa saf kay wkfwn ki bnyad par fysad ki tbdyly ka hasab lghana chahti hain tou ، aap is kay mtaabk kwda ko aydajst krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main tryfk haadsaay ka dayta hawta haay۔aap un awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ga jo haadsaat main maawn hain aur ahatyatay tdabyr ki tjwyza pysh karty hayn؟
Answer: kesi dayta frym main kesi kalm kay wzan waly wsta ka hasab lghanay kay l another ، kesi dusray kalm ko wzan kay tawr par astamal karty hoey ، aap pandawn kay sath mil kar npy laibryry ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr py daympwrt nympy kay tawr par NP# msaal kay tawr par kalm 'wylywza' aur 'wyt' day ayf = py day aay day aay ayf aar aay aym ({'akdar': [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 30] ، 'wzan kay sath dayta frym': [0.2 ، 0.3 ، 0.1 ، 0.2 ، 0.2]})# wzan waly awsta wytda_myan = np.average (df [' values '] ، wzan = df [' wzan ']) prnt ("wzan ka mtalb:" ، wzan walay_myan ka hasab lghaiyn) is msaal main ، hamary pas day ayf namy ayk dayta frym hay js main do kalm hayn: 'akdar' aur 'wzan'۔'akdar' kalm main addy akdar par mushtamil hay ، aur 'wzan' kalm main hr kdr kay l the isi wzan par mushtamil hawta haay۔ wzan kay many ka hasab lghanay kay l we ، hum np.vverage () fnkshn ko numpy sy astamal karty hayn۔ham 'akdar' kalm ko awstaa values akdar aur 'wzan' kalm ko isi tarah kay wzan kay tawr par mntkl karty hayn۔ntyjha mtghyr wytda_myan ko tfwyzu kya gaya haay۔wzan kay hasab sy hasab ktab ko sahayha tarykay sy anjam dyn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main ayir lain flait dayta hawta haay۔takhyr ko kam sy kam karnay aur wkty karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l you aap flait shydawlngh ka tjzayha aur bhatr bnaiyn ghay؟
Answer: ayksplwrytry dayta anylysys (ay day aay) daytasyt main khsawsayat aur nmwnwn ki janch aur smjhnay ka aml haay۔as main bnyady dahanchay ، talkat aur rjhaanat ko nngha karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar ki zuaf aur aadad wa shmar ki khwj shaml haay۔ ay day aay kay bnyady ahadaf yeh hayn: dayta ki tfhaym: ay day aay daytasyt ki bhatr tfhaym haasal karnay main mdd krta hay ، bshmwl is kay mtghyrat ، un ki tksym aur is kay mabyn mmknha talkat shaml hayn۔anhaynyha dayta kay mayar ، tkmyl aur mmknha amwr kay baray main bsayrt fraham krta haay۔ dayta ki safaiy aur pry prwsysngh: ay day aay daytasyt main ghmshdha akdar ، aaؤt lyirza ya tzuadat ki nshandhay karnay main mdd krta haay۔an msail ka ptha lghanay aur un ka azaalha karnay sy ، ay day aay mazeed tjzayha kay l the aadad wa shmar kay mayar aur wshwsnyyta ko bhatr bnanay main maawn haay۔yha aadad wa shmar main mmknha artbata ، anhasaar ، ya ghrwha bndy ki nshandhay karnay main mdd krta hay ، jo mazeed tjzayha aur madalngh kay fysalwn ki rhanmaiy krskta haay۔ fychr ka antkhab aur anjynirngh: ay day aay tjzayha kay l relevant mtalkha khsawsayat ya mtghyrat kay antkhab main mdd krta haay۔mtghyr kay talkat aur tksym ko smjhnay sy ، ay day aay fychr anjynirngh kay aml ki rhanmaiy krskta hay ، jahan mwjwdha chyzawn sy niy many khyza khsawsayat pyda ki jati hayn۔ insights aur mfrwzuha nsl: EDA aksar thakyky swalat aur mfrwzuwn ki tshkyl ka baasa bnta haay۔aadad wa shmar ko zuaf aur aadadwshmar sy tlash krkay ، tjzayha kar aadad wa shmar main talkat ya nmwnwn kay baray main nzaryat aur mfrwzuay pyda krsktay hain ، jn ki mazeed janch aur twsayk ki jaskty haay۔yha dayta kay msail ki nshandhay karnay ، dayta ki khsawsayat ko smjhnay ، nmwnwn aur talkat ko dryaft karnay aur mazeed tftysh kay l ins bsayrt pyda karnay main mdd krta haay۔ay day aay dayta kay tjzayha karwn ko bakhbr fysalay karnay aur aadad wa shmar sy many khyza bsayrt haasal karnay kay kabl bnata hay ، js sy balaakhr zayada drst aur kabl aatmad ntaij braamd hawtay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr fyda byk dayta hawta haay۔kdrty zaban prwsysngh ki tknyk ka astamal karty hoey aap aaraa kay anwanat ka tjzayha aur drjha bndy kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: azaghr main rysrch dayta anylysys (ay day aay) anjam denay kay l you ، aap ko aam tawr par mtadd laibryrywn ko draamd karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay jo dayta main hayra phyry ، tsawr aur aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay kay l various mkhtlf afaal aur awzaar mhaya karty hayn۔azaghr main ay day aay kay liye aam tawr par astamal hony wali laibryrywn main shaml hayn: pandaas: dayta frym aur syryza jesay dayta dahanchay kay sath kam karnay kay liye pandaas laibryry draamd karain ، jo dayta tjzayha kay kamwn main braay pymanay par astamal hawtay hayn۔pandaas dayta ki hayra phyry ، safaiy sthraiy ، aur tbdyly kay liye fnkshnlyan mhaya krta haay۔ pythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas ko btawr PDNUMPY: addy safwn kay sath kam karnay kay liye nypy laibryry draamd karain aur aadad wa shmar par ryazuy ki karrwaiywn ko anjam dyn۔mwsar dayta prwsysngh kay liye pandawn kay sath aksar nmy ka astamal kya jata haay۔mytplwtlyb mkhtlf ksm kay platngh afaal aur tkhsaysa kay akhtyarat fraham krta haay۔smndry bwrn zuaf dlksh aur malwmaty plat bnanay kay liye aaly stahay afaal mhaya krta haay۔yha kyas aaraiywn ki janch ، tksym ، aur zayada sy zayada kay liye aadad wa shmar kay afaal aur twlza ki ayk rynj pysh krta haay۔plat sy aap ko antrayktw plat ، chart ، aur daysh bwrdaza bnanay ki ajazat dyta hay jo wyb ayply kyshnza main shyir aur srayt krsktay hayn۔askykyt lrn dayta pry prwsysngh ، fychr nkalnay ، aur nghrany/ghyr nghrany sykhnay kay liye afaal mhaya krta haay۔apnay tjzayha kay mkhsawsa kamwn aur zurwryat par mnhasar hay ، aap ko azuafy laibryrywn ya madaywlza ko draamd karnay ki zurwrt praskty haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main aan lain ghymngh dayta hawta haay۔aap khlaraywn kay tarza aml aur mnghny mytrks ka astamal karty hoey plyir mn ghhrat ka tjzayha aur pysh ghwiy karain ghay؟
Answer: ayksplwrytry dayta anylysys (ay day aay) kay liye daytasyt ko pandaas dayta frym main lwda karnay kay l you ، aap pandawn kay zaryaha fraham krdha mkhtlf afaal astamal krsktay hayn۔fnkshn ka antkhab aap kay daytasyt ki fail farmyt par mnhasar haay۔daytasyts ki mkhtlf aksam ko lwda karnay kay kuch aam tarykay yeh hayn: CSV (kwma sy alag shuda akdar) fail: CSV fail ko dayta fym main lwda karnay kay liye READ_CSV () fnkshn ka astamal kryn۔.read_csv ('path_to_file.csv') ayksl fail: ayk ayksyl fail ko dayta fym main ayksl fail ko lwda karnay kay liye prahyn_ssl () fnkshn ka astamal kryn۔JSON (jawa askrpt aabjykt nwtyshn) fail: JSON fail ko dayta fym main lwda karnay kay liye ryda_jsn () fnkshn ka astamal kryn۔READ_SQL () ayk SQL dayta bys kay astfsar sy dayta ko dayta frym main lwda karnay kay liye fnkshn۔'tybl_ nam'daf = PD.READ_SQL (astfsar ، kwn) sy mntkhb karain * dyghr fail farmyts: pandaas mkhtlf dyghr fail farmyts jesay aych day ayf ، parkyt ، pnkh wghyrha sy dayta lwda karnay ki hamayt krta haay۔ dayta ko lwda karnay kay liye mkhsawsa afaal kay liye pandaas dstawyzaat ka hawalha dyn۔an farmytwn say۔ daytasyt ko dayta frym main lwda karnay kay bad ، aap ay day aay kay mkhtlf kam anjam dy saktay hain ، jesay aadad wa shmar ka maainha karna ، kalm kay aadadwshmar ki khwj ، dayta ko tsawr karna ، aur bohat kchh۔

Question: ykyna!amydwar kay rysrch dayta tjzayha (ay day aay) ki mhaart ko janchnay kay liye 100 mazeed tkhlyky swalat yeh hayn:
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym kay tawl wa arzu (ktaar aur kalm) ki janch pratal kay l you ، aap shkl wsaf ko astamal krsktay hayn۔shkl wsaf ayk tpl lwtata hay jo farm (ktaaryn ، kalm) main dayta frym kay tawl wa arzu ki nmaindghy krta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PD## AS PD# kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas ayk nmwnha bnaiyn daytafrymyta = {'nam': ['jan' ، 'ayma' ، 'pytr'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 28 ، 30] ، 'shhar':۔day ayf main 3 ktaaryn aur 3 kalm hayn۔aaؤt pt (3 ، 3) asharha krta hay keh dayta frym main 3 ktaaryn aur 3 kalm hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main swshl mydaya saarf ka dayta hawta haay۔saarf kay tarza aml aur mnghny mytrks main nmwnwn ka astamal karty hoey aap jaly ya bwt akaؤnts ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: pandaas ayk mshhawr awpn swrs azaghr laibryry hay jo dayta main hayra phyry aur tjzayha kay liye astamal hawty haay۔yha sakhty aadad wa shmar ، jesay tyblr dayta ، taim syryza ، aur bohat kuch kay sath mwsar andaza main kam karnay kay liye dayta dahanchay aur afaal fraham krta haay۔pandaas nmy kay sab sy upar tamyr kya gaya hay ، jo addy kmpywtngh kay liye ayk aur taaktwr azaghr laibryry haay۔ yahan pandawn ki kuch aham khsawsayat hayn: dayta dahanchay: pandaas syryza aur dayta frym namy do bnyady dayta dahanchay mtaarf krata haay۔ayk slslha ayk jhaty lybl laga hoa srny hay jo kesi bhi dayta ki ksm ko thamnay kay kabl hay ، aur dayta frym do jhaty lybl laga hoa dayta dahanchha hay js main mmknha tawr par mkhtlf aksam kay kalm hayn۔yha dahanchay aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay ، jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay main aasan bnatay hayn۔ dayta hayra phyry: pandaas dayta ko jwra twra karnay kay liye wsya pymanay par afaal aur tarykwn ko fraham krta haay۔aap un afaal ka astamal karty hoey apnay dayta par mkhtlf aapryshnza ko fltr ، trtyb ، mjmway ، niy shkl dy saktay hain aur anjam dy saktay hayn۔yha ayk sy zayada dayta frymwn par zum ، shaml hony ، aur mhawr sazay ki bhi ajazat dyta haay۔ dayta ki safaiy: pandaas ghmshdha dayta ko snbhalnay aur dayta ki safaiy kay kamwn ko anjam denay kay l tools twlza pysh krta haay۔aap ghmshdha akdar ka ptha lghasktay hain aur un ko door krsktay hain ، un ko mnasb akdar sy tbdyl krsktay hain ، ya mkhtlf tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey ghmshdha dayta ko antrpwlyt krsktay hayn۔ dayta un pt/aaؤt pt: pandaas mkhtlf fail farmyts ، jesay sy ays wy ، ayksl ، ays kyw ayl dayta bys ، aur sy dayta prahnay aur lkhnay ki hamayt krta haay۔mzayd.yha mkhtlf zaraia sy dayta draamd karnay ، is par karrwaiy karnay aur ntaij braamd karnay kay afaal mhaya krta haay۔ taim syryza ka tjzayha: pandawn main taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar kay sath kam karnay ki wsya salahaytyn hayn۔yha tarykh/wkt ki asharyha sazay ، dwbarha trtyb denay ، tadd tbadlwn ، wkt ki tbdyly aur bohat kuch kay liye faalyt fraham krta haay۔yha khsawsayat khasa tawr par wkt par mnhasar aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha karnay main mfyd hayn۔ dyghr laibryrywn kay sath anzumam: pandaas dyghr mshhawr azaghr laibryrywn ، jesay nwmy ، mytplwtlyb aur ays sy aai py aai kay sath achhy tarah sy mrbwta hawta haay۔yha baghair kesi rkawt kay anzumam aur bahamy taawn ki ajazat dyta hay ، js sy aap ko apnay dayta tjzayha main mkhtlf laibryrywn ki taakt ka faidha athanay kay kabl bnata haay۔yha dayta hayra phyry aur tjzayha kay liye ayk taaktwr aur mwsar frym wrk mhaya krta hay ، js sy yeh bohat sy dayta pyshha wr afrad aur mhakkyn kay liye antkhab ka antkhab hawta haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr fyda byk dayta hawta haay۔msanwaat ki tazaha karywn ya markytngh ki mhamat kay asarat ki nshandhay karnay kay l time aap wkt kay sath jzabat kay rjhaanat ka tjzayha aur tsawr kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: pandaas ayk taaktwr awpn swrs azaghr laibryry hay jo dayta tjzayha aur hayra phyry main braay pymanay par astamal hawty haay۔yha astamal main aasany sy dayta dahanchay aur dayta tjzayha kay twlza mhaya krta hay ، js sy yeh sakhtha aadad wa shmar kay sath kam karnay kay liye ayk mkbwl antkhab hawta haay۔ yahan kuch wjwhaat hain keh pandawn ko dayta tjzayha main wsya pymanay par astamal kya jata haay: dayta dahanchay: pandaas do aham dayta dahanchay ، syryza aur mtaarf kratay hayn۔dayta frym۔ayk slslha ayk jhaty lybl laga hoa saf hay jo kesi bhi dayta ki ksm ka anakad krskta hay ، jabky dayta frym do jhaty lybl laga hoa dayta dahanchha hay js main mmknha tawr par mkhtlf aksam kay kalm hayn۔yha dahanchay dayta ko zakhyrha karnay ، jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha mhaya karty hayn۔ dayta hayra phyry: pandaas dayta hayra phyry kay liye wsya pymanay par afaal aur tarykwn ki pysh ksh krta haay۔aap sadha aur bdyhay nhaw ka astamal karty hoey fltr ، trtyb ، ghrwp ، mjmway ، mhawr ، aur aadad wa shmar ko tbdyl krsktay hayn۔yha karwaiyan aap ko tjzayha kay l data dayta saaf karnay ، tbdyl karnay aur tyar karnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔ dayta hayndalngh ko yad karty hawiay: hakyky dnya kay aadad wa shmar main aksar ghmshdha akdar shaml hawty hayn۔pandaas ghmshdha dayta ko snbhalnay kay l tools twlza mhaya krta hay ، js sy aap mkhtlf hakmt amlywn ki bnyad par ghmshdha akdar ka ptha lghanay ، hatanay ya bhrnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔as lchk sy yeh ykyny bnanay main mdd mlty hay keh ghmshdha dayta tjzayha kay aml main mdakhlt nahin krta haay۔ dayta anzumam: pandaas baghair kesi rkawt kay baghair azadwajy tawr par dyghr laibryrywn kay sath mrbwta hawta hay ، jesay azaghr dayta mahawlyaty nzaam ، jesay nmy ، mytplwtlyb aur askypy۔yha anzumam aap ko mtadd laibryrywn ki taakt ko ykja karnay ki ajazat dyta hay takha aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha kay pychydha kamwn ko mwsar andaza main anjam diya jaskay۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap aasany sy nmy ka astamal karty hoey ryazuy ki karrwaiywn ka atalak krsktay hain ، mytplwtlyb ka astamal karty hoey dayta ko tsawr krsktay hain ، aur pandawn kay sath sath ays sy aai py waiy ka astamal karty hoey aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha krsktay hayn۔ taim syryza tjzayha: pandaas ko taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay kay liye wsya pymanay par mdd haasal haay۔yha wkt par mnhasar aadad wa shmar ko snbhalnay kay liye khsawsay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay aur afaal mhaya krta hay ، js main tarykh/wkt ki asharyha sazay ، dwbarha trtyb denay ، wkt ki shftngh ، aur tadd ki tbdyly shaml haay۔yha khsawsayat dnyawy ajzaaa kay sath aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha karnay kay liye khasa tawr par kabl kdr hayn۔ dayta I/O: pandaas mkhtlf fail farmyts say/prahnay aur lkhnay ki shawlt fraham krta hay ، bshmwl CSV ، ayksl ، ays kyw ayl dayta bys ، aur bohat kchh۔yha mkhtlf zaraia sy dayta draamd karnay ، is par karrwaiy karnay aur ntaij braamd karnay kay liye aasan afaal fraham krta haay۔as lchk sy mkhtlf fail farmyts kay aadad wa shmar kay sath kam karna aasan hawjata hay aur byrwny aadad wa shmar kay zaraia kay sath mrbwta hawta haay۔ awwr ، pandaas mwsar aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ، taaktwr hayra phyry ki salahaytwn ، aur dyghr laibryrywn kay sath hamwar anzumam ki frahamy kay zaryaha dayta tjzayha kay wrk flw ko aasan aur tyza krta haay۔as kay saarf dwst antrfys aur wsya faalyt nay isy azaghr main dayta tjzayha kay kamwn kay liye janay wali laibryry bna diya haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main aan lain ghymngh dayta hawta haay۔aap mych mykngh alghwrthm ko bhatr bnanay kay liye khlaraywn ki mhaart ki staha aur karkrdghy kay rjhaanat ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: azaghr main pandaas laibryry draamd karnay kay l you ، aap draamd ki mtalwbha alfaza ko astamal krsktay hain js kay bad laibryry ka nam "pandaas" haay۔yha nhaw haay: paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaashwwr ، yeh ayk aam rwaj hay keh pandawn ko arf kay sath draamd kya jaye takha aap kay kwda main laibryry ka hawalha dena aasan hawjaiay۔pandawn kay liye astamal hony wala sab sy aam arf "PD" haay۔yhaan aap arf kay sath pandawn ko draamd krsktay hayn: paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas is draamdy byan kay sath ، aap "PD" arf ka astamal karty hoey pandaas afaal aur klaswn tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، dayta frym bnanay kay l you ، aap PD.Dataframe () astamal krsktay hain ، aur CSV fail ko prahnay kay l you ، aap PD.read_csv () astamal krsktay hayn۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh aap ko aap kay samnay aap kay azaghr mahawl main pandaas anstal karnay ki zurwrt haay۔asay draamd krskta haay۔aap apnay trmynl ya kmanda prampt main mndrjha zayl kmanda chla kar PIP pykyj mynyjr ka astamal karty hoey pandawn ko anstal krsktay hayn: kapy kwdapp anstal pandaas pandaa anstal hay ، aap isy apnay azaghr askrpt ya antrayktw syshn main draamd krsktay hain aur dayta tjzayha kay kamwn kay liye is ki faalyt ko astamal karna shrwa krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya gaya hay js main kstmr ki khrydary ki tarykh haay۔aap mhasawl ko brahanay kay l cross frwkht aur brahty hui mwaka ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: pandawn main ، aap pd.dataframe () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey lght sy dayta frym tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔lght ki chabyan kalm kay namwn kay tawr par astamal hon gi ، aur akdar ko mtalkha kalmwn kay aadad wa shmar kay tawr par astamal kya jaye gha۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dakshnry dayta bnaiyn = {'nam': ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan' ، 'lndaa'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42 ، 50].kwda ka nam amr sty 0 jan 28 nyw yark 1 aymly 35 shkaghw 2 ryan 42 las aynjls 3 lndaa 50 san fransskwin is msaal kay tawr par ، lght kay aadad wa shmar main tyn chabyan ('nam' ، 'amr' ، 'shhar') aur un ki mtalkha akdar shaml hayn۔as kay bad pd.dataframe () fnkshn ko lght sy dayta frym DF bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ dakshnry main ayk klyd dayta frym main ayk kalm bn jati hay ، aur is sy wabstha akdar un kalmwn main dayta bn jati hayn۔dayta frym main kalmwn ka aardar lght main chabyan kay trtyb sy mmasal hawgha۔har kalm ki akdar ko un ki asharyha pwzayshn ki bnyad par mnslk kya jaye gha۔ aap apnay dayta par dayta tjzayha kay kamwn ko anjam denay kay liye mkhtlf pandaas afaal aur tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hain aur un main hayra phyry krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main mryzuwn ki sahat kay rykarda mwjwd hayn۔sahat ki dykh bhal kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay kay l you aap taby alaj aur ntaij kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym ki shkl ki janch pratal kay l you ، aap shkl wsaf ko astamal krsktay hayn۔shkl wsaf ayk tpl lwtata hay jo dayta frym kay tawl wa arzu ki nmaindghy krta haay۔tpl ka pehla ansar ktaarwn ki tadad ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur dusra ansar kalmwn ki tadad ki nmaindghy krta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan' ، 'lndaa'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42 ، 50].(4 ، 3) is msaal main ، shkl wsaf ko dayta frym day ayf par kaha jata haay۔aaؤt pt (4 ، 3) is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh dayta frym main 4 ktaaryn aur 3 kalm hayn۔ dayta frym ki shkl ki janch pratal kay zaryaha ، aap jldy sy is kay saiza aur tawl wa arzu ka tayn krsktay hain ، jo aap kay dayta ki sakht aur dairha kar ko smjhnay kay liye mfyd haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main maly lyn dyn ka dayta hawta haay۔nyt wrk tjzayha ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey aap jaly nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym ki pehli N ktaarwn tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay l you ، aap hayda () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔hayda () ka tarykha ayk nya dayta frym waps krta hay js main asal dayta frym kay aaghaza sy ktaarwn ki mkhsawsa tadad par mushtamil haay۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، agar koi pyramytr fraham nahin kya jata hay tou yeh pehli 5 ktaaryn lwtata haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY CODEMPORT pandaas PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan' ، 'lndaa' ، 'daywda'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ،42 ، 50 ، 45] ، 'shhar': ['nywyark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls' ، 'san fransskw' ، 'syitl' ، 'syitl']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# pehlay 3 Rowsfirst_three_rows tak rsaiy haasal kryn= df.head (3)# rzalt prnt (First_there_rows) aaؤt pt dasplay kryn: SQLCOPY kwda nam ki amr sty 0 jan 28 nyw yark 1 aymly 35 shkaghw 2 ryan 42 las aynjnsn is msaal kay tawr par ، hayda (3) ka tarykha dayta frym day ayf par blaya gaya hay takha isy bazayaft kya jaskay۔phaly 3 ktaaryn۔ntyjha frst_thry_rwza dayta frym main mhafwza haay۔frst_thry_rw prntngh mtalwbha aaؤt pt ko dkhata haay۔ aap kesi bhi msabt add ayn ki wzuahat krsktay hain takha dayta frym ki pehli ayn ktaarwn tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay liye sr () kay tarykha kar ki dlyl kay tawr pr۔as sy aap ko aadad wa shmar kay sbsyt ko jldy sy janchnay aur is ki sakht aur akdar ka ahasas haasal karnay ki shawlt mlty haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main mlazamt kay drkhwast dhandghan ka dayta hawta haay۔aap kis tarah un awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ga jo bhrty ki hakmt amlywn ko bhatr bnanay kay liye mlazamt ki kamyab jghhawn main maawn hayn؟
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym sy mkhsawsa kalmwn ko mntkhb karnay kay l you ، aap kalm kay namwn ya LOC ya ILOC rsar kay sath andayksngh astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch nktaha nzar hayn: kalm kay namwn kay sath asharyha sazay: aap mrba brykt [] astamal krsktay hain aur andayks kay tawr par kalm kay namwn ki fharst fraham krsktay hayn۔yha sirf mntkhb kalmwn kay sath ayk nya dayta frym waps kray gha۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'shhar': [[[shhar ': [[28 ، 35 ، 42]'nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# mkhsawsa kalm slyktda_kwlmza = day ayf [['nam' ، 'shhar']]# ko mntkhb karain (mntkhb_kwlmza) aaؤt pt dasplay kryn: SQLCOPY: SQLCOPYkwda ka nam sty 0 jan nyw yark 1 aymly shkaghw 2 ryan las aynjlysysngh ayl aw sy ayksysr: lwk ayksysr lybl par mbny andayksngh ki ajazat dyta hay ، jahan aap dono ktaar aur kalm lybl ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔mkhsawsa kalmwn ko mntkhb karnay kay l you ، aap bray aant kay sath LOC astamal krsktay hayn: tamam ktaaryn mntkhb karnay aur kalm kay namwn ko btawr fharst byan karnay kay liay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'shhar': [[[shhar ': [[28 ، 35 ، 42]'nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# locedected_colums = df.loc [: ، ['nam' ، 'shhar'] ka astamal karty hoey mkhsawsa kalm mntkhb kryn۔.mkhsawsa kalmwn ko mntkhb karnay kay l you ، aap ILOC ko ayk bray aant kay sath astamal krsktay hayn: tamam ktaaryn mntkhb karnay aur kalm pwzayshnwn ko add ki fharst kay tawr par byan karnay kay liay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'shhar': [[[shhar ': [[28 ، 35 ، 42]'nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ilocselectect_colums = df.iloc ka astamal karty hoey mkhsawsa kalm mntkhb karain [: ، [0 ، 2]]# ntaij prnt (mntkhb_kalm) aaؤt pt dasplay kryn: SQLCOPY kwda ka nam sty 0 jan nyw yark 1 aymly shkaghw 2 ryan las aynjlysn tynwn nktaha nzar ، aap dayta frym sy mkhsawsa kalmwn ko mntkhb karnay kay liye kalm namwn ya kalm pwzayshnwn ki fharst fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main swshl mydaya par asar andaza hawta haay۔aap un kay tarykhy aadad wa shmar ki bnyad par asar wa rswkh ki karkrdghy ki pymaish ka tjzayha aur pysh ghwiy kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: pandawn ki haalt par mbny dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay l you ، aap bwlyn andayksngh ka astamal krsktay hayn۔bwlyn andayksngh aap ko bwlyn mask bnanay ki ajazat dyty hay jo ayk mkhsawsa haalt ki bnyad par ktaaryn mntkhb krty haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan' ، 'lndaa'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42 ، 50].> 30]# fltrda dayta fym prnt (fltrda_ day ayf) aaؤt pt dasplay kryn: kapy kwda nam ki amr sty 1 aymly 35 shkaghw 2 ryan 42 las aynjls 3 lndaa 50 san fransskwin is msaal kay tawr par ، haalt day ayf ['amr']> 30 ayk bwlyn mask bnata hay jo schaiy ka andazaha krta haay۔ktaarwn kay liye jahan 'amr' kalm ki kymt 30 sy zayada hay aur dusri sawrt main ghalat haay۔mrba brykt kay andr is bwlyn mask ka astamal karty hoey [] dayta frym ko fltr krta hay ، sirf woh ktaaryn waps karty hain jo haalt ko pora krty hayn۔ aap mkhtlf mayarwn ki bnyad par ktaar ko fltr karnay kay liye haalt ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bna saktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap dayta frym main dusray kalmwn ki bnyad par mtadd shraita ya fltr ktaar ko ykja karnay kay liye mntaky aaprytrza (awr kay liye aur ، |shraita ، aap ko aasany sy pychydha dayta fltrngh kay kam anjam denay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr ki shkayt ka dayta hawta haay۔msanwaat ya khdmat main bhatry ko trjyha denay kay l you aap aam drd kay nkat ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym main kalmwn ka nam tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap nam () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔nam tbdyl karnay ka tarykha aap ko ayk lght fraham karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jahan klydyn mwjwdha kalm kay nam hain aur akdar niay kalm kay nam hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'shhar': [[[shhar ': [[28 ، 35 ، 42]'nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# nam kalmzanyw_kwlwm_nymza = {'nam': 'mkml nam' ، 'amr': 'amr' ، 'shhar': 'mkam '} df = df.rename (kalm = new_column_names)# namzad kalm prnt (day ayf) aaؤt pt kay sath dayta frym dasplay kryn: SQLCOPY kwda mkml nam amr ki amr 0kalm pyramytr kay sath niay_ kalm_ namwn ki lght kay sath dayta frym day ayf par blaya jata haay۔lght mwjwdha kalm kay namwn ki mypngh ko mtalwbha niay kalm kay namwn ki wzuahat krty haay۔ nam () kay tarykha kar ka ntyjha dayta frym (DF = df.rename (kalm = new_column_names)) par tfwyzu karty hoey ، asal dayta frym kay sath trmym ki hogi haay۔niay kalm kay nam۔ aap apnay mtalwbha kalm nam ki tbdylywn sy mlnay kay liye niay_ kalm_ nam ki lght main trmym krsktay hayn۔nwt karain keh aap ko sirf un kalmwn ko shaml karnay ki zurwrt hay jn ka nam aap lght main namzad karna chahti hain ، kesi bhi kalmwn ko chhwra kar jsay aap tbdyl karna chahti hayn۔ nam tbdyl karnay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ، aap kalmwn ko aasany sy kesi dayta frym main nam tbdyl krsktay hain takha un ko mazeed wzuahaty ya sydh main laiyn۔apnay tjzayha ki zurwryat kay sath۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main aan lain prwdakt kay jaizaay hawtay hayn۔msanwaat ki trky ki rhanmaiy kay l you aap kis tarah baasar msanwaat ki khsawsayat aur jzabat ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ghay؟
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym sy kalm chhwranay kay l you ، aap darap () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔darap () ka tarykha aap ko un kay namwn ya pwzayshnwn ki wzuahat krkay ayk ya zayada kalmwn ko hatanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yhaan kuch nktaha nzar hayn: nam kay lhaaza sy kalm darap kryn: aap mtalkha kalmwn ko hatanay kay liye darap () kay tarykha kar main ayk hi kalm ka nam ya kalm kay namwn ki fharst fraham krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'shhar': [[[shhar ': [[28 ، 35 ، 42]'nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ayk hi kalm day ayf = df.drop ('amr' ، mhawr = 1)# darap ayk sy zayada kalm ays day ayf = df.drop (darap karain (۔kalm kay nam 'amr' ، 'nam' ، aur 'sty' kay sath dayta frym day ayf pr۔mhawr = 1 pyramytr yeh wazuha krta hay keh kalm ghraiay jaiyn۔ntyjay main dayta frym main koi kalm nahin hawta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: Pdthoncopy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# ayk dayta frymyta = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، 'ryan'] ، 'amr': [28 ، 35 ، 42] ، 'shhar': [[[shhar ': [[28 ، 35 ، 42]'nyw yark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# kalm bazaria pwzayshn day ayf = df.drop (df.columons [[1 ، 2]] ، mhawr = 1)# dasplayntyjay main dayta frym prnt (day ayf) aaؤt pt: kapy kwda ka nam 0 jan 1 aymly 2 ryanyn is msaal kay tawr par ، darap () ka tarykha dayta frym day ayf par kal kalm pyramytr kay sath kya jata hay js main DF.COLLUMS [[1 ، 2]] par syt kya jata haay۔yha kalm 1 aur 2 (kalm 'amr' aur 'shhar') par kalmwn ko ghrata haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym sirf 'nam' kalm brkrar rkhta haay۔ mnasb pyramytrza kay sath darap () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ، aap kalmwn ko dayta frym sy hata saktay hain aur un kalmwn kay baghair ayk nya dayta frym haasal krsktay hayn۔yad rakhien keh ntyjha ko dayta frym ya kesi niay mtghyr ko trmym shuda dayta frym par kbzuha karnay kay liye waps tfwyzu kryn۔

Question: aap ko ay kamrs sylza dayta par mushtamil ayk daytasyt diya jata haay۔anwyntry mynjmnt ko bhatr bnanay kay l you aap mwsmy talb kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalna dayta tjzayha aur pry prwsysngh ka ayk aham kdm haay۔pandaas ghmshdha akdar ko mؤsar tarykay sy snbhalnay kay liye mtadd tarykay mhaya krta haay۔yhaan kuch aam tknykyn hayn: ghmshdha akdar ki janch pratal: aap dayta frym main ghmshdha akdar ki nshandhay karnay kay liye isnull () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yha asal ki tarah ayk hi shkl ka dayta frym lwtata hay ، jahan hr kdr drst hay agar asal dayta frym main mtalkha kymt ghaib hay ، aur dusri sawrt main ghalat haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# ghmshdha kdrwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn = {'nam': ['jan' ، 'aymly' ، koi bhi nahin ، 'lndaa'] ، 'amr': [28 ، koi nahin ، 42 ، 50] ، 'sty': ['nywyark' ، 'shkaghw' ، 'las aynjls' ، koi bhi nhayn]}
