par lanay kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔as mksad kay liye skyt lrn laibryry sy mnymaks askylr ، astyndardas askylr ، ya rwbst askylr klas astamal ki jaskty hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDFROMESSSCALER PANDAS PDFROM SKLEREN.Preprocessing draamd Minmaxcaler# msaal kay sath aadad wa shmar kay kalm ays day ayf = PD.Dataframe ({'A': [1 ، 2 ، 3] ، 'by': [4 ، 5 ، 6]})# askyl

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main riyl astyt ka dayta hawta haay۔rjat tjzayha aur jghrafyaiy aadad wa shmar ka astamal karty hoey jaiydad ki kymtwn ko mtasar karnay waly awaml ka aap kis tarah tjzayha aur shnakht karain ghay؟
Answer: pandawn main ، aap mkhtlf tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal karty hoey dayta ko mamwl par lanay aur askylngh ko snbhal saktay hayn۔yhaan do aam tknyk hayn: 1۔mn myks askylngh (narmlaizayshn) mn myks askylngh ، jsay mamwl kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، aadad wa shmar ko ayk khasa had main ، aam tawr par 0 aur 1 kay darmiyan bazayaft krta hay ، aap kam sy kam myks askylngh anjam denay kay liye skyt lrn laibryry sy mn myks askylr klas astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: PDFROMESSSSCALER# PDFROMOSSING.Preprocessing draamd MINMAXSCALER# msaal kay sath aadad wa shmar kay kalm ays day ayf = PD.Dataframe ({'A': [10 ، 20 ، 30] ، 'by': [5 ، 15 ، 25]})# myn myks askylsklr = mnymaks askylr ()# ko dayty frymdaf_sklda = pd.dataframe (askylr.fyt_transfarm (day ayf) ، kalm = day ayf.w kalmza) kay sath syt karain ، is tarah kay dayta fym prnt (DF_Scaled) ko prnt karain ، hum prnt karain ،addy kalm 'A' aur 'B'۔ham mnymaks askylr klas ki ayk msaal bnatay hain aur dayta ko askyl karnay kay liye Fit_transform () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔as kay ntyjay main askylda akdar ko ayk nya dayta frym bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، ayk hi kalm kay namwn kay sath ، DF_SCALED۔ mzakwrha bala msaal ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: CSSCOPY kwda A B0 0.0 0.01 0.5 0.52 0.52 1.0 1.0 HERE ، hr kalm main akdar kay darmiyan askyl kya jata haay۔0 aur 1 is kalm 2 main kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada akdar ki bnyad pr۔astyndardaaizayshn astyndardaaizayshn dayta ko safr ka mtalb aur ywnt kay tghyr main tbdyl krty haay۔aap mayary kary ko anjam denay kay liye skkyt lrn laibryry sy astyndardars askylr klas astamal krsktay hayn۔as ki ayk msaal yeh haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PDFROM SKLEREN.Preprocessing ampwrt astyndardas askylr# msaal kay sath addy kalm ays day ayf = PD.Dataframe ({'A': [10 ، 20 ، 30] ، 'B': [5 ، 15 ، 25]})# astyndardars askylr = astyndardasklr ()# ft aur tbdyl karain dataframedf_scaled = pd.dataframe (scaler.fit_transfor (df) ، kalm = df.columons)# askylda dayta fym prnt (df_scaled) kay sath prnt karain ، hum prnt karain A ataframe prnt (df_scaled)addy kalm 'A' aur 'B'۔ham astyndardars askylr klas ki ayk msaal tyar karty hain aur dayta ko mayary bnanay kay liye Fit_transform () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔as kay ntyjay main mayary akdar ko ayk nya dayta frym bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، isi kalm kay namwn kay sath ، DF_SCALED۔ mzakwrha bala msaal ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: CSSCOPY kwda A B0 -1.224745 -1.2247451 0.0000000000000000002 1.224747474745 hayry main ، wyns myn۔safr ka mtalb aur ywnt kay tghyrat kay liye mayary۔ apnay dayta ko askylngh ya mayary bnana ، aap is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh addy mtghyr isi tarah kay pymanay par hain ، jo mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm aur dayta tjzayha kay kamwn kay liye faidha mnd saabt hawsktay hayn۔ nwt kryn۔، aam tawr par yeh tjwyza kya jata hay keh trbyt kay aadad wa shmar par askylr ko ft karain aur aadad wa shmar kay rsaw sy bchnay kay liye tyst ya nzar nah aanay waly dayta ko tbdyl karnay kay liye isi askylr ka astamal kryn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr srway ka dayta hawta haay۔klstrngh alghwrthm aur aabadyaty mtghyrat ka astamal karty hoey aap kstmr syghmntyshn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: pandawn main ، aap mkhtlf tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal karty hoey dayta bainngh aur sawabdydy ko snbhal saktay hayn۔yhaan do aam tknyk hayn: 1۔kt aur QCUT fnkshnza kt () aur QCUT () pandawn main afaal ko mstkl mtghyrat ko mjrd wkfwn ya zamray main bandhnay ya akasy karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha aadad wa shmar ko msawy chwraaiy kay twkrywn main tksym krta haay۔ kyw kt () fnkshn: yeh fnkshn dayta ko kwantail main tksym krta hay ، js sy hr bn main tkryba brabr tadad main dayta pwaints ko ykyny bnaya jata haay۔bn knarwn ka tayn aadad wa shmar ki tksym ki bnyad par kya jata haay۔ yahan ki ayk msaal jo un afaal kay astamal ko zaahar krty haay: PDimport numpy kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas ko NP# msaal kay tawr par ayk addy kalm day ayf = PD.Dataframe kay sath dayta frym ({'amr': [[[amr ': [22 ، 25 ، 30 ، 35 ، 40 ، 45 ، 50]})# kt () day ayf ['ayj_bns'] = pd.cut (df ['amr'] ، dabay = [20 ، 30 ka astamal karty hoey brabr chwraaiy bainngh anjam dyn.msaal kay tawr par ، hamary pas addy kalm 'amr' kay sath ayk dayta frym haay۔ham PD.cut () ko brabr chwraaiy bainngh anjam denay kay liye astamal karty hain ، js main bn knarwn ko [20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50] ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔ntyjay main bn lybl ayk niay kalm 'AGE_BINS' ko tfwyzu kyay gaye hayn۔ham kwantail par mbny bainngh anjam denay kay liye PD.QCUT () ka astamal bhi karty hain ، js main kwantail ki tadad 3 kay tawr par btaiy jati haay۔ ntyjay main bn lybl ayk niay kalm 'AGE_QUANTILES' main tfwyzu kyay jatay hayn۔ mzakwrha bala msaal ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: kapy kwda ayj_bnsAGE_QUANTILES0 22 (20 ، 30] (21.999 ، 33.0] 1 25 (20 ، 30] (21.999 ، 33.0] 2 30 (20 ، 30] (33.0 ، 40.0] 3 35 (30 ، 40] (33.0 ، 40] 40 40].AGE_QUANTILES ka kalm kwantail par mbny bِnza 2 ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ kstm bainngh agar aap ko bainngh kay l specific mkhsawsa tkazuay hain ya apni apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnwn ki wzuahat karna chahti hain tou ، aap lybl pyramytr kay sath PD.cut () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔ is sy aap ko kstm lybl tfwyzu karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔har bn kay liay۔ yahan ki ayk msaal haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PDimport numpy kay tawr par NP# msaal kay tawr par ayk addy kalm day ayf = pd.dataframe ({'amr': [22 ، 25 ، 30 ، 35 ، 40 ، 45 ، 50]})})# kstm bِnza aur lybl bns ki wzuahat karain = [20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50] lybl = ['ywth' ، 'balgh' ، 'synir']# kstm lyblza day ayf kay sath kt () ka astamal karty hoey bainngh prfarm karain ['ayj_tytryjry'] = pd.cut.

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main sahat anshwrns daway ka dayta hawta haay۔aap mshyn lrnngh aur bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey jaly dawؤn kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: pandawn main ، aap dayt taim andayks ya taim astymp aabjykt kay TZ_CONVERT () aur TZ_Localize () tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey taim zawn kay tbadlwn ko snbhal saktay hayn۔yhaan aap taim zawn kay tbadlwn ko kis tarah anjam dy saktay hayn: dayta frym kalm ko dayt taim andayks ya taim astymp aabjykt main tbdyl karain agar yeh pehlay sy hi is farmyt main nahin haay۔ py day kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PD# msaal dayta taim kalm day ayf = py day day aay ayf aar aay aym (time 'taim astymp': [[{'taim astymp': ['2022-01-01 12:00:00' ، '2022-01-01 13:00:00'] ، 'wylyw': [10 ، 20]})# 'taim astymp' kalm ko daytymydaf main tbdyl karain ['taim astymp'] = pd.to_datetime (df [' Timestamp '])#' taim astymp 'kalm ko btawr andayksdaf.syt_ andayks (' taim astymp '، un plys = sch) dayta frym kay taim zawn ko tbdyl karnay kay liye TZ_Convert () ka tarykha astamal kryn۔mtalwbha taim zawn ۔pythwn kwpy kwda# taim zawn ko 'amrykha/new_york'df = df.tz_convert (' amrykha/new_york ') main tbdyl karain ، is msaal main ، hum dayta frym kay taim zawn ko dayfalt taim zawn say' amrykha main tbdyl karty hayn۔/new_york'.if agar dayta frym main taim zawn syt nahin hay tou ، aap dayta frym ko kesi mkhsawsa taim zawn main mkamy bnanay kay liye tz_localize () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔ pythwn kwpy kwda# dayta frym ko 'amrykha/LOS_ANGELS' main mkamy bnaiyn۔.tz_localize ('amrykha/LOS_ANGELES') yahan ، hum dayta frym ko 'amrykha/LOS_ANGELES' taim zawn par mkamy bnatay hayn۔ nwt karain keh jab taim zawn ki tbdyly anjam dytay ho tou ، yeh ykyny bnana zurwry hay keh aap kay dayta main taim zawn kay baray main zurwry malwmat mwjwd hawn۔tbadlwn sirf is sawrt main drst hoga jab asal taim zawn ki malwmat drst haw۔ aap un kalmwn main dayta taim andayks ya taim astymp aabjykt tak rsaiy haasal krkay aur un par TZ_CONVERT () ya TZ_LOCALIZE () kay tarykwn ka astamal krkay dayta frym kay andr mkhsawsa kalmwn main taim zawn kay tbadlwn ka atalak krsktay hayn۔braha rast۔ mazeed aaly drjay ki taim zawn hayndalngh aur tbadlwn kay l you ، aap PYTZ laibryry ko bhi dryaft krsktay hain ، jo azaghr main taim zawn kay liye wsya pymanay par mdd fraham krta haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main aan lain msanwaat ki drjha bndy hawty haay۔aap kis tarah un awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ga jo jzabat kay tjzayha aur fychr anjynirngh ka astamal karty hoey aaly msanwaat ki drjha bndy main shrakt karty hayn؟
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main kalm kay wsta ، mydayn aur mwda ka hasab lghanay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD# msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dayta frymdaf = PD.Dataframe ({'kdr': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 30 ، 30 ، 40 40.). wylywza [0] prnt ("mtalb:" ، mtalb) prnt ("mydayn:" ، mydayn) prnt ("mwda:" ، mwda) is msaal main ، hamary pas 'wylyw' namy kalm wala dayta frym haay۔ham wsta ka hasab lghanay kay liye 'wylyw' kalm kay wsta () tarykha ka astamal karty hain ، mydayn ka hasab lghanay kay liye mydayn () tarykha ، aur mwda ka hasab lghanay kay liye mwda () ka tarykha۔wylyw wsawly ka astamal karty hoey mwda ko nkala jata hay ، yeh frzu karty hoey keh daytasyt main sirf ayk hi mwda haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: myk fyl kwpy kwdaymyn: 36.25 mydaym: 35.0Mod، aur mwda 50 haay۔ nwt karain keh agar daytasyt main mtadd tarykwn mwjwd hain tou mwda () ka tarykha mtadd akdar ko waps krskta haay۔as msaal main ، hum frzu karty hain keh sirf ayk hi mwda hay aur andayksngh (akdar [0]) ka astamal karty hoey pehli kdr nkalyn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya gaya hay js main swshl mydaya dayta haay۔aap kis tarah asar andaza karnay walon ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ga aur nyt wrk kay tjzayha aur jzabat kay tjzayay ka astamal karty hoey saarf ki msarwfyt par un kay asarat ki nshandhay karain ghay؟
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey mtadd shraita par mbny dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dayta frymdaf = pd.dataframe ({'nam': ['ayls' ، 'charly' ، 'dayw'] ،' amr ': [25 ، 30 ، 35 ، 40] ،' shhar ': [' nywyark '،' lndn '،' pyrs '،' twkyw ']})# mtadd shraita fltrda_dayf = day ayf par mbny fltr ktaaryn۔shhar '۔ham do shraita ki bnyad par ktaar ko fltr karna chahti hayn: 30 sy zayada amr aur shhar 'lndn' kay brabr۔ham [] andayksngh aaprytr ko kwsyn kay andr ki shraita ki wzuahat karnay kay liye astamal karty hain ، jsay "awr" haalt kay liye aynda aaprytr kay zaryaha alag kya jata haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: kapy kwda ka nam ayj sty 1 bab 30 lndn hayr ، sirf 'nam' kay sath 'bab' kay sath hi ktaar'،' amr '30 kay tawr par ، awr' sty 'btawr' lndn 'dwnwn shraita ko pora krta hay aur isy fltr shuda dayta frym (fltrda_ day ayf) main shaml kya jata haay۔ aap mkhtlf mntaky aaprytrza jesay "awr" aur "shraita ، |"ya" shraita ، aur "nhayn" shraita kay liye dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay liye mtadd shraita ko ykja karnay kay liay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya gaya hay js main wyb tryfk ka dayta haay۔lagh un tjzayha aur tsaw .r ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey aap wyb sait ki karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main kesi dusray kalm main ghrwp krdha kalm main akdar kay jwraay ka hasab lghanay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD# msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'shhar': ['nyw yark' ، 'lndn'، 'pyrs' ، 'lndn' ، 'pyrs'] ، 'aabady': [8500000 ، 8900000 ، 2200000 ، 8300000 ، 2400000]})# 'aabady' kalm main 'sty' ays yw aym_by_syty = day ayf kay zaryaha ghrwpwn main akdar ki rkm ka hasab lghaiyn۔. ghrwp baiy ('shhar') ['aabady']۔ rkm () prnt (SUM_BY_CITY) is msaal main ، hamary pas kalm 'shhar' aur 'aabady' kay sath ayk dayta frym haay۔ham 'sty' kalm kay zaryaha ghrwp krdha aabady ki akdar ki rkm ka hasab lghana chahti hayn۔ham 'sty' kalm kay zaryaha dayta frym ko ghrwp karnay kay liye ghrwp baiy () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hain aur phir hr ghrwp kay andr 'aabady' kalm main akdar ki rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye rkm () tarykha ka atalak karty hayn۔8500000PARIS 4600000NAME: aabady ، DTYPE: INT64HERE ، 'sty' kalm main hr mnfrd shhar kay liye aabady ki akdar ka mjmwaha hasab kya jata haay۔ntyjay main syryza aabjykt (SUM_BY_CITY) main akdar kay tawr par asharyha aur aabady ki akdar ki rkm kay tawr par shhar hayn۔) ، wghyrha ، mtalwbha ajtmaay fnkshn kay sath sirf () ki jghha la kr۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr tranzaykshn dayta hawta haay۔aap kis tarah saarfyn ki khrydary kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ga aur bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey zaaty nwayt ki msanwaat ki sfarshat ki sfarsh karain ghay؟
Answer: ykyna!dayta frym ko pandawn ka astamal karty hoey ayk lght main tbdyl karnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'nam': ['ayls' ، 'charly'] ، 'amr':۔msaal kay tawr par ، hamary pas kalm 'nam' ، 'amr' ، aur 'shhar' kay sath ayk dayta frym haay۔ham dayta frym kay TO_DICT () ka tarykha astamal karty hain takha isy lght main tbdyl kya jaskay۔awrynt = 'rykardaza' dlyl ntyjay main lght ki shkl ki wzuahat krty hay ، jahan dayta frym ki hr ktaar lght ka rykarda bn jati haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: sy ays ays kwpy kwda [{'nam': 'ayls' ، 'amr': 25 ، 'shhar ':' nywyark '} ، {' nam ':' bab '،' amr ': 30 ،' shhar ':' lndn '} ، {' nam ':' charly '،' amr ': 35 ،' shhar':' pyrs '}] yahan ، dayta frym ko lght ki fharst main tbdyl kya gaya hay ، jahan hr lght dayta frym ki ayk ktaar ki nmaindghy krty haay۔lghat ki klydyn kalm kay namwn sy mtaabkt rkhty hain ، aur akdar isi syl akdar kay mtaabk hayn۔ nwt karain keh TO_DICT () tarykha mkhtlf lght ki shklwn kay liye mkhtlf dyghr akhtyarat fraham krta haay۔aap kalm kay namwn ki lght ko klydwn aur kalm ki akdar kay tawr par akdar kay tawr par ، ya 'fharst' kay tawr par 'dakt' kay tawr par awrynt pyramytr ki wzuahat krsktay hain jahan hr kalm ka nam apni akdar ki fharst main nkshha bnata haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main mlazamyn ki atamynan ka dayta hawta haay۔aap kis tarah un awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ga jo rjat tjzayha aur srway kay aadad wa shmar ka astamal karty hoey mlazamyn ki atamynan aur mshghwlyt main maawn hayn؟
Answer: ykyna!yhaan dayta frym ko JSON strngh main tbdyl karnay kay liye ayk msaal ka kwda hay js ka astamal karty hoey pandawn ka astamal karty hawiay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par dayty frymf = PD.Dataframe ({'nam': ['ayls' ، 'charly'] ، 'amr' '.as msaal main ، hamary pas kalm 'nam' ، 'amr' ، aur 'shhar' kay sath ayk dayta frym haay۔ham dayta frym kay TO_JSON () ka tarykha astamal karty hain takha isy JSON tar main tbdyl kya jaskay۔awrynt = 'rykardaza' dlyl kay ntyjay main JSON strngh ki shkl ki wzuahat hawty hay ، jahan dayta frym ki hr ktaar JSON rykarda bn jati haay۔ aaؤt pt hawgha: CSSCOPY kwda [{"nam": "ayls" ، "amr": 25 ،"sty": "nyw yark"} ، {"nam": "bab" ، "amr": 30 ، "shhar": "lndn"} ، {"nam": "charly" ، "amr": 35 ، "shhar ":" pyrs "}] yahan ، dayta frym ko JSON tar main tbdyl kya gaya hay jo lght ki fharst ki nmaindghy krta haay۔har lght dayta frym ki ayk ktaar ki nmaindghy krty hay ، jahan klydyn kalm kay namwn sy mtaabkt rkhty hain aur akdar isi syl akdar sy mtaabkt rkhty hayn۔ nwt karain keh TO_JSON () tarykha mkhtlf JSON farmyts kay liye mkhtlf dyghr akhtyarat fraham krta haay۔aap JSON strngh haasal karnay kay liye 'kalm' kay tawr par awrynt pyramytr ki wzuahat krsktay hain jahan kalm kay nam chabyan bn jatay hain aur kalm ki akdar akdar bn jati hain ، ya 'andayks' JSON strngh main andayks akdar ko shaml karnay kay liay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main mryzu alyktrank sahat kay rykarda hawtay hayn۔ayswsy ayshn rwl kan kny aur klynykl dayta ka astamal karty hoey aap bymary kay shryk hony kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main kalm ki mjmway msanwaat ka hasab lghanay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD# msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dayta frymdaf = pd.dataframe ({'wylyw': [2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5]})# mjmway hasab ktab kryn'wylyw' kalmkwmwlytw_ prwdakt = day ayf ['wylyw'] ki msanwaat۔ kmprwda () prnt (mjmway_ prwdakt) is msaal main ، hamary pas 'wylyw' namy kalm wala dayta frym haay۔ham mjmway msanwaat ka hasab lghanay kay liye 'wylyw' kalm kay kmprwda () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hayn۔kmprda () ka tarykha kalm kay aaghaza sy la kar hr saf tak tamam akdar ki pydawar ka hasab lghata hay ، js kay ntyjay main mjmway msanwaat ki ayk syryza hawty haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: yaml kwpy kwda 0 21 62 243 120Name: wylyhar saf kay liye 'wylyw' kalm ki msanwaat ka hasab lghaya jata haay۔ntyjay main syryza aabjykt (mjmway_ prwdakt) ki lmbaiy dayta frym ki tarah hawty hay ، jahan hr kdr is saf tak mjmway msanwa ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ nwt karain keh agar kalm main koi ghmshdha akdar (ayn aay ayn) mwjwd hain tou ، mjmway msanwa bhi nan hawgha۔as nktaha kay bad.aghr zurwrt ho tou flna () ya darapna () jesay tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey mjmway msanwa ka hasab lghanay sy pehlay aap ghmshdha akdar ko snbhal saktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya gaya hay js main swshl mydaya dayta haay۔tykst mainngh aur taim syryza tjzayha ka astamal karty hoey aap rjhaan sazay kay mwzuwaat aur haysh tygh ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym kay kalm main lghatar ktaarwn kay darmiyan frk ka hasab lghanay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD# msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'wylyw': [2 ، 5 ، 8 ، 12]})#'wylyw' kalm daf = day ayf ['wylyw'] main lghatar ktaarwn kay darmiyan frk ka hasab lghaiyn۔ daf () prnt (frk) is msaal main ، hamary pas 'wylyw' namy kalm wala dayta frym haay۔ham lghatar ktaarwn kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay kay liye 'wylyw' kalm kay mkhtlf () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hayn۔daf () tarykha kalm main hr kdr aur pchhly kdr kay darmiyan frk ka hasab lghata hay ، js kay ntyjay main akhtlafat ki ayk syryza hawty haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: yaml kwpy kwda 0 nan 1 3.02 3.03 4.0Name: wyly'wylyw' kalm ka hasab lghaya jata haay۔ntyjay main syryza aabjykt (DIFF) ki lmbaiy dayta frym ki tarah hay ، jahan pehli kymt nan hay kywnkha frk ki ghnty karnay kay liye koi pchhly kymt nahin hay ، aur is kay bad ki akdar hr kdr aur pchhly kdr kay darmiyan frk ki nmaindghy krty hayn۔ nwt karain keh aap kar saktay hayn۔ksy khasa wkfay main akdar kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay kay liye daf () tarykha kar kay pyramytr ki bhi wzuahat kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، day ayf ['wylyw']۔ daf (adwar = 2) is sy pehlay hr kdr aur kymt ki do ktaarwn kay darmiyan frk ka hasab lghaiay gha۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main mwbail ayp main saarf ki srghrmy ka dayta hawta haay۔aap kis tarah un awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ga jo hum aahanghy kay tjzayha aur tarza aml ki pymaish ka astamal karty hoey saarf ki brkrary aur mshghwlyt ko mtasar karty hayn؟
Answer: ykyna!dayta frym ki hr ktaar main fnkshn ka atalak karnay aur pandawn ka astamal karty hoey ntaij ki bnyad par ayk nya kalm bnanay kay liye ayk msaal kwda haay: py day kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas ko PD# msaal kay tawr par dayta fymdaf = PD.Dataframe ({'nam': ['ayls' ، '،'bab '،' charly '] ،' amr ': [25 ، 30 ، 35]})# hr rwdaf par laghw hony kay liye kesi fnkshn ki wzuahat kryn۔# fnkshn ko hr saf par laghw karain aur ayk nya kalm 'zamrha' day ayf ['zamrha'] = day ayf ['amr'] bnaiyn۔ is msaal kay tawr par ، hamary pas kalm 'nam' kay sath ayk dayta frym haay۔awr 'amr'۔ham ayk fnkshn ka hasab ktab_kytry (amr) ki wzuahat karty hain jo un pt kay tawr par amr lyta hay aur amr ki bnyad par ayk zamrha lwtata haay۔as kay bad hum hr saf par fnkshn ko laghw karnay aur ntaij ki bnyad par ayk nya kalm 'zamrha' bnanay kay liye 'amr' kalm par laghw () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔charly 35 jwany ، fnkshn ka hasab ktab_kytry (amr) 'amr' kalm main hr kdr par laghw hawta hay ، js kay ntyjay main ayk nya kalm 'zamrha' hawta hay jo hr amr ko haalt ki bnyad par 'jwan' ya 'balgh' kay tawr par drjha bndy krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym (day ayf) main nya kalm shaml haay۔ aap kesi bhi kstm fnkshn ko laghw () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey hr saf main laghw krsktay hain aur ntyjha ki bnyad par ayk nya kalm tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔fnkshn ko alag alag ya lymbdaa fnkshn un lain kay tawr par atalak () tarykha kar kay sath byan kya jaskta haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main saarfyn ki shkayat ka dayta hawta haay۔aap mtn ki kan kny aur kdrty zaban prwsysngh ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey shkayat ki sab sy aam aksam aur un kay hal kay awkat ka tjzayha aur un ki shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: ykyna!dayta frym main kalm ki wzan kay awsta ka hasab lghanay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda hay js ka astamal kesi dusray kalm ka astamal karty hoey pandawn ka astamal karty hoey hawta haay: pydawn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par dayta frymdaf = pd.dataframe ({'akdar': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40]، 'wzan': [0.2 ، 0.3 ، 0.4 ، 0.1]})# 'wzan' kalm kay wzan kay awsta 'kalm' kalm wait_awryj = (DF ['akdar'] * DF ['wzan'])۔ rkm () ())۔ rkm ()/ df ['wzan']۔ rkm () prnt (wzan walay_awryj) is msaal main ، hamary pas kalm 'akdar' aur 'wzan' kay sath ayk dayta frym haay۔ham 'wzan' kalm ka astamal karty hoey 'akdar' kalm ki wzan awsta ka hasab lghatay hayn۔ham 'wylywza' kalm main hr kdr ko 'wyt' kalm main isi kdr kay sath zurb dytay hain ، msanwaat ka khlasaha karty hain ، aur isy 'wyt' kalm kay mjmwaha sy tksym karty hayn۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: kapy kwda 23.0 hayir ،'wylywza' kalm ki wzany awsta ka hasab 'wzan' kalm ka astamal karty hoey kya jata haay۔ntyjay main kymt 'akdar' kalm ki awsta ki nmaindghy krty hay ، jahan hr kymt ko 'wzan' kalm main isi kdr kay mtaabk wzan kya jata haay۔ nwt karain keh wzan kay drst wzan kay hasab ktab kay liye wzan 1 tak 1 tak hona chahaiay۔aghr zurwrt ho tou ، aap wzan kay awsta ka hasab lghanay sy pehlay 'wzan' kay kalm ko is ki rkm ko tksym krkay mamwl bna saktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main gharay tyly mytry ka dayta hawta haay۔klstrngh alghwrthm aur synsr dayta ka astamal karty hoey aap daraiywngh kay nmwnwn aur tarza aml ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey mtalkha kalm kay wsta kay sath kesi dayta frym main ghmshdha akdar ko tbdyl karnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda haay: paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PDimport numpy kay tawr par NP# msaal kay tawr par ghmshdha kdrwn kay sath dayta frym ({'A': [1 ، 2 ، 2 ، [1 ، 2 ، 2 ، [1 ، 2 ،np.nan ، 4 ، 5] ، 'B': [6 ، NP.Nan ، 8 ، NP.Nan ، 10]})# ghmshdha akdar ko kalm kay zaryaha tbdyl kryn۔DF_FLED) is msaal main ، hamary pas kalm 'A' aur 'B' kay sath ayk dayta frym hay ، jahan kuch akdar NP.nan ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔ham ghmshdha akdar ko mtalkha kalm kay wsta sy tbdyl karnay kay liye dayta frym kay flna () tarykha ka astamal karty hayn۔wsta () fnkshn hr kalm kay wsylha ka hasab lghata hay ، aur flna () ghmshdha akdar ko apnay mtalkha kalm kay zaraia sy tbdyl krta haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: CSSCOPY kwda A B0 1.0 6.01 2.0 8.02 3.0 8.03 4.0 8.04 5.0 10.0 HERE ، ghmshdha akdarkalmwn main 'A' aur 'B' ko hr mtalkha kalm kay wsta kay sath tbdyl kya jata haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym (DF_FLED) main woh asal akdar par mushtamil hain jahan woh dstyab thay aur kalm ka mtalb hay jahan ghmshdha akdar mwjwd hayn۔ nwt karain keh flna () kay tarykha kar main yeh kntrwl karnay kay liye mkhtlf pyramytrza hawtay hain ، jesay keh ghmshdha akdar ko kis tarah bhra jata hay ، jesay is ki bjaiay kesi khasa kdr ki wzuahat krnamtalb ، ayf fl ya by fl tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey ، ya antrpwlyshn tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey aaghay ya pychhay bhrna۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main aan lain daytngh prwfailza hawtay hayn۔aap kis tarah saarf ki trjyhaat main nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ga aur klstrngh aur sfarsh alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mtaabkt ko mmasal bnaiyn ghay؟
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main dayt taim akdar kay kalm sy sal ، mhaynha aur dn nkalnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda haay: py day kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par dayta taim kalm day ayf = py day day aay ayf aar aay aym ({'2022- [' 2022- '05-10 14:30:00 '،' 2022-06-15 09:45:00 '،' 2022-07-20 18:20:00 ']})#' dayt taim 'kalm ko dayt taim taipda main tbdyl karain [' dayt taim'] = pd.to_dattime (df [' dattime '])#' dayt taim 'kalm day ayf [' sal '] = df [' dayt taim '] sy sal ، mhaynha aur dn ka ark sal ، mhaynha ، aur dn['dayt taim']ham pehlay 'dayt taim' kalm ko PD.TO_DATETIME () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dayt taim taip main tbdyl karty hayn۔as kay bad ، hum dayt taim praprtyza tak rsaiy haasal karnay aur sal ، mhaynay aur dn ko alag alag kalmwn 'sal' ، 'mhaynay' ، aur 'daay' main baltrtyb nkalnay kay liye .DT rsar ka astamal karty hayn۔ aaؤt pt ho gha: YAMLCOPY kwda dayt taim sal ka mhaynhadaay 0 2022-05-10 14:30:00 2022 5 101 2022-06-15 09:45:00 2022 6 152 202-07-20 18:20:00 2022 7 20 20 yahan ، sal ، mhaynha ، aur dn nkala jata haay'dayt taim' kalm sy aur alyhadha kalmwn main mhafwza۔ntyjay main dayta frym (day ayf) main 'dayt taim' kalm aur niay kalm 'sal' ، 'mhaynha' ، aur 'daay' main nkaly hogi akdar kay sath asal dayt taim akdar par mushtamil haay۔dwsra ، haftay ka dn ، wghyrha ، isi .DT rsar aur mnasb dayt taim praprtyza jesay ghhntay ، mnt ، dusra ، daay aaf wyk ، wghyrha ka astamal karty hawiay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr ki khrydary ka dayta hawta haay۔aap ryghryshn tjzayha aur khsawsayt ki ahamyt ki tknyk ka astamal karty hoey saarfyn kay akhrajat ko aaghay brahanay waly anthaaiy baasar awaml ka tjzayha aur un ki nshandhay kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey ayk dayta frym main mtadd kalmwn kay mabyn artbata mytrks ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk msaal kwda haay: PD# msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'A': [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] ، 'by۔': [6 ، 7 ، 8 ، 9 ، 10] ،' C ': [11 ، 12 ، 13 ، 14 ، 15]})# is msaal kay tawr par ، hum artbata mytrkskwrylyshn_mytrks = df.corr () prnt (artbata_mytrks) ka hasab lghaiyn۔kalm 'A' ، 'B' ، aur 'C' kay sath dayta frym rkhyn۔ham un kalmwn kay mabyn artbata mytrks ka hasab lghanay kay liye dayta frym kay CORR () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hayn۔kwr () ka tarykha un ki akdar ki bnyad par kalmwn kay mabyn jwraay kay artbata ki ghnty krta haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: sy ays ays sy aw py sy kwda aay by sy aay 1.000000 1.0000 1.000000 1.0000 1.000000000000000000c 1.000000 1.000000 1.0000 here ، artbata mytrks ka hasab hay ، jo ayk mrba mytks hay ، jo ayk mrba mytrks hay ، jo ayk mrba mytrks hay ، jo ayk mrba mytrks hay ، jo ayk mrba mytrks haaykalmwn kay hr jwraay kay darmiyan bahamy rbta۔chwnkha hr kalm main akdar is msaal main ayk jesi hain ، lhazaa kalmwn kay hr jwraay kay mabyn artbata 1 haay۔ nwt karain keh artbata ki akdar -1 sy 1 tak hawty hain ، jahan 1 ayk mzubwta msabt artbata ki nshandhay krta hay ، -1 ayk mzubwta mnfy artbata ki nshandhay krta haay۔، aur 0 kalmwn kay mabyn koi artbata ki nshandhay nahin krta haay۔ aap hayt myps ka astamal karty hoey artbata mytrks ko bhi tsawr krsktay hain ya mazeed tjzayha kay liye mytrks sy anfrady artbata ki akdar tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main nyt wrk tryfk ka dayta hawta haay۔aap bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay waly alghwrthm aur nyt wrk kay bhaaؤ kay tjzayay ka astamal karty hoey nyt wrk kay hamlwn kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey kesi dusray kalm ki haalt par mbny dayta frym main ayk nya kalm bnanay kay liye ayk msaal kwda haay: PD# msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dayta frymdaf = PD.Dataframe ({'akdar': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50]})# 'akdar' kalm day ayf ['zamrha'] ki haalt par mbny ayk nya kalm 'zamrha' bnaiyn۔) is msaal main ، hamary pas 'akdar' kay nam sy kalm wala dayta frym haay۔ham 'akdar' kalm ki haalt par mbny ayk nya kalm 'zamrha' tshkyl dytay hayn۔ham 'akdar' kalm main akdar par aaadha karnay kay liye fharst ki tfhaym ka astamal karty hain ، haalt ko chyk karain (as maamlay main ، agar kymt 30 sy zayada haay) ، aur isi zamray ('aaly' ya 'km') ko rail par tfwyzu kryn۔nya 'zamrha' kalm۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: ryazuy ka kwda wylyw kytyghry 0 10 LOW1 20 LOW2 30 LOW3 40 HIGHHERE ، ayk nya kalm 'zamrha' is shrta ki bnyad par bnaya gaya hay keh agar 'akdar' kalm main kdr zayada hay tw30 sy zayada ، isy 'haaiy' tfwyzu kya gaya haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh 'km' tfwyzu kya jata haay۔ aap apni mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk haalt aur is sy mtalkha akdar main trmym krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr srway ka dayta hawta haay۔aap kis tarah aham trien awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ga jo khsawsayt ki ahamyt ki tknyk aur pysh ghwiy karnay wali madalngh ka astamal karty hoey saarfyn ki wfadary aur atamynan main maawn hayn؟
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey amwdy tawr par do dayta frymwn ko hum aahangh karnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframesdf1 = pd.dataframe ({'A': [1 ، 2 ، 3] ، 'B': [4 ، 5 ، 6]}) df2 = pd.dataframe ({'a': [7 ، 8 ، 9] ، 'by': [10 ، 11 ، 12]})# dayta fymwn ko amwdy tawr par dayf_kwnkatynytda = py day daat kwkyt ([day ayf 1 ، day ayf 2]) prnt kryn(df_concatenated) is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk hi kalm kay nam 'A' aur 'B' kay sath do dayta fyms DF1 aur DF2 hayn۔amwdy tawr par un ko jwranay kay l we ، hum PD.CONCAT () fnkshn ka astamal karty hain aur dayta frymwn ko btawr fharst pas karty hayn۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، pd.concat () amwdy aml (mhawr = 0) anjam dyta haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: CSSCOPY kwda A B0 1 41 2 52 3 60 7 101 8 112 9 12 yahan ، do dayta fyms DF1 aur DF2 amwdy tawr par shaml hain ،ayk nya dayta frym DF_CONCATENATET kay ntyjay myn۔ntyjay main hony waly dayta frym main dono dayta frymwn ki tamam ktaaryn shaml hain ، asal ktaar kay asharyay mhafwza hayn۔ nwt karain keh kalm kay nam aur kalm aardar ko knytytytda dayta frym main brkrar rakha gaya haay۔aghr aap ntyjay main hony waly dayta frym main ktaar andayks ko dwbarha trtyb dena chahti hain tou ، aap RESET_INDEX () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hain ، jesay DF_CONCATENATED.reset_index (darap = sch)۔ agar dayta frymwn kay kalm kay mkhtlf nam ya aardar hain tou ، aap mhawr = 1 ki wzuahat bhi krsktay hayn۔pyramytr un ko afky tawr par (kalm war) ko jwranay kay liay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main malyaty markyt ka dayta hawta haay۔aap kis tarah markyt main atar chrahaؤ kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ga aur taim syryza tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey atar chrahaؤ ki pyshn ghwiy madal tyar karain ghay؟
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main dawr kay kalm ko chhwtay kay kalm main tbdyl karnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'mtn': ['haylw' ، 'awpn' ، 'awpnaiy' ، 'azaghr ']})#' tykst 'kalm ko kam sy kam [' mtn '] = DF [' mtn '] main tbdyl kryn۔ str.lower () prnt (DF) is msaal main ، hamary pas' mtn 'kay nam sy kalm wala dayta frym haay۔dawr par mshtmlham tamam dawrwn ko kam karnay kay liye 'tykst' kalm kay .Str.lower () ka tarykha astamal karty hayn۔ aaؤt pt hawgha: mark daawn kwpy kwda tykst 0.lower () tarykha.kalm main mwjwd tamam dawrwn ko lwir kys main tbdyl kya jata hay ، js kay ntyjay main ayk nya dayta frym hawta hay jahan 'tykst' kalm main lwir kysza dawr hawtay hayn۔pandawn main strngh aapryshn kay liye dstyab haay۔yha kalm main hr tar ko chhwtay hasaay main tbdyl krta haay۔ aap isi tarah kay strngh ayksysr tarykwn jesay .str.upper () ko braay main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔mkhtlf strngh aapryshnza kay liye pandawn kay zaryaha۔

dayta frym main do kalmwn kay mabyn yklydayn fasalay ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap nypy laibryry astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr py daympwrt nympy btawr ayn py#، 10]})# 'x' aur 'y' kalm sywklydayn_daystns = np.linalg.norm (df ['x'] - df ['y']) prnt (euclidean_distance) kay darmiyan ywklydayn fasalay ka hasab lghaiyn ، is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk haay۔kalm 'X' aur 'y' kay sath dayta frym۔ham 'X' aur 'Y' kalmwn kay mabyn ywklydayn fasalay ka hasab lghanay kay liye NP.LINLG.NORM () NUMPY sy fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔ywklydayn fasalay ka hasab do kalmwn main isi anasar kay mabyn mrba akhtlafat ki rkm kay mrba jra kay tawr par kya jata haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: kapy kwda 8.660254037844387here ، 'X' aur 'Y' kalmwn kay darmiyan ywklydayn fasalha ka astamal karty hoey hasab kya jata haay۔NP.LINLG.Norm () fnkshn۔ntyjha ayk hi kymt hay jo do kalmwn kay mabyn fasalay ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ nwt karain keh NP.LINLG.Norm () fnkshn aam tawr par safwn ya wyktrwn kay mabyn yklydayn fasalay ka hasab lghanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، nah keh sirf dayta frym kalmwn tk۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya gaya hay js main swshl mydaya dayta haay۔nyt wrk tjzayha aur ghraf alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey aap saarf kay asar wa rswkh aur mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: ykyna!pandawn ka astamal karty hoey strngh kalm ki lmbaiy par mbny dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay liye ayk msaal ka kwda yahan haay: PD# msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'mtn': ['haylw' ، 'wrlda' ، 'awpnaiy'،' azaghr ']})#' tykst 'kalm fltrda_ day ayf = day ayf [day ayf [day ayf [' tykst '] ki lmbaiy par mbny fltr ktaaryn۔ str.len ()> 5] prnt (fltrda_ day ayf) is msaal kay tawr par ، hamary pas ayk dayta frym hay js kay sath hamary pas ayk dayta frym haay۔'mtn' namy ayk kalm js main dawr shaml hayn۔ham hr tar ki lmbaiy ka hasab lghanay kay liye 'tykst' kalm kay .str.len () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔as kay bad ، hum ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay liye ayk shrta lghatay hain jahan 'tykst' kalm ki lmbaiy 5 sy zayada haay۔kalmsarf woh saf jahan 'mtn' wylyw 'awpnaiy' hay (5 sy zayada lmbaiy kay sath) fltrda dayta frym main shaml haay۔ aap apni mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk haalt main trmym krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap day ayf ['mtn'] astamal krsktay hayn۔kalm main hr tar ki lmbaiy haasal karnay kay liay۔as kay bad ، ntyjay main bwlyn syryza mmasal ktaar ko mntkhb karnay kay liye dayta frym par fltr kay tawr par astamal hawty haay۔

Question: "aap ko ayk daytasyt diya gaya hay js main kstmr ki khrydary ka dayta mwjwd haay۔ aap aar ayf aym (rysnsy ، tadd ، manytry) tjzayha aur klstrngh tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey anthaaiy mnafa bkhsh saarfyn kay tabkat ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟"
Answer: kesi dayta frym main kalm ki zayada sy zayada ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap pandawn main .kwmyks () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'akdar': [10 ، 5 ، 5 ، 8 ، 12 ، 6]})# 'akdar' kalm day ayf ['cumulative_max'] kay mjmway zayada sy zayada ka hasab lghaiyn۔= df ['values']. cummax () prnt (DF) is msaal main ، hamary pas 'akdar' kay nam sy kalm wala dayta frym haay۔ham hr saf main mjmway tawr par zayada sy zayada ka hasab lghanay kay liye 'akdar' kalm par .kwmyks () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔ aaؤt pt ho gha: ryazuy ka kwda kwda wylyw ki wylywza mjmway_myks 0 101 5 102 8 103 12 124 6 12 yahan ، 'kmwlytw_myks' kalm shaml kya gaya haay.kwmyks () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym myn۔ntyjay main aanay waly kalm main hr saf main 'akdar' kalm ki mjmway zayada sy zayada hawty haay۔yha ayk niy syryza lwtta hay js main mjmway zayada sy zayada akdar shaml hayn۔ aap isi tarah kay mjmway aapryshnza ka atalak krsktay hain jysay. cumumum () mjmway rkm kay liye ya .kwmprda () ayk dayta frym main kalm par dusray mjmway hasab ktab karnay kay liye mjmway msanwa kay liay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr klyk astrym dayta hawta haay۔aap rastha tjzayha aur tsaw .r ki tknyk ka astamal karty hoey saarf kay anthaaiy mwsar tbadlwn kay fnnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym ko ayksl fail main tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap pandawn main TO_EXCEL () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35]})# dayta frym ko ayksl faildaf daat ty aw aykssl ('aaؤt pt. ayks ayl ays ayks' ، andayks = ghlta) prnt ("dayta frym ayksl fail main mhafwza kya gaya haay۔") main tbdyl karain ، is msaal main ، hamary pas day ayf namy dayta frym haay۔ham dayta frym par TO_EXCEL () ka tarykha astamal karty hain takha isy ayksl fail kay tawr par mhafwza kya jaskay۔TO_EXCEL () ki pehli dlyl fail ka rastha aur nam hay jahan aap ayksl fail ko mhafwza karna chahti hayn۔as maamlay main ، hum isy "aaؤt pt. ayks ayl ays ayks" kay tawr par mhafwza karty hayn۔andayks = jhwtay pyramytr ka astamal andayks kalm ko ayksl fail main mhafwza hony sy kharj karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: sy ays ays kwpy kwdayta aay ayf aar aay aym ayksl fail ko mhafwza kya jata haay۔ kwda ko chlanay kay bad ، "aaؤt pt. ayks ayl ays ayks" kay nam sy ayk fail tshkyl di jaye ghy۔mwjwdha daairktry ، js main ayksl farmyt main dayta frym dayta mwjwd haay۔ nwt karain keh TO_EXCEL () tarykha astamal karnay kay l you ، aap ko awpn pِks ayl laibryry anstal ki zurwrt haay۔aghr aap nay isy anstal nahin kya hay tou ، aap isy PIP anstal awpn pِlks ayl ka astamal karty hoey anstal krsktay hayn۔dstyab akhtyarat kay baray main mazeed malwmat kay liye dstawyzaat: pandaas.daytafrym.tw_kssl ()

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main aan lain mlazamt pwstngh ka dayta hawta haay۔aap tykst mainngh aur trynda tjzayha ka astamal karty hoey mlazamt ki sab sy zayada mhaart aur mlazamt kay bazaar kay rjhaanat ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: mshtrkha kalm ki bnyad par do dayta frymwn ko zum/shaml karnay kay l you ، aap pandawn main anzumam () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dayta fyms day ayf 1 = pd.dataframe ({'ID': [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4] ، 'nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ،'dayw']}) df2 = pd.dataframe ({'ID': [3 ، 4 ، 5 ، 6] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35 ، 40]})# 'ID' par mbny dayta frymwn ko zum krynas msaal main kalm myjrda_ day ayf = py day aym (day ayf 1 ، day ayf 2 ، aan = 'aaiy day') prnt (mrjda_ day ayf) prnt (mrjda_ day ayf) ، hamary pas do dayta fymza ، day ayf 1 aur day ayf 2 hain ، jo ayk aam kalm 'aaiy day' ka ashtrak karty hayn۔ham 'ID' kalm ki bnyad par dayta frymwn ko zum karnay kay liye anzumam () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔aan pyramytr ko zum karnay kay liye aam kalm ki nshandhay karnay kay liye 'ID' par syt kya gaya haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: kapy kwda ID nam AGE0 3 charly 251 4 dayw 30 kay bad ، dono dayta frymwn ko 'ID' kalm ، aur 'ky bnyad par zum kya gaya haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym mrj_dayf main dono dayta fymza sy mlap ki ktaaryn shaml hayn۔mmasal 'ID' akdar (3 aur 4) kay sath sirf ktaarwn ko zum shuda dayta frym main shaml kya gaya haay۔ aap mkhtlf ksm kay shaml hony ki bhi wzuahat krsktay hain ، jesay andrwny shmwlyt ، baien shmwlyt ، dien shmwlyt ، ya byrwny shmwlyt ، kis tarah pyramytr ka astamal karty hawiay۔anzumam () fnkshn myn۔dstyab akhtyarat kay baray main mazeed malwmat kay liye pandaas dstawyzaat ka hawalha dyn: pandaas ۔mryj ()

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr ki msanwaat ki drjha bndy hawty haay۔aap khsawsayt ki ahamyt ki tknyk aur pysh ghwiy karnay wali madalngh ka astamal karty hoey msanwaat ki drjha bndy par asar andaza hony waly anthaaiy baasar awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: kesi haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym sy ktaaryn chhwranay kay l you ، aap pandawn main bwlyn andayksngh astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35]})# kndayshn day ayf = day ayf [day ayf ['amr']> 25] prnt (day ayf) par mbny ktaaryn darap (day ayf) prnt (day ayf) ، hamary pas day ayf namy dayta frym haay۔ham kesi haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym sy ktaaryn chhwranay kay liye bwlyn andayksngh ka astamal karty hayn۔haalt DF ['Age']> 25 ktaaryn mntkhb krty hay jahan 'amr' kalm 25 sy zayada haay۔ aaؤt pt hawgha: mark daawn kapy kwda nam AGE1 bab 302 charly 35 haair ، aysy ktaaryn jo haalt ko pora nahin krty hain (DF ['amr' ']> 25) dayta frym sy kharj krdyiay gaye hain ، aur is kay ntyjay main dayta frym ko day ayf main waps astwr kya jata haay۔ bwlyn andayksngh ka astamal karty hoey ، aap mkhtlf shraita ka atalak mkhtlf mayarat ki bnyad par ktaarwn ko chhwranay kay liye krsktay hayn۔fltr shuda ntyjhaaghr aap asal main trmym kyay baghair ayk nya dayta frym bnana chahti hain tou ، aap ntyjha ko ayk niay mtghyr ko tfwyzu krsktay hayn: paiytwn kwpy kwdafltrda_dayf = day ayf [day ayf ['amr']> 25] is maamlay main ، asal day ayf main koi tbdyly nahin ki jati hay ، awrfltrda ktaaryn fltr_daf main mhafwza hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya gaya hay js main swshl mydaya dayta haay۔aap jzabat kay tjzayha aur wkt ki syryza kay tjzayay ka astamal karty hoey mkhsawsa wakaat ya mhamat kay doran saarf kay jzabat aur mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main kalm sy anwkhy akdar nkalnay kay l you ، aap pandawn main anwkha () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ، 'bab' ، 'dayw']# anwkhy akdaras msaal main 'nam' kalm ywnyk_walywza = day ayf ['nam'] sy mnfrd () prnt (mnfrd_awlyws) sy ، hamary pas 'nam' kay nam sy ayk kalm kay sath day ayf namy dayta frym haay۔ham mnfrd akdar ko nkalnay kay liye 'nam' kalm par anwkha () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: CSSCOPY kwda ['ayls' 'bab' 'charly' 'dayw'] yahan ، anwkha () tarykha kar ayk saf lwtata haay'nam' kalm sy anwkhy akdar ky۔srny main hr ayk anwkha nam hawta hay jo dayta frym kay 'nam' kalm main zaahar hawta haay۔ aap mtalwbha kalm nam kay sath 'nam' ki jghha la kar dayta frym main dusray kalmwn sy anwkhy akdar nkalnay kay l simillion isi tarah ki karwaiyan anjam dy saktay hayn۔ nwt karain keh mnfrd ka hakmntyjay main saf main akdar is trtyb par mbny hain js main woh asal kalm main zaahar hawtay hayn۔anwkhy akdar ko trtyb denay kay l you ، aap ntyjay main saf par trtyb_awlywza () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn: paiytwn kwpy kwdawnyk_ wylywza_swrtda = day ayf ['nam']۔ mnfrd ()

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main aan lain ashthaary dayta hawta haay۔aap A/B tystngh aur aadadwshmar kay tjzayay ka astamal karty hoey mham ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay aur antkhaby karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay aur antkhaby karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: ayk sy zayada kalmwn sy akdar ko ykja krkay dayta frym main ayk nya kalm bnanay kay l you ، aap strngh knkytyshn ya kesi aur mtalwbha tbdyly ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'phala nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly'] ، 'aakhry nam': ['smth' ، 'jansn'،' braؤn ']})#' pehla nam 'awr' aakhry nam 'day ayf [' mkml nam '] = DF [' pehla nam '] +' ' + DF [' aakhry nam '] kay amtzaaj krkay ayk nya kalm bnaiyn۔as msaal main prnt (day ayf) ، hamary pas kalmwn kay 'phala nam' aur 'aakhry nam' kay sath DF namy dayta frym haay۔ham 'phala nam' aur 'aakhry nam' kalmwn sy '+' aaprytr aur is kay darmiyan jghha ka astamal karty hoey akdar ko hum aahangh krkay 'mkml nam' kay nam sy ayk nya kalm bnatay hayn۔ aaؤt pt hawgha: ryazuy ka kwda pehla nam aakhry nam mkml nam 0 aylsasmth ayls asmth 1 bab jansn bab jansn 2 charly braؤn charly braؤnyhayr ، nya kalm 'mkml nam' dayta frym main hr ktaar kay liye 'phalay nam' aur 'aakhry nam' kalmwn ki akdar ko ykja krkay tyar kya gaya haay۔ aap kesi bhi mtalwbha tbdyly ko anjam dy saktay hayn۔ayk sy zayada kalmwn sy akdar ki bnyad par nya kalm bnanay kay liye kwnkytyshn lajk۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr daymwghrafk dayta hawta haay۔klstrngh alghwrthm aur daymwghrafk mtghyrat ka astamal karty hoey aap kstmr tksym aur hadf markytngh ki hakmt amly kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main do dayt taim kalmwn kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap ayk kalm ko dusray sy ghhta saktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par dayta frymdaf = pd.dataframe (start 'astart taim': ['2022-01-01 10:00:00' ، '2022-01-01 12:30:00'] ، 'akhttamy wkt': ['2022-01-01 11:30:00' ، '2022-01-01 14:15:00']})# kalmwn ko dayt tymdaf main tbdyl karain ['astart taim'] = PD۔to_datetime (df ['start wkt']) df ['end wkt'] = pd.to_datetime (df ['akhttamy wkt'])# 'akhttamy wkt' aur 'astart taim' day ayf ['mdt' 'kay darmiyan frk ka hasab lghaiyn]= DF ['akhttamy wkt'] - DF ['astart taim'] prnt (DF) is msaal main ، hamary pas DF namy ayk dayta frym hay js main kalm 'astart taim' aur 'akhttamy wkt' hay js main dayta taim wylywza par mushtamil haay۔ham sab sy pehlay un kalmwn ko PD.TO_DATETIME () ka astamal karty hoey dayt taim farmyt main tbdyl karty hayn۔ phir ، hum 'akhttamy wkt' kalm ko 'akhttamy wkt' kalm sy ghhta kar 'akhttamy wkt' aur 'astart taim' kay darmiyan frk ka hasab lghatay hayn۔ntyjay main taim daylta ki akdar ko 'dwranyha' kay nam sy ayk niay kalm main tfwyzu kya gaya haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: SQLCOPY kwda astart taim aynda taim taim ki mdt 2022-01-01 10:00:00 2022-01-01 11:30:00 0 dn 01 01.'dayta frym main hr saf kay liay۔ nwt karain keh ntyjay main kalm taip taim daylta ka hay ، jo do tarykh kay wkt ki akdar kay darmiyan mdt ya frk ki nmaindghy krta haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main sahat ki dykh bhal ka dayta hawta haay۔aap ayswsy ayshn rwl kan kny aur pysh ghwiy karnay wali madalngh ka astamal karty hoey bymary kay sath mrzu kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ga aur bymary kay khtaray ko askwrngh madal tyar karain ghay؟
Answer: kam sy kam myks askylngh ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main addy kalm ko mamwl par lanay kay l you ، aap asklrn.prwsysngh madaywl sy mn myks askylr klas astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kwda haay: paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr PDFROM SKLEREN.Preprocessing draamd Minmaxscaler# msaal Dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'akdar': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50]})# MinMaxScaler aabjyktsklr = MinMaxcaler = MinMaxscaler aabjyktsklr = MinMaxsscaler bnaiynkm sy kam myks askylngh day ayf ['aam akdar'] = askylr.ft_transfarm (day ayf [['akdar']]) prnt (day ayf) ka astamal karty hoey 'akdar' kalm ko aam karain (day ayf) prnt (day ayf) is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk dayta frym hay js ka nam day ayf hay js ka nam ayk addy kalm hay 'akdar '۔ham ayk mn myks askylr aabjykt tyar karty hain aur phir isy kam sy kam myks askylngh ka atalak krkay 'akdar' kalm ko mamwl par lanay kay liye astamal karty hayn۔ askylr ka FIT_TRANSFORM () tarykha astamal kya jata hay takha 'akdar' kalm ki kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada akdar ki ghnty ki jaskay aur akdar ki pymaish ki jaskay۔had tak [0 ، 1]۔aam akdar ko dayta frym main 'narmlaizada wylywza' namy ayk niay kalm main tfwyzu kya jata haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: ryazuy ka kwda kwda akdar ko mamwl par mbny akdar 0 0.001 20 0.252 30 0.503 40 0.754 50 1.00 HERE ، 'aam akdar' kalm main aam akdar par mushtamil haay۔mn myks askylngh ka astamal karty hoey 'akdar' kalm ka۔akdar ko mtnasb tawr par 0 aur 1 kay darmiyan asal kalm ki kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada akdar ki bnyad par askyl kya jata haay۔ nwt karain keh mn myks askylr 2D srny nma aabjykt par kam krta hay ، lhazaa hum sirf DF ki bjaiay DF [['akdar']] sy ghzartay hayn۔'akdar'] is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye keh is ko 2D srny smjha jaiay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main asmart hawm sy synsr dayta hawta haay۔aap kis tarah twanaiy ki khpt kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ga aur taim syryza tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey twanaiy kay astamal ki pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ko kis tarah tyar karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main kalm ki kfayt shaary awsta (EMA) ka hasab lghanay kay liye ، aap pandawn main EWM () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔EWM () tarykha kar kalm main akdar par kfayt shaary wzan ka atalak krta hay ، js sy haalyha akdar ko zayada wzan mlta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'akdar': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50]})# aspyn kay sath 'akdar' kalm ki awstaa awsta awsta ka hasab lghaiyn =2df ['ema'] = df ['values']. EWM (SPAN = 2 ، aydajst = ghlta)ham 'akdar' kalm par EWM () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hain js main 2 par mkrr krdha aspyn pyramytr 2 par syt hawta haay۔tasab kay liye aydajst nahin kya jata haay۔aghr aap isy sch par mrtb karty hain tou ، EMA main pehli kdr ayk sadha harkt pzayr awsta hawghy۔ hasab ktab ki janay wali awsta kdr awsta akdar ko dayta frym main 'EMA' namy ayk niay kalm main tfwyzu kya gaya haay۔10.0000001 20 16.6666672 30 25.0000003 40 33.3333334 50 42.500000

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kesi mwwy astrymngh srws kay liye kstmr kay jaizaay hawtay hayn۔aap jzabat kay tjzayha aur bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey mwwy ki drjha bndy aur sfarshat ko mtasar karnay waly anthaaiy baasar awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main kalm sy aaly akdar kay sath upar ki n ktaaryn nkalnay kay l you ، aap pandawn main nlargest () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kwda haay: PD## msaal kay tawr par paiytwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas dataframedf = pd.dataframe ({'akdar': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50]})# 'akdar' main aaly trien akdar kay sath upar 3 ktaaryn nkalyn۔kalm = 3 tap_n_rwza = df.nlarget (n ، 'akdar') prnt (tap_n_rw) is msaal main ، hamary pas 'akdar' kay nam sy kalm kay sath day ayf namy ayk dayta frym haay۔ham 'akdar' kalm main aaly trien akdar kay sath upar ki N ktaaryn nkalnay kay liye dayta frym par NLARGET () ka tarykha astamal karty hayn۔n pyramytr nkalnay kay liye ktaarwn ki tadad ki wzuahat krta haay۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: ryazuy ka kwda wylyw 4 503 402 30 agar ، tap_n_rw dayta frym main 'akdar' kalm main aaly trien akdar kay sath tap 3 ktaaryn shaml hayn۔ aap N ki kdr ko aydajst krsktay hayn۔aap ki zurwrt ki bnyad par mkhtlf tadad main ktaarwn ko nkalnay kay liye mtghyr۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main maly lyn dyn ka dayta hawta haay۔nyt wrk tjzayha aur bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay waly alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey aap mny landarngh aur jaly lyn dyn kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main ayk sy zayada bainry kalmwn main dwtwk akdar kay kalm ko tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap pandawn sy get_dmumies () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yha fnkshn asal kalm main hr anwkhy kdr kay liye niay bainry kalm tkhlyk krta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: PDITHONCOPY kwdaympwrt pandaas PD# msaal kay tawr par dayta frymdaf = pd.dataframe ({'zamrha': ['A' ، 'B' ، 'A' ، 'C' ، 'B']})# knwrt 'zamrha'ayk sy zayada bainry kalm bainry_kwlmza main kalm = PD.GET_DUMMIES (DF [' zamrha '])# bainry kalmwn ko asal dayta frymdaf = PD.CONCAT ([DF ، bainry_kwlmza] ، mhawr = 1) prnt (DF) kay sath jwrayn ، is msaal main ،hamaray pas day ayf namy ayk dayta frym hay js ka nam 'zamrha' hay js main zamrha dar akdar hayn۔ham 'zamrha' kalm par ghyt_damyza () fnkshn ko mtadd bainry kalmwn main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal karty hayn۔ ghyt_damyza () fnkshn bainry kalmwn kay sath ayk nya dayta frym tshkyl dyta hay ، jahan asal 'zamrha' kalm main hr anwkhy kymt ko alag alag nmaindghy kya jata haay۔bainry kalm۔kalm kay nam khud bkhwd mnfrd akdar ki bnyad par tyar hawjatay hayn۔ hum phir kalmwn (mhawr = 1) kay sath asal dayta frym day ayf kay sath bainry kalmwn ko jwranay kay liye pd.concat () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔ aaؤt pt hon ghay: CSScopy kwda zamrha A BC0 A 1 0 01 B 0 1 02 A 1 0 03 C 0 0 14 B 0 1 0 yahan ، niay bainry kalm 'A' ، 'B' ، aur 'C' ko dayta frym main shaml kya gaya hay ، jo asal 'zamrha' ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔kalmhar saf ki is kytyghry par mbny bainry kalm main 1 ki kdr hawty hay js ka talk is sy hawta haay۔ nwt karain keh asal 'zamrha' kalm ab bhi dayta frym main mwjwd hay ، aur is kay sath hi niay bainry kalm shaml hayn۔aghr aap asal kalm ko hatana chahti hain tou ، aap bainry kalm bnanay kay bad isy chhwranay kay liye darap () fnkshn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya gaya hay js main swshl mydaya dayta haay۔aap kis tarah baasar saarfyn ka tjzayha aur un ki shnakht karain ga aur nyt wrk ki mrkzayt kay akdamat aur bazay madalza ka astamal karty hoey malwmat kay phylaؤ aur wairlty par un kay asarat ki shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: dayta frym main farwrda flngh (ya farwrda flngh) kay zaryaha ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalnay kay l you ، aap 'ayf fl' par syt tarykha pyramytr kay sath flna () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yha tarykha pchhly saf sy haalyha ghair nwl kdr kay sath ghmshdha akdar ko pُr krta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal ka kwda haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaympwrt pandaas btawr pydaympwrt nympy kay tawr par ayn py# msaal kay tawr par NP# msaal kay tawr par ghmshdha akdar kay sath dayta frym = pd.dataframe ({'akdar': [1 ، np.nan ، 3 ، np.nan ، 5]})# farwrda laptha lapthawylywza day ayf ['akdar'] = day ayf ['akdar']۔ flna (tarykha = 'fyl') prnt (day ayf) prnt (day ayf) is msaal kay tawr par ، hamary pas day ayf namy ayk dayta frym hay js main 'akdar' kay nam sy ayk kalm hay js main nan ki nmaindghy ki hogi haay۔ham 'akdar' kalm par flna () tarykha astamal karty hain aur tarykha kar pyramytr ko 'FFLE' par syt karty hain ، js sy farwrda flngh ki nshandhay hawty haay۔ flna () tarykha 'akdar' kalm main ghmshdha akdar ko haalyha ghair nwl kdr kay sath bdl dyta haay۔pchhly ktaar say۔ aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: ryazuy ka kwda wylyw 0 1.01 1.02 3.03 3.04 5.0.0 hr ayk ki ghmshdha akdar ko pchhly saf sy haalyha ghair nwl kdr sy bhra hoa haay۔ktaar 1 aur 3 main NAN akdar ko pchhly ktaar sy kymt 1 kay sath tbdyl kya gaya hay ، aur ktaar 4 main NAN kymt ko pchhly ktaar sy kymt 3 kay sath tbdyl kya gaya haay۔ nwt karain keh farwrda flngh yeh frzu krta hay keh ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karna chahaiaysb sy haalyha ghair nwl kdr۔yha tarykha mwzawn hay jab ghmshdha akdar ko kalm main sabkha akdar kay zaryaha makwl had tak kryb kya jaskta haay۔
